  6976                                  
  6977                                  ; domini **********************************************************************
  6978                                  ;
  6979                                  ;mini disk initialization routine. called right after dohard
  6980                                  ;modified for >2 hardfile support
  6981                                  ;
  6982                                  ; **cs=ds=es=datagrp
  6983                                  ;
  6984                                  ; **domini will search for every extended partition in the system, and
  6985                                  ;   initialize it.
  6986                                  ;
  6987                                  ; **bdsm stands for bds table for mini disk and located right after the label
  6988                                  ;   end96tpi. end_of_bdsm will have the offset value of the ending
  6989                                  ;   address of bdsm table.
  6990                                  ;
  6991                                  ; **bdsm is the same as usual bds structure except that tim_lo, tim_hi entries
  6992                                  ;   are overlapped and used to identify mini disk and the number of hidden_trks.
  6993                                  ;   right now, they are called as ismini, hidden_trks respectively.
  6994                                  ;
  6995                                  ; **domini will use the same routine in sethard routine after label set2 to
  6996                                  ;   save coding.
  6997                                  ;
  6998                                  ; **drvmax determined in dohard routine will be used for the next
  6999                                  ;   available logical mini disk drive number.
  7000                                  ;
  7001                                  ; input: drvmax, dskdrvs
  7002                                  ;
  7003                                  ; output: minidisk installed. bdsm table established and installed to bds.
  7004                                  ;	  end_of_bdsm - ending offset address of bdsm.
  7005                                  ;
  7006                                  ; called modules:
  7007                                  ;		  getboot
  7008                                  ;		  find_mini_partition (new), xinstall_bds (new), M038
  7009                                  ;
  7010                                  ;		  setmini (new, it will use set2 routine)
  7011                                  ;
  7012                                  ; variables used: end_of_bdsm
  7013                                  ;		  rom_minidisk_num
  7014                                  ;		  mini_hdlim, mini_seclim
  7015                                  ;		  BDS_STRUC, start_bds
  7016                                  ;
  7017                                  ;******************************************************************************
  7018                                  
  7019                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7020                                  domini:	
  7021 00002179 8A36[5117]              		mov	dh, [hnum]	; get number of hardfiles
  7022                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7023 0000217D 20F6                    		and	dh, dh
  7024                                  		;cmp	dh, 0
  7025 0000217F 7431                    		jz	short dominiret	; no hard file?	then exit.
  7026 00002181 B280                    		mov	dl, 80h		; start	with hardfile 80h
  7027                                  domini_loop:				
  7028 00002183 52                      		push	dx
  7029 00002184 8816[5017]              		mov	[rom_minidisk_num], dl
  7030 00002188 B408                    		mov	ah, 8
  7031 0000218A CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	GET CURRENT DRIVE PARAMETERS (XT,AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  7032                                  					; DL = drive number
  7033                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status code, BL	= drive	type
  7034                                  					; DL = number of consecutive drives
  7035                                  					; DH = maximum value for head number, ES:DI -> drive parameter
  7036 0000218C FEC6                    		inc	dh
  7037 0000218E 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax
  7038 00002190 88F0                    		mov	al, dh
  7039 00002192 A3[5617]                		mov	[mini_hdlim], ax ; # of heads
  7040 00002195 80E13F                  		and	cl, 3Fh
  7041 00002198 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  7042 0000219A A3[5817]                		mov	[mini_seclim], ax ; # of sectors/track
  7043 0000219D 06                      		push	es
  7044 0000219E 8A16[5017]              		mov	dl, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7045 000021A2 E836FB                  		call	getboot		; read master boot record into
  7046                                  					; initbootsegment:bootbias
  7047 000021A5 7203                    		jb	short domininext
  7048 000021A7 E80900                  		call	find_mini_partition
  7049                                  domininext:				
  7050 000021AA 07                      		pop	es
  7051 000021AB 5A                      		pop	dx
  7052 000021AC FEC2                    		inc	dl		; next hard file
  7053 000021AE FECE                    		dec	dh
  7054 000021B0 75D1                    		jnz	short domini_loop
  7055                                  dominiret:				
  7056 000021B2 C3                      		retn
  7057                                  
  7058                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7059                                  
  7060                                  ; 15/10/2022 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7061                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7062                                  
  7063                                  ;find_mini_partition tries to find every extended partition on a disk.
  7064                                  ;at entry:	di -> bdsm entry
  7065                                  ;		es:bx -> 07c0:bootbias - master boot record
  7066                                  ;		rom_minidisk_num - rom drive number
  7067                                  ;		drvmax - logical drive number
  7068                                  ;		mini_hdlim, mini_seclim
  7069                                  ;
  7070                                  ;called routine: setmini which uses set2 (in sethard routine)
  7071                                  ;variables & equates used from original bios - flags, fnon_removable, fbigfat
  7072                                  
  7073                                  
  7074                                  find_mini_partition:	
  7075 000021B3 81C3C201                		add	bx, 1C2h	; bx ->	file system id
  7076                                  fmpnext:				
  7077 000021B7 26803F05                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 5 ; 5 = extended partition id.
  7078 000021BB 740A                    		jz	short fmpgot
  7079 000021BD 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  7080 000021C0 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  7081 000021C4 75F1                    		jnz	short fmpnext
  7082                                  		;jmp	short fmpnextfound ; extended partition	not found
  7083                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7084                                  fmpnextfound:
  7085 000021C6 C3                      		retn
  7086                                  
  7087                                  ;		; 30/07/2019 - Retro DOS v3.2
  7088                                  ;		jb	short fmpnext
  7089                                  ;fmpret:
  7090                                  ;		retn	; 29/05/2019
  7091                                  
  7092                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7093                                  
  7094                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7095                                  fmpgot:					; found my partition.				
  7096 000021C7 E8A100                  		call	dmax_check	; check	for drvmax already 26
  7097 000021CA 73FA                    		jnb	short fmpnextfound ; done if too many
  7098 000021CC 8B3E[5417]              		mov	di, [end_of_bdss] ; get next free	bds
  7099 000021D0 C745470100              		mov	word [di+47h], 1 ; [di+BDS.bdsm_ismini]
  7100                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7101 000021D5 804D2301                		or	byte [di+23h], 1
  7102                                  		;or	word [di+23h], 1 ; [di+BDS.flags]
  7103                                  					; fNon_Removable
  7104 000021D9 C6452205                		mov	byte [di+22h], 5 ; [di+BDS.formfactor]
  7105                                  					; ffHardFile
  7106 000021DD C606[D216]00            		mov	byte [fbigfat], 0 ; assume 12 bit fat.
  7107 000021E2 A1[5617]                		mov	ax, [mini_hdlim]
  7108 000021E5 894515                  		mov	[di+15h], ax	; [di+BDS.heads]
  7109 000021E8 A1[5817]                		mov	ax, [mini_seclim]
  7110 000021EB 894513                  		mov	[di+13h], ax	; [di+BDS.secpertrack]
  7111 000021EE A0[5017]                		mov	al, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7112 000021F1 884504                  		mov	[di+4],	al	; [di+BDS.drivenum]
  7113                                  					; set physical number
  7114 000021F4 A0[7500]                		mov	al, [drvmax]
  7115 000021F7 884505                  		mov	[di+5],	al	; [di+BDS.drivelet]
  7116                                  					; set logical number
  7117 000021FA 26837F0A00              		cmp	word [es:bx+10], 0
  7118 000021FF 7707                    		ja	short fmpgot_cont
  7119 00002201 26837F0840              		cmp	word [es:bx+8], 64 ; with current bpb,
  7120                                  					; only lower word is meaningful.
  7121 00002206 72BE                    		jb	short fmpnextfound
  7122                                  					; should be bigger than 64 sectors at least
  7123                                  fmpgot_cont:				
  7124 00002208 83EB04                  		sub	bx, 4		; let bx point to the start of the entry
  7125 0000220B 268A7702                		mov	dh, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder
  7126 0000220F 80E6C0                  		and	dh, 0C0h	; get higher bits of cyl
  7127 00002212 D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  7128 00002214 D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  7129 00002216 268A5703                		mov	dl, [es:bx+3]	; cyl byte
  7130 0000221A 895549                  		mov	[di+49h], dx	; [di+BDS.bdsm_hidden_trks]
  7131                                  					; set hidden trks
  7132 0000221D 268B4F02                		mov	cx, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder,cylinder/sector
  7133 00002221 268A7701                		mov	dh, [es:bx+1]	; head
  7134 00002225 8A16[5017]              		mov	dl, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7135 00002229 BB0002                  		mov	bx, 200h	; bootbias
  7136 0000222C B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
  7137 0000222F CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
  7138                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
  7139                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
  7140                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
  7141 00002231 7293                    		jb	short fmpnextfound
  7142 00002233 BBC203                  		mov	bx, 3C2h	; 1C2h+bootbias
  7143 00002236 06                      		push	es
  7144 00002237 E80900                  		call	setmini		; install a mini disk.
  7145                                  					; bx value saved.
  7146 0000223A 07                      		pop	es
  7147 0000223B 7203                    		jb	short fmpnextchain
  7148 0000223D E84000                  		call	xinstall_bds	; -- install the bdsm into table
  7149                                  fmpnextchain:				
  7150 00002240 E974FF                  		jmp	fmpnext		; let's find out
  7151                                  					; if we	have any chained partition
  7152                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7153                                  
  7154                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7155                                  ;fmpnextfound:				
  7156                                  		;retn
  7157                                  
  7158                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7159                                  
  7160                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7161                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 6.21)
  7162                                  
  7163                                  setmini:	; 'setmini' is called from 'find_mini_partition' procedure
  7164                                  	
  7165 00002243 57                      		push	di
  7166 00002244 53                      		push	bx
  7167 00002245 1E                      		push	ds
  7168 00002246 06                      		push	es
  7169                                  setmini_1:				
  7170 00002247 26803F01                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 1 ; FAT12 partition
  7171 0000224B 741B                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7172 0000224D 26803F04                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 4 ; FAT16 partition
  7173 00002251 7415                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7174 00002253 26803F06                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 6 ; FAT16 BIG	partition
  7175 00002257 740F                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7176 00002259 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  7177 0000225C 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  7178 00002260 75E5                    		jnz	short setmini_1
  7179 00002262 F9                      		stc
  7180 00002263 07                      		pop	es
  7181 00002264 1F                      		pop	ds
  7182 00002265 5B                      		pop	bx
  7183 00002266 5F                      		pop	di
  7184 00002267 C3                      		retn
  7185                                  
  7186                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7187                                  setmini_2:				
  7188 00002268 E91DFB                  		jmp	set2		; branch into middle of sethard
  7189                                  
  7190                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7191                                  
  7192                                  ; 30/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.2
  7193                                  ; (SYSINITSEG is 473h for MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS) 
  7194                                  
  7195                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7196                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7197                                  ;
  7198                                  ; dmax_check --- call this when we want to install a new drive.
  7199                                  ;		it checks for drvmax < 26 to see if there is
  7200                                  ;		a drive letter left.
  7201                                  ;
  7202                                  ;	drvmax < 26 : carry SET!
  7203                                  ;	drvmax >=26 : carry RESET!, error flag set for message later
  7204                                  ;			trash ax
  7205                                  
  7206                                  dmax_check:	
  7207 0000226B 803E[7500]1A            		cmp	byte [drvmax], 26 ; checks for drvmax < 26
  7208 00002270 720D                    		jb	short dmax_ok	; return with carry if okay
  7209 00002272 06                      		push	es
  7210                                  		;mov	ax, 46Dh	; SYSINIT_SEG (SYSINIT segment)
  7211 00002273 B85804                  		mov	ax, SYSINITSEG	; 17/10/2022	
  7212 00002276 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax
  7213                                  		; 18/10/2022
  7214 00002278 26C606[8103]01          		mov	byte [es:TOOMANYDRIVESFLAG], 1 ; 09/12/2022 
  7215                                  		;mov	byte ptr es:3FFh, 1 ; [es:toomanydrivesflag]
  7216                                  					; set message flag
  7217                                  					; [SYSINIT+toomanydrivesflag]
  7218 0000227E 07                      		pop	es
  7219                                  
  7220                                  		;;push	es
  7221                                  		;;mov	ax,SYSINIT_SEG
  7222                                  		;;mov	es,ax
  7223                                  		;;mov	byte [es:toomanydrivesflag],1
  7224                                  					; set message flag
  7225                                  		;;pop	es
  7226                                  		;
  7227                                  		;mov	byte [SYSINIT+toomanydrivesflag],1
  7228                                  dmax_ok:				
  7229 0000227F C3                      		retn
  7230                                  
  7231                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7232                                  
  7233                                  ; 18/10/2022
  7234                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7235                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0						
  7236                                  ;								 
  7237                                  ;	link next bds (at ds:di) into the chain. assume that the
  7238                                  ;	  chain is entirely within ds == datagrp. also update drvmax,
  7239                                  ;	  dskdrv_table, and end_of_bdss.	
  7240                                  
  7241                                  xinstall_bds:		
  7242 00002280 56                      		push	si
  7243 00002281 53                      		push	bx
  7244 00002282 8B36[1901]              		mov	si, [start_bds]	; get first bds
  7245                                  xinstall_bds_1:				
  7246 00002286 833CFF                  		cmp	word [si], 0FFFFh ; is this the last one?
  7247 00002289 7404                    		jz	short xinstall_bds_2 ;	skip ahead if so
  7248                                  		;mov	si, [si+BDS.link]
  7249 0000228B 8B34                    		mov	si, [si]	; chain	through	list
  7250 0000228D EBF7                    		jmp	short xinstall_bds_1
  7251                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7252                                  
  7253                                  xinstall_bds_2:				
  7254                                  		;mov	[si+BDS.link], di
  7255 0000228F 893C                    		mov	[si], di
  7256                                  		;mov	[si+BDS.link+2], ds
  7257 00002291 8C5C02                  		mov	[si+2], ds
  7258                                  		;mov	word [di+BDS.link], -1
  7259 00002294 C705FFFF                		mov	word [di], 0FFFFh ; make sure it is a null ptr.
  7260                                  		;mov	[di+BDS.link+2], ds
  7261 00002298 8C5D02                  		mov	[di+2], ds ; might as well plug segment
  7262                                  		; 20/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7263                                  		;lea	bx, [di+BDS.BPB]
  7264 0000229B 8D5D06                  		lea	bx, [di+6]
  7265 0000229E 8B36[5217]              		mov	si, [last_dskdrv_table]
  7266 000022A2 891C                    		mov	[si], bx
  7267 000022A4 8306[5217]02            		add	word [last_dskdrv_table], 2
  7268 000022A9 FE06[7500]              		inc	byte [drvmax]
  7269 000022AD 8306[5417]64            		add	word [end_of_bdss], 100 ; BDS.size = 100
  7270 000022B2 5B                      		pop	bx
  7271 000022B3 5E                      		pop	si
  7272 000022B4 C3                      		retn
  7273                                  
  7274                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7275                                  
  7276                                  ; 17/10/2022
  7277                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7278                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7279                                  ; 03/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7280                                  
  7281                                  cmos_clock_read:	
  7282 000022B5 50                      		push	ax
  7283 000022B6 51                      		push	cx
  7284 000022B7 52                      		push	dx
  7285 000022B8 55                      		push	bp
  7286 000022B9 31ED                    		xor	bp, bp
  7287                                  loop_clock:				
  7288 000022BB 31C9                    		xor	cx, cx
  7289 000022BD 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7290 000022BF B402                    		mov	ah, 2
  7291 000022C1 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  7292                                  					; Return: CH = hours in	BCD
  7293                                  					; CL = minutes in BCD
  7294                                  					; DH = seconds in BCD
  7295 000022C3 83F900                  		cmp	cx, 0
  7296 000022C6 7512                    		jnz	short clock_present
  7297 000022C8 83FA00                  		cmp	dx, 0
  7298 000022CB 750D                    		jnz	short clock_present
  7299 000022CD 83FD01                  		cmp	bp, 1		; read again after a slight delay, in case clock
  7300 000022D0 741C                    		jz	short no_readdate ; was	at zero	setting.
  7301 000022D2 45                      		inc	bp		; only perform delay once.
  7302 000022D3 B90040                  		mov	cx, 4000h	; 16384
  7303                                  delay:					
  7304 000022D6 E2FE                    		loop	delay
  7305 000022D8 EBE1                    		jmp	short loop_clock
  7306                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7307                                  
  7308                                  clock_present:				
  7309 000022DA 2EC606[F304]01          		mov	byte [cs:havecmosclock], 1 ; set the flag for cmos clock
  7310 000022E0 E81000                  		call	cmosck		; reset	cmos clock rate	that may be
  7311                                  					; possibly destroyed by	cp dos and
  7312                                  					; post routine did not restore that.
  7313 000022E3 56                      		push	si
  7314 000022E4 E842F2                  		call	read_real_date	; read real-time clock for date
  7315 000022E7 FA                      		cli
  7316                                  		;mov	ds:daycnt, si	; set system date
  7317 000022E8 8936[F004]              		mov	[daycnt], si
  7318 000022EC FB                      		sti
  7319 000022ED 5E                      		pop	si
  7320                                  
  7321                                  no_readdate:				
  7322 000022EE 5D                      		pop	bp
  7323 000022EF 5A                      		pop	dx
  7324 000022F0 59                      		pop	cx
  7325 000022F1 58                      		pop	ax
  7326 000022F2 C3                      		retn
  7327                                  
  7328                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7329                                  
  7330                                  ; the following code is written by jack gulley in engineering group.
  7331                                  ; cp dos (CP/DOS, OS/2) is changing cmos clock rate for its own purposes
  7332                                  ; and if the use cold boot the system to use pc dos while running cp dos,
  7333                                  ; the cmos clock rate are still slow which slow down disk operations
  7334                                  ; of pc dos which uses cmos clock. pc dos is put this code in msinit
  7335                                  ; to fix this problem at the request of cp dos.
  7336                                  ;
  7337                                  ; the program is modified to be run on msinit. equates are defined
  7338                                  ; in cmosequ.inc. this program will be called by cmos_clock_read procedure.
  7339                                  ;
  7340                                  ;  the following code cmosck is used to insure that the cmos has not
  7341                                  ;	had its rate controls left in an invalid state on older at's.
  7342                                  ;
  7343                                  ;	it checks for an at model byte "fc" with a submodel type of
  7344                                  ;	00, 01, 02, 03 or 06 and resets the periodic interrupt rate
  7345                                  ;	bits in case post has not done it. this initilization routine
  7346                                  ;	is only needed once when dos loads. it should be run as soon
  7347                                  ;	as possible to prevent slow diskette access.
  7348                                  ;
  7349                                  ;	this code exposes one to dos clearing cmos setup done by a
  7350                                  ;	resident program that hides and re-boots the system.
  7351                                  
  7352                                  cmosck:					; check and reset rtc rate bits	
  7353                                  
  7354                                  ;model byte and submodel byte were already determined in msinit.
  7355                                  
  7356                                  	; 16/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7357                                  	; 19/03/2018 (Model: 0FCh, Sub Model: 01h, REF: AMIBIOS Prog. Guide)
  7358                                  			
  7359 000022F3 50                      		push	ax
  7360 000022F4 2E803E[3E06]FC          		cmp	byte [cs:model_byte], 0FCh
  7361 000022FA 7525                    		jnz	short cmosck9	; Exit if not an AT model
  7362 000022FC 2E803E[3F06]06          		cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 6
  7363                                  					; Is it 06 for the industral AT ?
  7364 00002302 7408                    		jz	short cmosck4	; Go reset CMOS	periodic rate if 06
  7365 00002304 2E803E[3F06]04          		cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 4
  7366                                  					; Is it 00, 01, 02, or 03 ?
  7367 0000230A 7315                    		jnb	short cmosck9	; EXIT if problem fixed by POST  
  7368                                  					; Also,Secondary_model_byte = 0 
  7369                                  					;   when AH=0C0h, int 15h failed.
  7370                                  					;	RESET THE CMOS PERIODIC RATE 
  7371                                  					;  Model=FC submodel=00,01,02,03 or 06 
  7372                                  cmosck4:				
  7373 0000230C B08A                    		mov	al, 8Ah		; cmos_reg_a|nmi
  7374                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  7375 0000230E B426                    		mov	ah, 26h		; 00100110b
  7376                                  					; Set divider &	rate selection
  7377 00002310 E83000                  		call	cmos_write
  7378 00002313 B08B                    		mov	al, 8Bh		; cmos_reg_b|nmi
  7379                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  7380 00002315 E80B00                  		call	cmos_read
  7381 00002318 2407                    		and	al, 7		; 00000111b
  7382                                  					; clear	SET,PIE,AIE,UIE,SQWE
  7383 0000231A 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  7384 0000231C B00B                    		mov	al, 0Bh		; cmos_reg_b
  7385                                  					; NMI enabled on return
  7386 0000231E E82200                  		call	cmos_write
  7387                                  cmosck9:				
  7388 00002321 58                      		pop	ax
  7389 00002322 C3                      		retn
  7390                                  
  7391                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7392                                  
  7393                                  ;--- CMOS_READ -----------------------------------------------------------------
  7394                                  ;		read byte from cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  7395                                  ;									       :
  7396                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be read				       :
  7397                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  7398                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to read		       :
  7399                                  ;									       :
  7400                                  ; output: (al)	value at location (al) moved into (al). if bit 7 of (al) was   :
  7401                                  ;		on then nmi left disabled.  during the cmos read both nmi and  :
  7402                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  7403                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  7404                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  7405                                  ;		only the (al) register and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  7406                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7407                                  
  7408                                  cmos_read:				; read location (al) into (al)	
  7409 00002323 9C                      		pushf
  7410 00002324 FA                      		cli
  7411 00002325 53                      		push	bx
  7412 00002326 50                      		push	ax		; AL = cmos table address to be	read
  7413 00002327 0C80                    		or	al, 80h
  7414 00002329 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7415                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7416 0000232B 90                      		nop			; (undocumented	delay needed)
  7417 0000232C E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7418 0000232E 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax
  7419 00002330 58                      		pop	ax
  7420 00002331 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  7421 00002333 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  7422 00002335 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7423                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7424 00002337 90                      		nop
  7425 00002338 E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7426 0000233A 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  7427 0000233C 5B                      		pop	bx
  7428 0000233D 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  7429 0000233E E80100                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  7430 00002341 C3                      		retn			; return with flags restored
  7431                                  
  7432                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7433                                  
  7434                                  cmos_popf:				
  7435 00002342 CF                      		iret			; popf for level b- parts
  7436                                  					; return far and restore flags
  7437                                  
  7438                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7439                                  
  7440                                  ;--- cmos_write ----------------------------------------------------------------
  7441                                  ;		write byte to cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  7442                                  ;									       :
  7443                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be written to			       :
  7444                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  7445                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to write		       :
  7446                                  ;	 (ah)=	new value to be placed in the addressed table location	       :
  7447                                  ;									       :
  7448                                  ; output:	value in (ah) placed in location (al) with nmi left disabled   :
  7449                                  ;		if bit 7 of (al) is on. during the cmos update both nmi and    :
  7450                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  7451                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  7452                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  7453                                  ;		only the cmos location and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  7454                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7455                                  
  7456                                  cmos_write:				; write (ah) to location (al)	
  7457 00002343 9C                      		pushf			; write (ah) to location (al)
  7458 00002344 50                      		push	ax		; save work register values
  7459 00002345 FA                      		cli
  7460 00002346 50                      		push	ax		; save user nmi	state
  7461 00002347 0C80                    		or	al, 80h		; disable nmi for us
  7462 00002349 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7463                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7464 0000234B 90                      		nop
  7465 0000234C 88E0                    		mov	al, ah
  7466 0000234E E671                    		out	71h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7467 00002350 58                      		pop	ax		; get user nmi
  7468 00002351 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  7469 00002353 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  7470 00002355 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7471                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7472 00002357 90                      		nop
  7473 00002358 E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7474 0000235A 58                      		pop	ax		; restore work registers
  7475 0000235B 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  7476 0000235C E8E3FF                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  7477 0000235F C3                      		retn
  7478                                  
  7479                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7480                                  ; MSINIT.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  7481                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7482                                  ; The following routines provide support for reading in the file MSDOS.SYS.
  7483                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7484                                  
  7485                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7486                                  ;
  7487                                  ; (For Retro DOS, 'IO.SYS' and 'MSDOS.SYS' are already loaded together
  7488                                  ;  at once -as single kernel file- by the Retro DOS boot sector code.
  7489                                  ;  So, following disk reads -MSDOS.SYS loading- is not needed!
  7490                                  ;  Only needing is to move MSDOS Kernel to it's final memory location.) 
  7491                                  
  7492                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7493                                  
  7494                                  ; GetClus, read in a cluster at a specified address
  7495                                  ;
  7496                                  ;  bx = cluster to read
  7497                                  ;  cx = sectors per cluster
  7498                                  ;  es:di = load location
  7499                                  
  7500                                  ; 17/10/2022
  7501                                  ;DISKRD equ diskrd - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h	; (8E5h for MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7502                                  ; 09/12/2022
  7503                                  DISKRD equ diskrd
  7504                                  
  7505                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7506                                  getclus:				
  7507 00002360 51                      		push	cx
  7508 00002361 57                      		push	di
  7509 00002362 2E890E[D016]            		mov	[cs:doscnt], cx
  7510 00002367 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  7511 00002369 48                      		dec	ax
  7512 0000236A 48                      		dec	ax
  7513 0000236B F7E1                    		mul	cx		; convert to logical sector
  7514                                  					; dx:ax	= matching logical sector number
  7515                                  					;	  starting from the data sector
  7516 0000236D 2E0306[CC16]            		add	ax, [cs:bios_l]
  7517 00002372 2E1316[CE16]            		adc	dx, [cs:bios_h]	; dx:ax	= first	logical	sector to read
  7518                                  unpack:					
  7519 00002377 1E                      		push	ds
  7520 00002378 50                      		push	ax
  7521 00002379 53                      		push	bx
  7522 0000237A 2E8B36[D316]            		mov	si, [cs:fatloc]
  7523 0000237F 8EDE                    		mov	ds, si
  7524 00002381 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; next cluster
  7525 00002383 2EF606[D216]40          		test	byte [cs:fbigfat], 40h	; fbig
  7526                                  					; 16 bit fat?jh
  7527 00002389 753E                    		jnz	short unpack16	; yes
  7528 0000238B D1EE                    		shr	si, 1		; 12 bit fat. si=si/2
  7529                                  					; si = clus + clus/2
  7530 0000238D 01DE                    		add	si, bx		;
  7531                                  					; (si =	byte offset of the cluster in the FAT)
  7532 0000238F 52                      		push	dx
  7533 00002390 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7534 00002392 E87E00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7535 00002395 5A                      		pop	dx
  7536 00002396 8B07                    		mov	ax, [bx]	; save it into ax
  7537 00002398 7519                    		jnz	short even_odd	; if not a splitted fat, check even-odd.
  7538 0000239A 8A07                    		mov	al, [bx]	; splitted fat
  7539 0000239C 2EA2[DA16]              		mov	[cs:temp_cluster], al
  7540 000023A0 46                      		inc	si		; (next	byte)
  7541 000023A1 52                      		push	dx
  7542 000023A2 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7543 000023A4 E86C00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7544 000023A7 5A                      		pop	dx
  7545                                  		;mov	al, ds:0
  7546 000023A8 A00000                  		mov	al, [0] ; 19/10/2022
  7547 000023AB 2EA2[DB16]              		mov	[cs:temp_cluster+1], al
  7548 000023AF 2EA1[DA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:temp_cluster]
  7549                                  even_odd:				
  7550 000023B3 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore old fat entry	value
  7551 000023B4 53                      		push	bx		; save it right	away.
  7552 000023B5 D1EB                    		shr	bx, 1		; was it even or odd?
  7553 000023B7 7308                    		jnb	short havclus	; it was even.
  7554 000023B9 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1		; odd. massage fat value and keep
  7555                                  					; the highest 12 bits.
  7556 000023BB D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7557 000023BD D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7558 000023BF D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7559                                  havclus:				
  7560 000023C1 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax		; now bx = new fat entry.
  7561 000023C3 81E3FF0F                		and	bx, 0FFFh	; keep low 12 bits.
  7562 000023C7 EB0E                    		jmp	short unpackx
  7563                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7564                                  
  7565                                  unpack16:				
  7566 000023C9 52                      		push	dx
  7567 000023CA 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7568 000023CC D1E6                    		shl	si, 1		; extend to 32 bit offset
  7569 000023CE 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  7570 000023D1 E83F00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7571 000023D4 5A                      		pop	dx
  7572 000023D5 8B1F                    		mov	bx, [bx]	;
  7573                                  					; bx = new fat entry.
  7574                                  unpackx:				
  7575 000023D7 5E                      		pop	si		; restore old bx value into si
  7576 000023D8 58                      		pop	ax		; restore logical sector (low)
  7577 000023D9 1F                      		pop	ds
  7578 000023DA 29DE                    		sub	si, bx
  7579 000023DC 83FEFF                  		cmp	si, -1		; one apart?
  7580 000023DF 7507                    		jnz	short getcl2
  7581 000023E1 2E010E[D016]            		add	[cs:doscnt], cx
  7582 000023E6 EB8F                    		jmp	short unpack
  7583                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7584                                  
  7585                                  getcl2:					
  7586 000023E8 53                      		push	bx
  7587 000023E9 52                      		push	dx		; sector to read (high)
  7588 000023EA 50                      		push	ax		; sector to read (low)
  7589 000023EB 2EA1[CA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive and	fat spec
  7590 000023EF 2E8B0E[D016]            		mov	cx, [cs:doscnt]
  7591 000023F4 5A                      		pop	dx		; sector to read for diskrd (low)
  7592 000023F5 2E8F06[2B05]            		pop	word [cs:start_sec_h]
  7593                                  					; sector to read for diskrd (high)
  7594 000023FA 1E                      		push	ds
  7595 000023FB 0E                      		push	cs
  7596 000023FC 1F                      		pop	ds
  7597 000023FD 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7598                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7599 000023FE BD[C408]                		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  7600                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  7601                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  7602 00002401 E861F3                  		call	call_bios_code	; read the clusters
  7603 00002404 1F                      		pop	ds
  7604 00002405 5B                      		pop	bx
  7605 00002406 5F                      		pop	di
  7606 00002407 2EA1[D016]              		mov	ax, [cs:doscnt]	; get number of	sectors	read
  7607 0000240B 86E0                    		xchg	ah, al		; multiply by 256
  7608 0000240D D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1		; times	2 equal	512
  7609 0000240F 01C7                    		add	di, ax		; update load location
  7610 00002411 59                      		pop	cx		; restore sectors/cluster
  7611 00002412 C3                      		retn
  7612                                  
  7613                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7614                                  
  7615                                  
  7616                                  ;function: find and read the corresponding fat sector into ds:0
  7617                                  ;
  7618                                  ;in). dx:si - offset value (starting from fat entry 0) of fat entry to find. M054
  7619                                  ;     ds - fatloc segment
  7620                                  ;     cs:drvfat - logical drive number, fat id
  7621                                  ;     cs:md_sectorsize
  7622                                  ;     cs:last_fat_secnum - last fat sector number read in.
  7623                                  ;
  7624                                  ;out). corresponding fat sector read in.
  7625                                  ;      bx = offset value from fatlog segment.
  7626                                  ;      other registera saved.
  7627                                  ;      zero flag set if the fat entry is splitted, i.e., when 12 bit fat entry
  7628                                  ;      starts at the last byte of the fat sector. in this case, the caller
  7629                                  ;      should save this byte, and read the next fat sector to get the rest
  7630                                  ;      of the fat entry value. (this will only happen with the 12 bit fat.)
  7631                                  
  7632                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7633                                  get_fat_sector:	
  7634 00002413 50                      		push	ax
  7635 00002414 51                      		push	cx
  7636 00002415 57                      		push	di
  7637 00002416 56                      		push	si
  7638 00002417 06                      		push	es
  7639 00002418 1E                      		push	ds
  7640 00002419 89F0                    		mov	ax, si
  7641 0000241B 2E8B0E[D816]            		mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  7642 00002420 F7F1                    		div	cx		; ax=sector number, dx = offset
  7643 00002422 90                      		nop
  7644                                  
  7645                                  		; Get rid of the assumption that
  7646                                  		; there	is only	one reserved sector
  7647                                  
  7648 00002423 06                      		push	es
  7649 00002424 1E                      		push	ds
  7650 00002425 57                      		push	di
  7651 00002426 50                      		push	ax
  7652 00002427 0E                      		push	cs
  7653 00002428 1F                      		pop	ds
  7654                                  
  7655 00002429 2EA1[CA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive # and FAT id
  7656 0000242D BD[CB04]                		mov	bp, SETDRIVE
  7657                                  		;mov	bp, 4D7h	; setdrive
  7658                                  					; at 2C7h:4D7h = 70h:2A47h
  7659 00002430 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7660 00002431 E831F3                  		call	call_bios_code	; get bds for drive
  7661 00002434 58                      		pop	ax		; (sector number -without reserved and hidden sectors-)
  7662 00002435 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
  7663                                  					; add #reserved_sectors
  7664 00002439 5F                      		pop	di
  7665 0000243A 1F                      		pop	ds
  7666 0000243B 07                      		pop	es
  7667 0000243C 2E3B06[DC16]            		cmp	ax, [cs:last_fat_sec_num]
  7668 00002441 742A                    		jz	short gfs_split_chk ; don't need to read it again.
  7669 00002443 2EA3[DC16]              		mov	[cs:last_fat_sec_num], ax 
  7670                                  					; sector number
  7671                                  					; (in the partition, without hidden sectors)
  7672 00002447 52                      		push	dx
  7673 00002448 2EC706[2B05]0000        		mov	word [cs:start_sec_h], 0 
  7674                                  					; prepare to read the fat sector
  7675                                  					; start_sec_h is always	0 for fat sector.
  7676 0000244F 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax
  7677 00002451 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1		; 1 sector read
  7678 00002454 2EA1[CA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]
  7679 00002458 1E                      		push	ds
  7680 00002459 07                      		pop	es
  7681 0000245A 31FF                    		xor	di, di		; es:di	-> fatloc segment:0
  7682 0000245C 1E                      		push	ds
  7683 0000245D 0E                      		push	cs
  7684 0000245E 1F                      		pop	ds
  7685 0000245F 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7686 00002460 BD[C408]                		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  7687                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  7688                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  7689 00002463 E8FFF2                  		call	call_bios_code
  7690 00002466 1F                      		pop	ds
  7691 00002467 5A                      		pop	dx
  7692 00002468 2E8B0E[D816]            		mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  7693                                  
  7694                                  gfs_split_chk:				
  7695 0000246D 49                      		dec	cx		; 511
  7696 0000246E 39CA                    		cmp	dx, cx		; if offset points to the
  7697                                  					; last byte of this sector,
  7698                                  					; then splitted	entry.
  7699 00002470 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; set bx to dx
  7700 00002472 1F                      		pop	ds
  7701 00002473 07                      		pop	es
  7702 00002474 5E                      		pop	si
  7703 00002475 5F                      		pop	di
  7704 00002476 59                      		pop	cx
  7705 00002477 58                      		pop	ax
  7706 00002478 C3                      		retn
  7707                                  
  7708                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7709                                  ;Bios_Data_Init	ends
  7710                                  
  7711                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7712                                  
  7713                                  		; 09/12/2022
  7714                                  		;db 0
  7715                                  
  7716                                  numbertodiv	equ ($-BData_start)
  7717                                  numbertomod	equ (numbertodiv % 16)
  7718                                  
  7719                                  %if numbertomod>0 & numbertomod<16
  7720 00002479 00<rep 7h>              		times (16-numbertomod) db 0
  7721                                  %endif
  7722                                  
  7723                                  ;align 16
  7724                                  
  7725                                  ; 09/12/2022
  7726                                  IOSYSCODESEGOFF	equ $ - BData_start
  7727                                  IOSYSCODESEG	equ (IOSYSCODESEGOFF>>4)+(700h>>4)
  7728                                  
  7729                                  ;--- End of DOSBIOS data segment --------------------------------------------
  7730                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7731                                  		;db 4 dup(0)
  7732                                  ; 09/12/2022		
  7733                                  ;		times 4 db 0	; 19/10/2022
  7734                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7735                                  
  7736                                  ;============================================================================
  7737                                  ; DOS BIOS (IO.SYS) CODE SEGMENT 
  7738                                  ;============================================================================
  7739                                  ; 09/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7740                                  ; 30/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
  7741                                  
  7742                                  section .BIOSCODE vstart=0 
  7743                                  
  7744                                  ; 30/12/2022
  7745                                  ; (BIOSCODE SEGMENT is 2CCh for MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)  -- ((25C0h+700h)>>4) --
  7746                                  
  7747                                  BCode_start:	 ; 09/12/2022
  7748                                   
  7749                                  ; 02/10/2022
  7750                                  
  7751                                  ;--- DOSBIOS code segment ---------------------------------------------------
  7752                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7753                                  ; MSBIO1.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  7754                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7755                                  
  7756                                  DOSBIOSEG_2C7h:	;db 30h dup(0)		; SEGMENT 2C7h (2C70h-700h=2570h)
  7757 00000000 00<rep 30h>             		times 48 db 0		; 19/10/2022	
  7758 00000030 7000                    BiosDataWord:	dw 70h
  7759                                  
  7760                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7761                                  ;BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h
  7762                                  ; 09/12/2022
  7763                                  BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord
  7764                                  
  7765                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7766                                  
  7767                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS) 
  7768                                  
  7769                                  ;************************************************************************
  7770                                  ;*									*
  7771                                  ;*	seg_reinit is called with ax = our new code segment value,	*
  7772                                  ;*	  trashes di, cx, es						*
  7773                                  ;*									*
  7774                                  ;*	cas -- should be made disposable!				*
  7775                                  ;*									*
  7776                                  ;************************************************************************
  7777                                  
  7778                                  _seg_reinit:
  7779 00000032 2E8E06[3000]            		mov	es, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
  7780                                  					; at 2C7h:30h or 70h:25A0h
  7781                                  		;mov	di, (offset cdev+2)
  7782 00000037 BF[E006]                		mov	di, cdev+2	; 19/10/2022
  7783 0000003A B90400                  		mov	cx, 4		; (end_BC_entries - cdev)/4
  7784                                  
  7785                                  _seg_reinit_1:				
  7786 0000003D AB                      		stosw			; modify Bios_Code entry points
  7787 0000003E 47                      		inc	di
  7788 0000003F 47                      		inc	di
  7789 00000040 E2FB                    		loop	_seg_reinit_1
  7790 00000042 CB                      		retf
  7791                                  
  7792                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7793                                  
  7794                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7795                                  
  7796                                  ;************************************************************************
  7797                                  ;*									*
  7798                                  ;*	chardev_entry - main device driver dispatch routine		*
  7799                                  ;*	   called with a dummy parameter block on the stack		*
  7800                                  ;*	   dw dispatch_table, dw prn/aux numbers (optional)		*
  7801                                  ;*									*
  7802                                  ;*	will eventually take care of doing the transitions in		*
  7803                                  ;*	   out of Bios_Code						*
  7804                                  ;*									*
  7805                                  ;************************************************************************
  7806                                  
  7807                                  chardev_entry:				; 0070h:25B3h =	02C7h:0043h
  7808 00000043 56                      		push	si
  7809 00000044 50                      		push	ax
  7810 00000045 51                      		push	cx
  7811 00000046 52                      		push	dx
  7812 00000047 57                      		push	di
  7813 00000048 55                      		push	bp
  7814 00000049 1E                      		push	ds
  7815 0000004A 06                      		push	es
  7816 0000004B 53                      		push	bx
  7817 0000004C 89E5                    		mov	bp, sp
  7818 0000004E 8B7612                  		mov	si, [bp+18]	; get return address (dispatch table)
  7819                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h]
  7820                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  7821 00000051 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  7822 00000056 8B4402                  		mov	ax, [si+2]	; get the device number	if present
  7823 00000059 A2[2100]                		mov	[auxnum], al
  7824 0000005C 8826[E704]              		mov	[printdev], ah
  7825 00000060 8B34                    		mov	si, [si]	; point	to the device dispatch table
  7826 00000062 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; get pointer to i/o packet
  7827 00000066 268A4701                		mov	al, [es:bx+1]	; [es:bx+unit]	; al = unit code
  7828 0000006A 268A670D                		mov	ah, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+media]	; ah = media descrip
  7829 0000006E 268B4F12                		mov	cx, [es:bx+18]	; [es:bx+count]	; cx = count
  7830 00000072 268B5714                		mov	dx, [es:bx+20]	; [es:bx+start]	; dx = start sector
  7831                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7832 00000076 81FE[9604]              		cmp	si, DSKTBL
  7833                                  		;cmp	si, 4A2h	; dsktbl
  7834                                  					; at 2C7h:4A2h = 70h:2A12h
  7835 0000007A 7517                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  7836                                  
  7837                                  ; Special case for 32-bit start sector number:
  7838                                  ;   if (si==dsktbl) /* if this is a disk device call */
  7839                                  ;      set high 16 bits of secnum to 0
  7840                                  ;      if (secnum == 0xffff) fetch 32 bit sector number
  7841                                  ;
  7842                                  ; pass high word of sector number in start_sec_h, low word in dx
  7843                                  ;
  7844                                  ; note: start_l and start_h are the offsets within the io_request packet
  7845                                  ;	  which contain the low and hi words of the 32 bit start sector if
  7846                                  ;	  it has been used.
  7847                                  ;
  7848                                  ; note: remember not to destroy the registers which have been set up before
  7849                                  
  7850                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	0 ; initialize to 0
  7851 0000007C C706[2B05]0000          		mov	word [start_sec_h], 0
  7852 00000082 83FAFF                  		cmp	dx, 0FFFFh
  7853 00000085 750C                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  7854 00000087 268B571C                		mov	dx, [es:bx+28]	; [es:bx+start_h]
  7855                                  					; 32 bits dsk req
  7856                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	dx ; start_sec_h = packet.start_h
  7857 0000008B 8916[2B05]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx
  7858 0000008F 268B571A                		mov	dx, [es:bx+26]	; [es:bx+start_l]
  7859                                  					; dx = packet.start_l
  7860                                  no_sector32_mapping:			
  7861 00000093 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  7862 00000094 268A4702                		mov	al, [es:bx+2]	; [es:bx+cmd]
  7863 00000098 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, cs:[si]
  7864 0000009B 732C                    		jnb	short command_error
  7865 0000009D 98                      		cbw			; note that al <= 15 means ok
  7866 0000009E D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
  7867 000000A0 01C6                    		add	si, ax
  7868 000000A2 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  7869 000000A3 26C47F0E                		les	di, [es:bx+14]	; [es:bx+trans]
  7870 000000A7 FC                      		cld
  7871                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7872 000000A8 2EFF5401                		call	near [cs:si+1]
  7873                                  		;call	word ptr cs:si+1
  7874 000000AC 7202                    		jb	short already_got_ah_status
  7875 000000AE B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  7876                                  already_got_ah_status:
  7877                                  		;;mov	ds, [cs:0030h]	; 15/10/2022			
  7878                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  7879                                  					; cas note: shouldn't be needed!
  7880 000000B0 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  7881                                  		;lds	bx, ds:ptrsav
  7882 000000B5 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
  7883 000000B9 894703                  		mov	[bx+3],	ax	; [bx+status]
  7884                                  					; mark operation complete
  7885 000000BC 5B                      		pop	bx
  7886 000000BD 07                      		pop	es
  7887 000000BE 1F                      		pop	ds
  7888 000000BF 5D                      		pop	bp
  7889 000000C0 5F                      		pop	di
  7890 000000C1 5A                      		pop	dx
  7891 000000C2 59                      		pop	cx
  7892 000000C3 58                      		pop	ax
  7893 000000C4 5E                      		pop	si
  7894 000000C5 83C402                  		add	sp, 2		; get rid of fake return address
  7895                                  	
  7896                                  		; fall through into bc_retf
  7897                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------	
  7898                                  bc_retf:
  7899 000000C8 CB                      		retf
  7900                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7901                                  
  7902                                  command_error:				
  7903 000000C9 E80900                  		call	bc_cmderr
  7904 000000CC EBE2                    		jmp	short already_got_ah_status
  7905                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7906                                  ; 01/05/2019
  7907                                  
  7908                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7909                                  ; The following piece of hack is for supporting CP/M compatibility
  7910                                  ; Basically at offset 5 we have a far call into 0:c0. But this does not call
  7911                                  ; 0:c0 directly instead it call f01d:fef0, because it needs to support 'lhld 6'
  7912                                  ; The following hack has to reside at ffff:d0 (= f01d:fef0) if BIOS is loaded
  7913                                  ; high.
  7914                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7915                                  
  7916                                  		;db 7 dup(0)
  7917                                  
  7918                                  		; 15/10/2022
  7919                                  
  7920 000000CE 0000                    		dw 0		; pad to bring offset to 0D0h
  7921                                  
  7922 000000D0 00<rep 5h>              off_d0: 	times 5 db 0	; 5 bytes from 0:c0 will be copied onto here
  7923                                  				;  which is the CP/M call 5 entry point
  7924                                  		
  7925                                  
  7926                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7927                                  
  7928                                  ;	exit - all routines return through this path
  7929                                  
  7930                                  bc_cmderr:				
  7931 000000D5 B003                    		mov	al, 3		; 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  7932                                  					; unknown command error
  7933                                  
  7934                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7935                                  
  7936                                  ;	now zero the count field by subtracting its current value,
  7937                                  ;	  which is still in cx, from itself.
  7938                                  
  7939                                  ;	subtract the number of i/o's NOT YET COMPLETED from total
  7940                                  ;	  in order to return the number actually complete
  7941                                  
  7942                                  bc_err_cnt:	
  7943                                  		;les	bx, ds:ptrsav
  7944                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7945 000000D7 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  7946 000000DB 26294F12                		sub	[es:bx+18], cx	; [es:bx+count]
  7947                                  					; # of successful i/o's
  7948 000000DF B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; mark error return
  7949 000000E1 F9                      		stc			; indicate abnormal end
  7950 000000E2 C3                      		retn
  7951                                  
  7952                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7953                                  
  7954                                  ;Bios_Code ends
  7955                                  
  7956                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7957                                  ; MSCHAR.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
  7958                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7959                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7960                                  ; 10/01/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7961                                  
  7962                                  ; 30/04/2019
  7963                                  
  7964                                  ;title	mschar - character and clock devices
  7965                                  
  7966                                  ;MODE_CTRLBRK	equ	0FFh
  7967                                  
  7968                                  ; BIOSCODE:00E4h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
  7969                                  
  7970                                  ;************************************************************************
  7971                                  ;*									*
  7972                                  ;*	device driver dispatch tables					*
  7973                                  ;*									*
  7974                                  ;*	each table starts with a byte which lists the number of		*
  7975                                  ;*	legal functions, followed by that number of words. Each		*
  7976                                  ;*	word represents an offset of a routine in Bios_Code which	*
  7977                                  ;*	handles the function. The functions are terminated with		*
  7978                                  ;*	a near return. If carry is reset, a 'done' code is returned	*
  7979                                  ;*	to the caller. If carry is set, the ah/al registers are		*
  7980                                  ;*	returned as abnormal completion status. Notice that ds		*
  7981                                  ;*	is assumed to point to the Bios_Data segment throughout.	*
  7982                                  ;*									*
  7983                                  ;************************************************************************
  7984                                  
  7985                                  		; 13/12/2022
  7986                                  		;db 0
  7987                                  
  7988                                  		; 13/12/202
  7989 000000E3 0B                      con_table:	db ((con_table_end - con_table)-1)/2 ; 11
  7990                                  					; 2C7h:0E4h = 70h:2654h
  7991 000000E4 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  7992                                  					; 00 init
  7993 000000E6 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 01
  7994 000000E8 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 02
  7995 000000EA [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr ; 0D5h	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  7996                                  					; 03
  7997 000000EC [5B01]                  		dw con_read  ; 15Ch	; con_read at 2C7h:15Ch	= 70h:26CCh
  7998                                  					; 04
  7999 000000EE [9E01]                  		dw con_rdnd  ; 19Fh	; con_rdnd at 2C7h:19Fh	= 70h:270Fh
  8000                                  					; 05
  8001 000000F0 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 06
  8002 000000F2 [0702]                  		dw con_flush ; 209h	; con_flush at 2C7h:209h = 70h:2779h
  8003                                  					; 07
  8004 000000F4 [FB01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; con_writ at 2C7h:1FDh	= 70h:276Dh
  8005                                  					; 08
  8006 000000F6 [FB01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; 09
  8007 000000F8 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 0A
  8008                                  con_table_end:
  8009 000000FA 1A                      prn_table:	db ((prn_table_end - prn_table)-1)/2 ; 26			
  8010                                  					; 2C7h:0FBh = 70h:266Bh
  8011 000000FB [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec
  8012 000000FD [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8013 000000FF [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8014 00000101 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; bc_cmderr
  8015 00000103 [1802]                  		dw prn_input  ;	21Ah	; prn_input
  8016                                  					; 04 indicate zero chars read
  8017 00000105 [C601]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  8018                                  					; 05 read non-destructive
  8019 00000107 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8020 00000109 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  8021 0000010B [1D02]                  		dw prn_writ   ;	21Fh	; prn_writ
  8022 0000010D [1D02]                  		dw prn_writ   ; 21Fh	; 09
  8023 0000010F [4E02]                  		dw prn_stat   ; 251h	; prn_stat
  8024 00000111 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0B
  8025 00000113 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0C
  8026 00000115 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0D
  8027 00000117 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0E
  8028 00000119 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0F
  8029 0000011B [8802]                  		dw prn_tilbusy ; 28Bh	; prn_tilbusy
  8030 0000011D [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 11
  8031 0000011F [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 12
  8032 00000121 [B602]                  		dw prn_genioctl ; 2BAh	; prn_genioctl
  8033 00000123 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 14
  8034 00000125 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 15
  8035 00000127 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 16
  8036 00000129 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 17
  8037 0000012B [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 18
  8038 0000012D [EB02]                  		dw prn_ioctl_query ; 2F0h ; prn_ioctl_query
  8039                                  prn_table_end:
  8040 0000012F 0B                      aux_table:	db ((aux_table_end - aux_table)-1)/2 ; 11			
  8041                                  					; 2C7h:130h = 70h:26A0h
  8042 00000130 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00 - init
  8043 00000132 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8044 00000134 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8045 00000136 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  8046 00000138 [0603]                  		dw aux_read   ; 30Dh	; aux_read ; 04	- read
  8047 0000013A [2D03]                  		dw aux_rdnd   ; 335h	; aux_rdnd - 05	- read non-destructive
  8048 0000013C [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8049 0000013E [6303]                  		dw aux_flsh   ;	36Ch	; aux_flsh
  8050 00000140 [6A03]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; aux_writ
  8051 00000142 [6A03]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; 09
  8052 00000144 [4D03]                  		dw aux_wrst   ;	355h	; aux_wrst
  8053                                  aux_table_end:
  8054 00000146 0A                      tim_table	db ((tim_table_end - tim_table)-1)/2 ; 10

  8056 00000147 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00
  8057 00000149 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
