  8065 00000159 [D003]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; 09
  8066                                  tim_table_end:
  8067                                  
  8068                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8069                                  
  8070                                  ;************************************************************************
  8071                                  ;*									*
  8072                                  ;*	con_read - read cx bytes from keyboard into buffer at es:di	*
  8073                                  ;*									*
  8074                                  ;************************************************************************
  8075                                  
  8076                                  con_read:				; 2C7h:15Ch = 70h:26CCh
  8077                                  		;jcxz	short con_exit	; read cx bytes	from keyboard into buffer
  8078 0000015B E306                    		jcxz	con_exit	; 19/10/2022
  8079                                  con_loop:				
  8080 0000015D E80500                  		call	chrin		; get char in al
  8081 00000160 AA                      		stosb			; store	char at	es:di
  8082 00000161 E2FA                    		loop	con_loop
  8083                                  con_exit:				
  8084 00000163 F8                      		clc
  8085 00000164 C3                      		retn
  8086                                  
  8087                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8088                                  
  8089                                  ;************************************************************************
  8090                                  ;*									*
  8091                                  ;*	chrin - input single char from keyboard into al			*
  8092                                  ;*									*
  8093                                  ;*	  we are going to issue extended keyboard function, if		*
  8094                                  ;*	  supported. the returning value of the extended keystroke	*
  8095                                  ;*	  of the extended keyboard function uses 0E0h in al		*
  8096                                  ;*	  instead of 00h as in the conventional keyboard function.	*
  8097                                  ;*	  this creates a conflict when the user entered real		*
  8098                                  ;*	  greek alpha charater (= 0E0h) to  distinguish the extended	*
  8099                                  ;*	  keystroke and the greek alpha. this case will be handled	*
  8100                                  ;*	  in the following manner:					*
  8101                                  ;*									*
  8102                                  ;*	      ah = 16h							*
  8103                                  ;*	      int 16h							*
  8104                                  ;*	      if al == 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8105                                  ;*	      else if al == 0E0h, then					*
  8106                                  ;*	      if ah <> 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8107                                  ;*		else greek_alpha character.				*
  8108                                  ;*									*
  8109                                  ;*	also, for compatibility reason, if an extended code is		*
  8110                                  ;*	  detected, then we are going to change the value in al		*
  8111                                  ;*	  from 0E0h to 00h.						*
  8112                                  ;*									*
  8113                                  ;************************************************************************
  8114                                  
  8115                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8116                                  chrin:		
  8117 00000165 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; set by msinit. 0 or 10h
  8118 00000169 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8119 0000016B 8606[0C00]              		xchg	al, [altah]	; get character	& zero altah
  8120 0000016F 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8121 00000171 752A                    		jnz	short keyret
  8122 00000173 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8123 00000175 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8124 00000177 74EC                    		jz	short chrin
  8125 00000179 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8126 0000017C 7504                    		jnz	short alt_ext_chk
  8127 0000017E B010                    		mov	al, 10h
  8128 00000180 EB1B                    		jmp	short keyret
  8129                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8130                                  
  8131                                  ;  if operation was extended function (i.e. keyrd_func != 0) then
  8132                                  ;    if character read was 0E0h then
  8133                                  ;      if extended byte was zero (i.e. ah == 0) then
  8134                                  ;	 goto keyret
  8135                                  ;      else
  8136                                  ;	 set al to zero
  8137                                  ;	 goto alt_save
  8138                                  ;      endif
  8139                                  ;    endif
  8140                                  ;  endif
  8141                                  
  8142                                  alt_ext_chk:
  8143 00000182 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0
  8144 00000187 740C                    		jz	short not_ext
  8145 00000189 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h
  8146 0000018B 7508                    		jnz	short not_ext
  8147 0000018D 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
  8148 0000018F 740C                    		jz	short keyret
  8149 00000191 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8150 00000193 EB04                    		jmp	short alt_save
  8151                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8152                                  
  8153                                  not_ext:				
  8154 00000195 08C0                    		or	al, al		; special case?
  8155 00000197 7504                    		jnz	short keyret
  8156                                  alt_save:				
  8157 00000199 8826[0C00]              		mov	[altah], ah	; store	special	key
  8158                                  keyret:					
  8159 0000019D C3                      		retn
  8160                                  
  8161                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8162                                  
  8163                                  ;************************************************************************
  8164                                  ;*									*
  8165                                  ;*	con_rdnd - keyboard non destructive read, no wait		*
  8166                                  ;*									*
  8167                                  ;*	pc-convertible-type machine: if bit 10 is set by the dos	*
  8168                                  ;*	in the status word of the request packet, and there is no	*
  8169                                  ;*	character in the input buffer, the driver issues a system	*
  8170                                  ;*	wait request to the rom. on return from the rom, it returns	*
  8171                                  ;*	a 'char-not-found' to the dos.					*
  8172                                  ;*									*
  8173                                  ;************************************************************************
  8174                                  
  8175                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8176                                  con_rdnd:				
  8177 0000019E A0[0C00]                		mov	al, [altah]
  8178 000001A1 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8179 000001A3 754C                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8180 000001A5 8A26[E604]              		mov	ah, [keysts_func]
  8181 000001A9 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8182 000001AB 751D                    		jnz	short gotchr
  8183 000001AD 803E[7900]00            		cmp	byte [fhavek09], 0
  8184 000001B2 7412                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8185 000001B4 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8186                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8187 000001B8 26F6470404              		test	byte [es:bx+4], 04h
  8188                                  		;test	word [es:bx+3], 400h ; [es:bx+status]
  8189 000001BD 7407                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8190 000001BF B80041                  		mov	ax, 4100h
  8191 000001C2 30DB                    		xor	bl, bl
  8192 000001C4 CD15                    		int	15h		; SYSTEM - WAIT	ON EXTERNAL EVENT (CONVERTIBLE)
  8193                                  					; AL = condition type, BH = condition compare or mask value
  8194                                  					; BL = timeout value times 55 milliseconds, 00h	means no timeout
  8195                                  					; DX = I/O port	address	if AL bit 4 set
  8196                                  z_bus_exit:				
  8197 000001C6 F9                      		stc			; 2C7h:1C8h = 70h:2738h
  8198 000001C7 B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; indicate busy	status
  8199 000001C9 C3                      		retn
  8200                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8201                                  
  8202                                  gotchr:					
  8203 000001CA 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8204 000001CC 7508                    		jnz	short notbrk	; check	for null after break
  8205 000001CE 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; issue keyboard read function
  8206 000001D2 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8207 000001D4 EBC8                    		jmp	short con_rdnd	; get a	real status
  8208                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8209                                  
  8210                                  notbrk:					
  8211 000001D6 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8212 000001D9 7504                    		jnz	short rd_ext_chk
  8213 000001DB B010                    		mov	al, 10h		; ('P' & 1Fh) ; return control p
  8214 000001DD EB12                    		jmp	short rdexit
  8215                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8216                                  
  8217                                  rd_ext_chk:				
  8218 000001DF 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0 ; extended keyboard function?
  8219 000001E4 740B                    		jz	short rdexit
  8220 000001E6 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h	; extended key value or	greek alpha?
  8221 000001E8 7507                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8222 000001EA 80FC00                  		cmp	ah, 0		; scan code exist?
  8223 000001ED 7402                    		jz	short rdexit	; yes. greek alpha char.
  8224 000001EF B000                    		mov	al, 0		; no. extended key stroke.
  8225                                  					; change it for	compatibility
  8226                                  rdexit:					
  8227 000001F1 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8228 000001F5 2688470D                		mov	[es:bx+13], al	; [es:bx+media]
  8229                                  					; return keyboard character here
  8230                                  bc_exvec:				
  8231 000001F9 F8                      		clc			; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  8232                                  					; indicate normal termination
  8233 000001FA C3                      		retn
  8234                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8235                                  
  8236                                  ;************************************************************************
  8237                                  ;*									*
  8238                                  ;*	con_write - console write routine				*
  8239                                  ;*									*
  8240                                  ;*	entry:	es:di -> buffer						*
  8241                                  ;*		cx    =  count						*
  8242                                  ;*									*
  8243                                  ;************************************************************************
  8244                                  
  8245                                  con_writ:
  8246                                  		;jcxz	short bc_exvec
  8247 000001FB E3FC                    		jcxz	bc_exvec	; 19/10/2022
  8248                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8249                                  		;jcxz	cc_ret
  8250                                  con_lp:					
  8251 000001FD 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]
  8252 00000200 47                      		inc	di
  8253 00000201 CD29                    		int	29h		; DOS 2+ internal - FAST PUTCHAR
  8254                                  					; AL = character to display
  8255 00000203 E2F8                    		loop	con_lp
  8256                                  cc_ret:					
  8257 00000205 F8                      		clc
  8258 00000206 C3                      		retn
  8259                                  
  8260                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8261                                  
  8262                                  ;************************************************************************
  8263                                  ;*									*
  8264                                  ;*	con_flush - flush out keyboard queue				*
  8265                                  ;*									*
  8266                                  ;************************************************************************
  8267                                  
  8268                                  con_flush:
  8269 00000207 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0	; clear	out holding buffer
  8270                                  flloop:					; while	(charavail()) charread();	
  8271 0000020C B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8272 0000020E CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - CHECK BUFFER, DO NOT CLEAR
  8273                                  					; Return: ZF clear if character	in buffer
  8274                                  					; AH = scan code, AL = character
  8275                                  					; ZF set if no character in buffer
  8276 00000210 74F3                    		jz	short cc_ret
  8277 00000212 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8278 00000214 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - READ CHAR FROM BUFFER, WAIT IF EMPTY
  8279                                  					; Return: AH = scan code, AL = character
  8280 00000216 EBF4                    		jmp	short flloop
  8281                                  
  8282                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8283                                  
  8284                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8285                                  
  8286                                  ;************************************************************************
  8287                                  ;*									*
  8288                                  ;*	some equates for rom bios printer i/o				*
  8289                                  ;*									*
  8290                                  ;************************************************************************
  8291                                  
  8292                                  ; ibm rom status bits (i don't trust them, neither should you)
  8293                                  ; warning!!! the ibm rom does not return just one bit. it returns a
  8294                                  ; whole slew of bits, only one of which is correct.
  8295                                  
  8296                                  ;notbusystatus	equ 10000000b		; not busy
  8297                                  ;nopaperstatus	equ 00100000b		; no more paper
  8298                                  ;prnselected	equ 00010000b		; printer selected
  8299                                  ;ioerrstatus	equ 00001000b		; some kinda error
  8300                                  ;timeoutstatus	equ 00000001b		; time out.
  8301                                  ;
  8302                                  ;noprinter	equ 00110000b		; no printer attached
  8303                                  
  8304                                  ; 18/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8305                                  ;error_I24_out_of_paper	equ 9 ; MSDOS 6.0, ERR.INC, 1991
  8306                                  
  8307                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8308                                  
  8309                                  ;************************************************************************
  8310                                  ;*									*
  8311                                  ;*	prn_input - return with no error but zero chars read		*
  8312                                  ;*									*
  8313                                  ;*	enter with cx = number of characters requested			*
  8314                                  ;*									*
  8315                                  ;************************************************************************
  8316                                  
  8317                                  prn_input:				; 2C7h:21Ah = 70h:278Ah
  8318 00000218 E8BCFE                  		call	bc_err_cnt	; reset	count to zero
  8319                                  					; (sub reqpkt.count,cx)
  8320                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8321                                  prn_done:
  8322 0000021B F8                      		clc			; but return with carry	reset for no error
  8323 0000021C C3                      		retn
  8324                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8325                                  
  8326                                  ;************************************************************************
  8327                                  ;*									*
  8328                                  ;*	prn_writ - write cx bytes from es:di to printer device		*
  8329                                  ;*									*
  8330                                  ;*	auxnum has printer number					*
  8331                                  ;*									*
  8332                                  ;************************************************************************
  8333                                  
  8334                                  prn_writ:				; 2C7h:21Fh = 70h:278Fh
  8335                                  		;jcxz	short prn_done	; no chars to output
  8336 0000021D E3FC                    		jcxz	prn_done	; 19/10/2022
  8337                                  prn_loop:				
  8338 0000021F BB0200                  		mov	bx, 2		; retry	count
  8339                                  prn_out:				
  8340 00000222 E83600                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8341 00000225 751D                    		jnz	short TestPrnError
  8342 00000227 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to print
  8343 0000022A 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8344 0000022C E82E00                  		call	prnop		; print	to printer
  8345 0000022F 7419                    		jz	short prn_con	; no error - continue
  8346 00000231 80FCFF                  		cmp	ah, 0FFh	; MODE_CTRLBRK
  8347 00000234 7509                    		jnz	short _prnwf
  8348 00000236 B00C                    		mov	al, 0Ch		; error_I24_gen_failure
  8349 00000238 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0
  8350 0000023D EB08                    		jmp	short pmessg
  8351                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8352                                  
  8353                                  _prnwf:					
  8354 0000023F F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; timeoutstatus
  8355 00000242 7406                    		jz	short prn_con
  8356                                  TestPrnError:				
  8357 00000244 4B                      		dec	bx		; retry	until count is exhausted.
  8358 00000245 75DB                    		jnz	short prn_out
  8359                                  pmessg:					
  8360 00000247 E98DFE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8361                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8362                                  
  8363                                  prn_con:				
  8364 0000024A 47                      		inc	di		; point	to next	char and continue
  8365 0000024B E2D2                    		loop	prn_loop
  8366                                  ;prn_done:				
  8367                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8368                                  prn_done2:
  8369                                  		;clc
  8370                                  		; cf=0
  8371 0000024D C3                      		retn
  8372                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8373                                  
  8374                                  ;************************************************************************
  8375                                  ;*									*
  8376                                  ;*	prn_stat - device driver entry to return printer status		*
  8377                                  ;*									*
  8378                                  ;************************************************************************
  8379                                  
  8380                                  prn_stat:				; 2C7h:251h = 70h:27C1h
  8381 0000024E E80A00                  		call	prnstat		; device in dx
  8382 00000251 75F4                    		jnz	short pmessg
  8383 00000253 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; notbusystatus
  8384                                  		;jnz	short prn_done
  8385                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8386 00000256 75F5                    		jnz	short prn_done2 ; cf=0
  8387 00000258 E96BFF                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
  8388                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8389                                  
  8390                                  ;************************************************************************
  8391                                  ;*									*
  8392                                  ;*	prnstat - utility function to call ROM BIOS to check		*
  8393                                  ;*		 printer status. Return meaningful error code		*
  8394                                  ;*									*
  8395                                  ;************************************************************************
  8396                                  
  8397                                  prnstat:				
  8398 0000025B B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; set command for get status
  8399                                  
  8400                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8401                                  
  8402                                  ;************************************************************************
  8403                                  ;*									*
  8404                                  ;*	prnop - call ROM BIOS printer function in ah			*
  8405                                  ;*		return zero true if no error				*
  8406                                  ;*		return zero false if error, al = error code		*
  8407                                  ;*									*
  8408                                  ;************************************************************************
  8409                                  
  8410                                  prnop:	
  8411 0000025D 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; get printer number
  8412 00000261 CD17                    		int	17h		; PRINTER - GET	STATUS
  8413                                  					; DX = printer port (0-3)
  8414                                  					; Return: AH = status
  8415                                  
  8416                                  	; This check was added to see if this is a case of no
  8417                                  	; printer being installed. This tests checks to be sure
  8418                                  	; the error is noprinter (30h)
  8419                                  
  8420 00000263 50                      		push	ax
  8421 00000264 80E430                  		and	ah, 30h
  8422 00000267 80FC30                  		cmp	ah, 30h		; noprinter
  8423 0000026A 58                      		pop	ax
  8424 0000026B 7506                    		jnz	short NextTest
  8425 0000026D 80E4DF                  		and	ah, 0DFh	; ~nopaperstatus
  8426 00000270 80CC08                  		or	ah, 8		; ioerrstatus
  8427                                  
  8428                                  ; examine the status bits to see if an error occurred. unfortunately, several
  8429                                  ; of the bits are set so we have to pick and choose. we must be extremely
  8430                                  ; careful about breaking basic.
  8431                                  
  8432                                  NextTest:				
  8433 00000273 F6C428                  		test	ah, 28h		; (ioerrstatus+nopaperstatus)
  8434                                  					; i/o error?
  8435 00000276 740A                    		jz	short checknotready ; no, try not ready
  8436                                  
  8437                                  ; at this point, we know we have an error. the converse is not true
  8438                                  
  8439 00000278 B009                    		mov	al, 9		; error_I24_out_of_paper
  8440                                  					; first, assume	out of paper
  8441 0000027A F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; out of paper set?
  8442 0000027D 7502                    		jnz	short ret1	; yes, error is	set
  8443 0000027F FEC0                    		inc	al		; return al=10 (i/o error)
  8444                                  ret1:					
  8445 00000281 C3                      		retn
  8446                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8447                                  
  8448                                  checknotready:				
  8449 00000282 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; assume not-ready
  8450 00000284 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1
  8451 00000287 C3                      		retn
  8452                                  
  8453                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8454                                  
  8455                                  ;************************************************************************
  8456                                  ;*									*
  8457                                  ;*	prn_tilbusy - output until busy. Used by print spooler.		*
  8458                                  ;*		     this entry point should never block waiting for	*
  8459                                  ;*		     device to come ready.				*
  8460                                  ;*									*
  8461                                  ;*	inputs:	cx = count, es:di -> buffer				*
  8462                                  ;*	outputs: set the number of bytes transferred in the		*
  8463                                  ;*		 device driver request packet				*
  8464                                  ;*									*
  8465                                  ;************************************************************************
  8466                                  
  8467                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8468                                  prn_tilbusy:				; 2C7h:28Bh = 70h:27FBh
  8469 00000288 89FE                    		mov	si, di		; everything is	set for	lodsb
  8470                                  prn_tilbloop:				
  8471 0000028A 51                      		push	cx
  8472 0000028B 53                      		push	bx
  8473 0000028C 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  8474 0000028E 8A1E[E704]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  8475 00000292 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  8476                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	wait count times to come ready
  8477 00000294 8B8F[E804]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  8478 00000298 5B                      		pop	bx
  8479                                  prn_getstat:				
  8480 00000299 E8BFFF                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8481 0000029C 7514                    		jnz	short prn_bperr	; error
  8482 0000029E F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; ready	yet?
  8483 000002A1 E1F6                    		loope	prn_getstat	; no, go for more
  8484 000002A3 59                      		pop	cx		; get original count
  8485 000002A4 740D                    		jz	short prn_berr	; still	not ready => done
  8486 000002A6 26                      		es
  8487 000002A7 AC                      		lodsb
  8488                                  		;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ; es
  8489                                  					; lodsb
  8490 000002A8 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8491 000002AA E8B0FF                  		call	prnop
  8492 000002AD 7504                    		jnz	short prn_berr	; error
  8493 000002AF E2D9                    		loop	prn_tilbloop
  8494                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8495                                  		; cf=0 (prnop)
  8496                                  		;clc			; normal no-error return
  8497 000002B1 C3                      		retn			;   from device driver
  8498                                  
  8499                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8500                                  
  8501                                  prn_bperr:				
  8502 000002B2 59                      		pop	cx		; restore transfer count from stack
  8503                                  prn_berr:				
  8504 000002B3 E921FE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt

  8506                                  
  8507                                  ; 15/10/2022

  8516                                  ; 11/01/2019

  8518                                  ;********************************;*

  8520                                  ;********************************;*
  8521

  8524                                  ;;set_retry_count equ 45h

  8533                                  
  8534                                  		; 19/10/2022

  8547 000002C8 26C47D13                		les	di, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]

  8555 000002DA 7407                    		jz	short prngetcount

  8600                                  ;************************************************************************
  8601                                  ;*									*
  8602                                  ;*	aux port driver code -- "aux" == "com1"				*
  8603                                  ;*									*
  8604                                  ;*	the device driver entry/dispatch code sets up auxnum to		*
  8605                                  ;*	give the com port number to use (0=com1, 1=com2, 2=com3...)	*
  8606                                  ;*									*
  8607                                  ;************************************************************************
  8608                                  
  8609                                  ;	values in ah, requesting function of int 14h in rom bios
  8610                                  
  8611                                  ;auxfunc_send	 equ	1	;transmit
  8612                                  ;auxfunc_receive equ	2	;read
  8613                                  ;auxfunc_status	 equ	3	;request status
  8614                                  
  8615                                  ;	error flags, reported by int 14h, reported in ah:
  8616                                  
  8617                                  ;flag_data_ready equ	01h	;data ready
  8618                                  ;flag_overrun	 equ	02h	;overrun error
  8619                                  ;flag_parity	 equ	04h	;parity error
  8620                                  ;flag_frame	 equ	08h	;framing error
  8621                                  ;flag_break	 equ	10h	;break detect
  8622                                  ;flag_tranhol_emp equ	20h	;transmit holding register empty
  8623                                  ;flag_timeout	 equ	80h	;timeout
  8624                                  
  8625                                  ;	these flags reported in al:
  8626                                  
  8627                                  ;flag_cts	 equ	10h	;clear to send
  8628                                  ;flag_dsr	 equ	20h	;data set ready
  8629                                  ;flag_rec_sig	 equ	80h	;receive line signal detect

  8632                                  
  8633                                  ;************************************************************************
  8634                                  ;*									*
  8635                                  ;*	aux_read - read cx bytes from [auxnum] aux port to buffer	*
  8636                                  ;*		   at es:di						*
  8637                                  ;*									*
  8638                                  ;************************************************************************
  8639                                  
  8640                                  aux_read:				; 2C7h:30Dh = 70h:287Dh
  8641                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2
  8642 00000306 E311                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
  8643 00000308 E87700                  		call	getbx		; put address of auxbuf	in bx
  8644 0000030B 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8645 0000030D 8607                    		xchg	al, [bx]
  8646 0000030F 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8647 00000311 7503                    		jnz	short aux2
  8648                                  aux1:					
  8649 00000313 E80500                  		call	auxin		; get character	from port
  8650                                  					; won't return if error
  8651                                  aux2:

  8654                                  exvec2:

  8656                                  auxin_retn:	; 18/12/2022

  8659                                  
  8660                                  ;************************************************************************
  8661                                  ;*									*
  8662                                  ;*	auxin - call rom bios to read character from aux port		*
  8663                                  ;*		if error occurs, map the error and return one		*
  8664                                  ;*		level up to device driver exit code, setting		*
  8665                                  ;*		the number of bytes transferred appropriately		*
  8666                                  ;*									*
  8667                                  ;************************************************************************
  8668                                  
  8669                                  auxin:

  8671 0000031D E83C00                  		call	auxop
  8672 00000320 F6C40E                  		test	ah, 0Eh		; flag_frame|flag_parity|flag_overrun
  8673                                  		;jnz	short arbad	; skip if any error bits set
  8674                                  		;retn
  8675                                  		; 18/12/2022
  8676 00000323 75F5                    		jnz	short auxin_retn
  8677                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8678                                  
  8679                                  arbad:					
  8680 00000325 58                      		pop	ax		; remove return	address	(near call)
  8681 00000326 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8682 00000328 0CB0                    		or	al, 0B0h	; flag_rec_sig|	flag_dsr|flag_cts
  8683 0000032A E9AAFD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8684                                  
  8685                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8686                                  
  8687                                  ;************************************************************************
  8688                                  ;*									*
  8689                                  ;*	aux_rdnd - non-destructive aux port read			*
  8690                                  ;*									*
  8691                                  ;************************************************************************
  8692                                  
  8693                                  aux_rdnd:				; 2C7h:335h = 70h:28A5h

  8697 00000334 7511                    		jnz	short auxdrx	; then return character
  8698 00000336 E82100                  		call	auxstat		; if not, get status of	aux device

  8700 0000033C 740C                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8701 0000033E A820                    		test	al, 20h		; flag_dsr - test data set ready
  8702 00000340 7408                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8703 00000342 E8D6FF                  		call	auxin		; else aux is ready, get character
  8704 00000345 8807                    		mov	[bx], al
  8705                                  auxdrx:					
  8706 00000347 E9A7FE                  		jmp	rdexit		; return busy status
  8707                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8708                                  
  8709                                  auxbus:

  8722 00000352 74F6                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8723 00000354 F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; flag_tranhol_emp - test transmit hold	reg empty
  8724 00000357 74F1                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8725                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8726                                  		; cf=0	; (test instruction resets cf)
  8727                                  		;clc
  8728 00000359 C3                      		retn

  8730                                  
  8731                                  ;************************************************************************
  8732                                  ;*									*
  8733                                  ;*	auxstat - call rom bios to determine aux port status		*
  8734                                  ;*									*
  8735                                  ;*	exit:	ax = status						*
  8736                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
  8737                                  ;*									*
  8738                                  ;************************************************************************
  8739                                  
  8740                                  auxstat:				
  8741 0000035A B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; auxfunc_status
  8742                                  
  8743                                  		; fall into auxop
  8744                                  
  8745                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8746                                  
  8747                                  ;************************************************************************
  8748                                  ;*									*
  8749                                  ;*	auxop - perform rom-biox aux port interrupt			*
  8750                                  ;*									*
  8751                                  ;*	entry:	ah = int 14h function number				*
  8752                                  ;*	exit:	ax = results						*
  8753                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
  8754                                  ;*									*
  8755                                  ;************************************************************************
  8756                                  
  8757                                  auxop:		; proc near		
  8758 0000035C 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; ah=function code
  8759                                  					; 0=init, 1=send, 2=receive, 3=status
  8760                                  					; get port number
  8761 00000360 CD14                    		int	14h		; SERIAL I/O - GET USART STATUS
  8762                                  					; DX = port number (0-3)
  8763                                  					; Return: AX = port status code
  8764 00000362 C3                      		retn
  8765                                  
  8766                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8767                                  
  8768                                  ;************************************************************************
  8769                                  ;*									*
  8770                                  ;*	aux_flsh - flush aux input buffer - set contents of		*
  8771                                  ;*		   auxbuf [auxnum] to zero				*
  8772                                  ;*									*
  8773                                  ;*	cas - shouldn't this code call the rom bios input function	*
  8774                                  ;*	      repeatedly until it isn't ready?  to flush out any	*
  8775                                  ;*	      pending serial input queue if there's a tsr like MODE	*
  8776                                  ;*	      which is providing interrupt-buffering of aux port?	*
  8777                                  ;*									*
  8778                                  ;************************************************************************
  8779                                  
  8780                                  aux_flsh:				; 2C7h:36Ch = 70h:28DCh
  8781 00000363 E81C00                  		call	getbx		; flush	aux input buffer
  8782 00000366 C60700                  		mov	byte [bx], 0	; get bx to point to auxbuf
  8783                                  					; zero out buffer
  8784                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
  8785                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8786                                  		; cf=0 ('add' instruction in 'getbx')
  8787 00000369 C3                      		retn
  8788                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8789                                  
  8790                                  ;************************************************************************
  8791                                  ;*									*
  8792                                  ;*	aux_writ - write to aux device					*
  8793                                  ;*									*
  8794                                  ;************************************************************************
  8795                                  
  8796                                  aux_writ:				; 2C7h:374h = 70h:28E4h
  8797                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2	; write	to aux device (if cx > 0)
  8798 0000036A E3AD                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
  8799                                  aux_loop:				
  8800 0000036C 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to be written
  8801                                  					; move di pointer to next character
  8802 0000036F 47                      		inc	di

  8804 00000372 E8E7FF                  		call	auxop		; send character over aux port
  8805 00000375 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; check	for error
  8806 00000378 7405                    		jz	short awok	; then no error
  8807 0000037A B00A                    		mov	al, 10		; else indicate	write fault
  8808 0000037C E958FD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt	; call error routines
  8809                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8810                                  
  8811                                  awok:					
  8812 0000037F E2EB                    		loop	aux_loop	; if cx	is non-zero,
  8813                                  					; still	more character to print
  8814                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
  8815                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8816                                  		; cf=0 (test instruction above)	
  8817 00000381 C3                      		retn
  8818                                  
  8819                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8820                                  
  8821                                  ;************************************************************************

  8824                                  ;*		selected aux port ([auxnum])				*
  8825                                  ;*									*
  8826                                  ;************************************************************************
  8827                                  
  8828                                  getbx:

  8830                                  					; for selected aux port	([auxnum])

  8832 00000386 81C3[1600]              		add	bx, auxbuf	; 19/10/2022
  8833                                  		; 12/12/2022

  8835 0000038A C3                      		retn

  8838                                  
  8839                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8840                                  
  8841                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------
  8842                                  ;								:
  8843                                  ;		    clock device driver 			:
  8844                                  ;								:
  8845                                  ;								:
  8846                                  ;   this file contains the clock device driver. 		:
  8847                                  ;								:
  8848                                  ;   the routines in this files are:				:
  8849                                  ;								:
  8850                                  ;	routine 		function			:
  8851                                  ;	------- 		--------			:
  8852                                  ;	tim_writ		set the current time		:
  8853                                  ;	tim_read		read the current time		:
  8854                                  ;	time_to_ticks		convert time to corresponding	:
  8855                                  ;				  number of clock ticks 	:
  8856                                  ;								:
  8857                                  ; the clock ticks at the rate of:				:
  8858                                  ;								:
  8859                                  ;	1193180/65536 ticks/second (about 18.2 ticks per second):
  8860                                  ; see each routine for information on the use.			:
  8861                                  ;								:
  8862                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------
  8863                                  
  8864                                  ; convert time to ticks
  8865                                  ; input : time in cx and dx
  8866                                  ; ticks returned in cx:dx
  8867                                  
  8868                                  ;19/07/2019
  8869                                  ;09/03/2019
  8870                                  
  8871                                  time_to_ticks:				; 0070h:2906h =	02C7h:0396h
  8872                                  
  8873                                  ; first convert from hour,min,sec,hund. to
  8874                                  ; total number of 100th of seconds
  8875                                  
  8876 0000038B B03C                    		mov	al, 60
  8877 0000038D F6E5                    		mul	ch		; hours	to minutes
  8878 0000038F B500                    		mov	ch, 0
  8879 00000391 01C8                    		add	ax, cx		; total	minutes
  8880 00000393 B97017                  		mov	cx, 6000	; 60*100
  8881 00000396 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; get out of the way of	the multiply
  8882 00000398 F7E1                    		mul	cx		; convert to 1/100 sec
  8883 0000039A 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax
  8884 0000039C B064                    		mov	al, 100
  8885 0000039E F6E7                    		mul	bh		; convert seconds to 1/100 sec
  8886 000003A0 01C1                    		add	cx, ax		; combine seconds with hours and min
  8887 000003A2 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0		; ripple carry
  8888 000003A5 B700                    		mov	bh, 0
  8889 000003A7 01D9                    		add	cx, bx		; combine 1/100	sec
  8890 000003A9 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  8891                                  
  8892                                  	; dx:cx is time in 1/100 sec
  8893                                  
  8894 000003AC 92                      		xchg	ax, dx
  8895 000003AD 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; now time is in cx:ax
  8896 000003AE BB0BE9                  		mov	bx, 59659
  8897 000003B1 F7E3                    		mul	bx		; multiply low half
  8898 000003B3 87D1                    		xchg	dx, cx
  8899 000003B5 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; cx->ax, ax->dx, dx->cx
  8900 000003B6 F7E3                    		mul	bx		; multiply high	half
  8901 000003B8 01C8                    		add	ax, cx		; combine overlapping products
  8902 000003BA 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  8903 000003BD 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; ax:dx=time*59659
  8904 000003BE BB0500                  		mov	bx, 5
  8905 000003C1 F6F3                    		div	bl		; divide high half by 5
  8906 000003C3 88C1                    		mov	cl, al
  8907 000003C5 B500                    		mov	ch, 0
  8908 000003C7 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; remainder of divide-by-5
  8909 000003C9 98                      		cbw
  8910 000003CA 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; use it to extend low half
  8911 000003CB F7F3                    		div	bx		; divide low half by 5
  8912 000003CD 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax		; cx:dx	is now number of ticks in time
  8913 000003CF CB                      		retf			; far return
  8914                                  
  8915                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8916                                  
  8917                                  ; 17/10/2022
  8918                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8919                                  
  8920                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------
  8921                                  ;
  8922                                  ; tim_writ sets the current time
  8923                                  ;
  8924                                  ; on entry es:[di] has the current time:
  8925                                  ;
  8926                                  ;	number of days since 1-1-80	(word)
  8927                                  ;	minutes (0-59)			(byte)
  8928                                  ;	hours (0-23)			(byte)
  8929                                  ;	hundredths of seconds (0-99)	(byte)
  8930                                  ;	seconds (0-59)			(byte)
  8931                                  ;
  8932                                  ; each number has been checked for the correct range.
  8933                                  ;
  8934                                  ;	NOTE: Any changes in this routine probably require corresponding
  8935                                  ;	changes in the version that is built with the power manager driver.
  8936                                  ;	See ptime.asm.
  8937                                  ;
  8938                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------
  8939                                  
  8940                                  tim_writ:				; 2C7h:3DBh = 70h:294Bh
  8941 000003D0 268B05                  		mov	ax, [es:di]
  8942 000003D3 50                      		push	ax		; daycnt. we need to set this at the very
  8943                                  					; end to avoid tick windows.
  8944 000003D4 803E[F304]00            		cmp	byte [havecmosclock], 0
  8945                                  		;cmp	ds:havecmosclock, 0
  8946 000003D9 7426                    		jz	short no_cmos_1
  8947 000003DB 268A4503                		mov	al, [es:di+3]	; near indirect	calls
  8948                                  					; get binary hours
  8949                                  					; convert to bcd
  8950 000003DF FF1E[0205]              		call	far [bintobcd]
  8951                                  		;call	ds:bintobcd	; call far [bintobcd]
  8952 000003E3 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; ch = bcd hours
  8953 000003E5 268A4502                		mov	al, [es:di+2]	; get binary minutes
  8954 000003E9 FF1E[0205]              		call	far [bintobcd]
  8955                                  		;call	ds:bintobcd	; convert to bcd
  8956 000003ED 88C1                    		mov	cl, al		; cl = bcd minutes
  8957 000003EF 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; get binary seconds
  8958 000003F3 FF1E[0205]              		call	far [bintobcd]
  8959                                  		;call	ds:bintobcd
  8960 000003F7 88C6                    		mov	dh, al		; dh = bcd seconds
  8961 000003F9 B200                    		mov	dl, 0		; dl = 0 (st) or 1 (dst)
  8962 000003FB FA                      		cli
  8963 000003FC B403                    		mov	ah, 3
  8964 000003FE CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET REAL TIME	CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  8965                                  					; CH = hours in	BCD, CL	= minutes in BCD
  8966                                  					;  DH =	seconds	in BCD,DL = 01h	if daylight savings, 00h if standard time
  8967                                  					; Return: CMOS clock set
  8968 00000400 FB                      		sti
  8969                                  no_cmos_1:				
  8970 00000401 268B4D02                		mov	cx, [es:di+2]
  8971 00000405 268B5504                		mov	dx, [es:di+4]
  8972                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8973 00000409 FF1E[E206]              		call	far [ttticks]
  8974                                  		;call	dword ptr ds:ttticks ; call far	[ttticks]
  8975                                  					; convert time to ticks
  8976                                  					; cx:dx	now has	time in	ticks
  8977 0000040D FA                      		cli			; turn off timer
  8978 0000040E B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8979 00000410 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET TIME OF DAY
  8980                                  					; CX:DX	= clock	count
  8981                                  					; Return: time of day set
  8982                                  		;pop	ds:daycnt
  8983 00000412 8F06[F004]              		pop	word [daycnt]
  8984 00000416 FB                      		sti
  8985                                  		;cmp	ds:havecmosclock, 0
  8986 00000417 803E[F304]00            		cmp	byte [havecmosclock], 0
  8987 0000041C 740A                    		jz	short no_cmos_2
  8988 0000041E FF1E[0605]              		call	far [daycnttoday]
  8989                                  		;call	ds:daycnttoday	; call far [daycnttoday]
  8990                                  					; convert to bcd format
  8991 00000422 FA                      		cli
  8992 00000423 B405                    		mov	ah, 5
  8993 00000425 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET DATE IN REAL TIME	CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  8994                                  					; DL = day in BCD, DH =	month in BCD, CL = year	in BCD
  8995                                  					; CH = century (19h or 20h)
  8996                                  					; Return: CMOS clock set
  8997 00000427 FB                      		sti
  8998                                  no_cmos_2:
  8999                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9000                                  		; cf=0				
  9001                                  		;clc
  9002 00000428 C3                      		retn
  9003                                  
  9004                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9005                                  
  9006                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9007                                  
  9008                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9009                                  ; gettime reads date and time
  9010                                  ; and returns the following information:
  9011                                  ;
  9012                                  ;	es:[di]  =count of days since 1-1-80
  9013                                  ;	es:[di+2]=hours
  9014                                  ;	es:[di+3]=minutes
  9015                                  ;	es:[di+4]=seconds
  9016                                  ;	es:[di+5]=hundredths of seconds
  9017                                  ;
  9018                                  ;	NOTE:  Any changes in this routine probably require corresponding
  9019                                  ;	changes in the version that is built with the power manager driver.
  9020                                  ;	See ptime.asm.
  9021                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9022                                  
  9023                                  tim_read:				; 2C7h:435h = 70h:29A5h
  9024 00000429 E84E00                  		call	GetTickCnt
  9025 0000042C 8B36[F004]              		mov	si, [daycnt]
  9026                                  
  9027                                  ; we now need to convert the time in tick to the time in 100th of
  9028                                  ; seconds. the relation between tick and seconds is:
  9029                                  ;
  9030                                  ;		 65,536 seconds
  9031                                  ;	       ----------------
  9032                                  ;		1,193,180 tick
  9033                                  ;
  9034                                  ; to get to 100th of second we need to multiply by 100. the equation is:
  9035                                  ;
  9036                                  ;	ticks from clock  * 65,536 * 100
  9037                                  ;      --------------------------------- = time in 100th of seconds
  9038                                  ;		1,193,180
  9039                                  ;
  9040                                  ; fortunately this formula simplifies to:
  9041                                  ;
  9042                                  ;	ticks from clock * 5 * 65,536
  9043                                  ;      --------------------------------- = time in 100th of seconds
  9044                                  ;		59,659
  9045                                  ;
  9046                                  ; the calculation is done by first multipling tick by 5. next we divide by
  9047                                  ; 59,659. in this division we multiply by 65,536 by shifting the dividend
  9048                                  ; my 16 bits to the left.
  9049                                  ;
  9050                                  ; start with ticks in cx:dx
  9051                                  ; multiply by 5
  9052                                  
  9053 00000430 89C8                    		mov	ax, cx
  9054 00000432 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; start	with ticks in cx:dx
  9055                                  					; multiply by 5
  9056 00000434 D1E2                    		shl	dx, 1
  9057 00000436 D1D1                    		rcl	cx, 1		; times	2
  9058 00000438 D1E2                    		shl	dx, 1
  9059 0000043A D1D1                    		rcl	cx, 1		; times	4
  9060 0000043C 01DA                    		add	dx, bx
  9061 0000043E 11C8                    		adc	ax, cx		; times	5
  9062 00000440 92                      		xchg	ax, dx
  9063                                  
  9064                                  ; now have ticks * 5 in	dx:ax
  9065                                  ; we now need to multiply by 65536 and divide by 59659 d.
  9066                                  
  9067 00000441 B90BE9                  		mov	cx, 59659	; get divisor
  9068 00000444 F7F1                    		div	cx		; dx now has remainder
  9069                                  					; ax has high word of final quotient
  9070 00000446 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax		; put high word	in safe	place
  9071 00000448 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax		; this is the multiply by 65536
  9072 0000044A F7F1                    		div	cx		; bx:ax	now has	time in	100th of seconds
  9073                                  
  9074                                  ; rounding based on the	remainder may be added here
  9075                                  ; the result in	bx:ax is time in 1/100 second.
  9076                                  
  9077 0000044C 89DA                    		mov	dx, bx		
  9078 0000044E B9C800                  		mov	cx, 200		;extract 1/100's
  9079                                  
  9080                                  ; division by 200 is necessary to ensure no overflow--max result
  9081                                  ; is number of seconds in a day/2 = 43200.
  9082                                  
  9083 00000451 F7F1                    		div	cx
  9084 00000453 80FA64                  		cmp	dl, 100		; remainder over 100?
  9085 00000456 7203                    		jb	short noadj
  9086 00000458 80EA64                  		sub	dl, 100		; keep 1/100's less than 100
  9087                                  noadj:					
  9088 0000045B F5                      		cmc			; if we	subtracted 100,	carry is now set
  9089 0000045C 88D3                    		mov	bl, dl		; save 1/100's
  9090                                  
  9091                                  ; to compensate	for dividing by	200 instead of 100, we now multiply
  9092                                  ; by two, shifting a one in if the remainder had exceeded 100.
  9093                                  
  9094 0000045E D1D0                    		rcl	ax, 1		
  9095 00000460 B200                    		mov	dl, 0
  9096 00000462 D1D2                    		rcl	dx, 1
  9097 00000464 B93C00                  		mov	cx, 60		; divide out seconds
  9098 00000467 F7F1                    		div	cx
  9099 00000469 88D7                    		mov	bh, dl		; save the seconds
  9100 0000046B F6F1                    		div	cl		; break	into hours and minutes
  9101 0000046D 86C4                    		xchg	al, ah
  9102                                  
  9103                                  ; time is now in ax:bx (hours, minutes, seconds, 1/100 sec)
  9104                                  
  9105 0000046F 50                      		push	ax
  9106 00000470 89F0                    		mov	ax, si		; daycnt
  9107 00000472 AB                      		stosw
  9108 00000473 58                      		pop	ax
  9109 00000474 AB                      		stosw
  9110 00000475 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  9111 00000477 AB                      		stosw
  9112 00000478 F8                      		clc
  9113 00000479 C3                      		retn
  9114                                  
  9115                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9116                                  
  9117                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9118                                  
  9119                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9120                                  ;
  9121                                  ; procedure : GetTickCnt
  9122                                  ;
  9123                                  ;		Returns the tick count in CX:DX. Takes care of DayCnt in case
  9124                                  ;		of rollover [except when power management driver is in use]. 
  9125                                  ;		Uses the following logic for updating Daycnt
  9126                                  ;
  9127                                  ;		if ( rollover ) {
  9128                                  ;			if ( t_switch )
  9129                                  ;				daycnt++ ;
  9130                                  ;			else
  9131                                  ;				daycnt += rollover ;
  9132                                  ;		}
  9133                                  ;
  9134                                  ; USES : AX
  9135                                  ;
  9136                                  ; RETURNS : CX:DX - tick count
  9137                                  ; MODIFIES : daycnt
  9138                                  ;
  9139                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9140                                  
  9141                                  		; 17/10/2022
  9142                                  GetTickCnt:	
  9143 0000047A 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  9144 0000047C CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- GET TIME OF DAY
  9145                                  					; Return: CX:DX	= clock	count
  9146                                  					; AL = 00h if clock was	read or	written	(via AH=0,1) since the previous
  9147                                  					; midnight
  9148                                  					; Otherwise, AL	> 0
  9149 0000047E 803E[F204]00            		cmp	byte [t_switch], 0 ; use old method ? (>0 is yes)
  9150 00000483 7507                    		jnz	short inc_case	; old method assumes  that Int 1Ah returns rollover flag
  9151 00000485 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah		; new method assumes that Int 1Ah returns roll over count
  9152                                  					; and not flag
  9153 00000487 0106[F004]              		add	[daycnt], ax
  9154 0000048B C3                      		retn
  9155                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9156                                  
  9157                                  inc_case:				
  9158 0000048C 08C0                    		or	al, al
  9159 0000048E 7404                    		jz	short no_rollover
  9160 00000490 FF06[F004]              		inc	word [daycnt]
  9161                                  no_rollover:				
  9162 00000494 C3                      		retn
  9163

  9191                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------
  9192                                  ;	disk interface routines
  9193                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------
  9194                                  
  9195                                  ; device attribute bits:
  9196                                  ;	bit 6 - get/set map for logical drives and generic ioctl.
  9197                                  
  9198                                  ;MAXERR		equ	5
  9199                                  ;MAX_HD_FMT_ERR	equ	2
  9200                                  
  9201                                  ;LSTDRV	equ 504h
  9202                                  
  9203                                  ; some floppies do not have changeline. as a result, media-check would
  9204                                  ; normally return i-don't-know, the dos would continually reread the fat and
  9205                                  ; discard cached data. we optimize this by implementing a logical door-latch:
  9206                                  ; it is physically impossible to change a disk in under 2 seconds. we retain
  9207                                  ; the time of the last successful disk operation and compare it with the current
  9208                                  ; time during media-check. if < 2 seconds and at least 1 timer tick has passed,
  9209                                  ; the we say no change. if > 2 seconds then we say i-don't-know. finally, 
  9210                                  ; since we cannot trust the timer to be always available, we record the number 
  9211                                  ; of media checks that have occurred when no apparent time has elapsed. while
  9212                                  ; this number is < a given threshold, we say no change. when it exceeds that
  9213                                  ; threshold, we say i-don't-know and reset the counter to 0. when we store 
  9214                                  ; the time of last successful access, if we see that time has passed too,
  9215                                  ; we reset the counter.
  9216                                  
  9217                                  accessmax	equ	5
  9218                                  
  9219                                  ; due to various bogosities, we need to continually adjust what the head
  9220                                  ; settle time is.  the following algorithm is used:
  9221                                  ;
  9222                                  ;   get the current head settle value.
  9223                                  ;   if it is 0, then
  9224                                  ;	set slow = 15
  9225                                  ;   else
  9226                                  ;	set slow = value
  9227                                  ;   ...
  9228                                  ;*********************************************
  9229                                  ;************ old algorithm ******************
  9230                                  ;*   if we are seeking and writing then
  9231                                  ;*	 use slow
  9232                                  ;*   else
  9233                                  ;*	 use fast
  9234                                  ;*********************************************
  9235                                  ;*********** ibm's requested logic ***********
  9236                                  ;   if we are seeking and writing and not on an at then
  9237                                  ;	use slow
  9238                                  ;   else
  9239                                  ;	use fast
  9240                                  ;   ...
  9241                                  ;   restore current head settle value
  9242                                  ;
  9243                                  ;
  9244                                  ;---------------------------------------
  9245                                  multrk_on	equ	10000000b	;user spcified mutitrack=on, or system turns
  9246                                  					; it on after handling config.sys file as a
  9247                                  					; default value, if multrk_flag = multrk_off1.
  9248                                  multrk_off1	equ	00000000b	;initial value. no "multitrack=" command entered.
  9249                                  multrk_off2	equ	00000001b	;user specified multitrack=off.
  9250                                  
  9251                                  ; close data segment, open Bios_Code segment
  9252                                  
  9253                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9254                                  
  9255                                  ; BIOSCODE:04A2h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
  9256

  9259                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------
  9260

  9262

  9264                                  %if 0
  9265                                  
  9266                                  dsktbl:		db 26			; 2C7h:4A2h = 70h:2A12h
  9267                                  					; ((dtbl_siz-1)/2) ; this is the size of the table ; 26

  9331                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9332                                  ; setdrive scans through the data structure of bdss, and returns a pointer to
  9333                                  ; the one that belongs to the drive specified. carry is set if none exists
  9334                                  ; for the drive. Pointer is returned in es:[di]
  9335                                  ;
  9336                                  ;  AL contains the logical drive number.
  9337                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9338                                  
  9339                                  SetDrive:	
  9340                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds ; Point es:di to first bds	
  9341 000004CB C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; 19/10/2022
  9342                                  X_Scan_Loop:				
  9343 000004CF 26384505                		cmp	[es:di+5], al	
  9344 000004D3 7409                    		jz	short X_SetDrv
  9345 000004D5 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link] ; Go	to next	bds
  9346 000004D8 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
  9347 000004DB 75F2                    		jnz	short X_Scan_Loop
  9348 000004DD F9                      		stc
  9349                                  X_SetDrv:				
  9350 000004DE C3                      		retn
  9351

  9354                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9355                                  
  9356                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------
  9357                                  ; if id is f9, have a 96tpi disk else
  9358                                  ; if bit 2 is 0 then media is not removable and could not have changed
  9359                                  ;  otherwise if within 2 secs of last disk operation media could not
  9360                                  ;    have changed, otherwise dont know if media has changed
  9361                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------
  9362                                  
  9363                                  media_chk:				; 2C7h:4EBh = 70h:2A5Bh

  9365 000004E2 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1
  9366 000004E5 26F6452401              		test	byte [es:di+24h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags+1]
  9367                                  					; fchanged_by_format
  9368 000004EA 7416                    		jz	short WeAreNotFakingIt
  9369                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9370 000004EC 26806524FE              		and	byte [es:di+24h], 0FEh ; ~fchanged_by_format
