 10603 000009FC 26884404                		mov	[es:si+4], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_EOT]
 10604 00000A00 A0[2701]                		mov	al, [settlecurrent]
 10605 00000A03 8A26[2601]              		mov	ah, [motorstartup]
 10606 00000A07 26884409                		mov	[es:si+9], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 10607 00000A0B 26C6440302              		mov	byte [es:si+3], 2 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_SECTOR_SIZ]
 10608 00000A10 2688640A                		mov	[es:si+0Ah], ah	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_MOTOR_STRT]
 10609 00000A14 07                      		pop	es
 10610 00000A15 58                      		pop	ax
 10611                                  nodiddleback:				
 10612 00000A16 9D                      		popf
 10613                                  ddbx:					
 10614 00000A17 C3                      		retn
 10615                                  
 10616                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10617                                  
 10618                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10619                                  ;read the number of sectors specified in ax, 
 10620                                  ;handling track boundaries
 10621                                  ;es:di -> bds for this drive
 10622                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10623                                  
 10624                                  		 ; 19/10/2022
 10625                                  block:	
 10626 00000A18 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
 10627 00000A1A 74FB                    		jz	short ddbx
 10628 00000A1C 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 10629                                  					; fnon_removable
 10630 00000A21 740D                    		jz	short block_floppy ;
 10631                                  
 10632                                  ; check	to see if multi	track operation	is allowed. if not
 10633                                  ; we have to go	to the block_floppy below to break up the operation.
 10634                                  
 10635 00000A23 F606[2F05]80            		test	byte [multrk_flag], 80h
 10636                                  		;test	byte ptr ds:multrk_flag, 80h ; multrk_on
 10637 00000A28 7406                    		jz	short block_floppy
 10638 00000A2A E82900                  		call	Disk
 10639 00000A2D 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax
 10640 00000A2F C3                      		retn
 10641                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10642                                  
 10643                                  block_floppy:
 10644                                  
 10645                                  ; read at most 1 track worth. perform minimization at sector / track
 10646                                  				
 10647 00000A30 268A4D13                		mov	cl, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 10648 00000A34 FEC1                    		inc	cl
 10649 00000A36 2A0E[3101]              		sub	cl, [cursec]
 10650 00000A3A 30ED                    		xor	ch, ch
 10651 00000A3C 39C8                    		cmp	ax, cx
 10652 00000A3E 7302                    		jnb	short gotmin
 10653 00000A40 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax
 10654                                  
 10655                                  gotmin:
 10656                                  
 10657                                  ; ax is the requested number of sectors to read
 10658                                  ; cx is the number that we can do on this track
 10659                                  					
 10660 00000A42 50                      		push	ax
 10661 00000A43 51                      		push	cx
 10662 00000A44 89C8                    		mov	ax, cx
 10663 00000A46 E80D00                  		call	Disk
 10664 00000A49 59                      		pop	cx
 10665 00000A4A 58                      		pop	ax
 10666                                  
 10667                                  ; cx is the number of sectors just transferred
 10668                                  
 10669 00000A4B 29C8                    		sub	ax, cx		; reduce sectors-remaining by last i/o
 10670 00000A4D D0E1                    		shl	cl, 1
 10671 00000A4F 00CF                    		add	bh, cl		; adjust transfer address
 10672 00000A51 EBC5                    		jmp	short block
 10673                                  dskerr_brdg:				
 10674 00000A53 E9EC00                  		jmp	dskerr
 10675                                  
 10676                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10677                                  
 10678                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10679                                  
 10680                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10681                                  ;perform disk i/o with retries
 10682                                  ; al = number of sectors (1-8, all on one track)
 10683                                  ; es:di point to drive parameters
 10684                                  ; xfer_seg:bx = transfer address 
 10685                                  ;		(must not cross a 64k physical boundary)
 10686                                  ; [rflag] = 2 if read, 3 if write
 10687                                  ; [verify] = 0 for normal, 1 for verify after write
 10688                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10689                                  
 10690                                  		 ; 19/10/2022
 10691                                  Disk:
 10692                                  
 10693                                  ; Check for hard disk format and
 10694                                  ; if TRUE then set max error count to 2
 10695                                  
 10696 00000A56 BD0500                  		mov	bp, 5		; MAXERR
 10697                                  					; set up retry count
 10698 00000A59 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1	;
 10699                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fnon_removable
 10700 00000A5E 7408                    		jz	short GetRdWrInd
 10701 00000A60 80FC04                  		cmp	ah, 4		; romverify ; Is this a	track verify?
 10702 00000A63 7403                    		jz	short GetRdWrInd
 10703 00000A65 BD0200                  		mov	bp, 2		; This is not verify so only 1 retry
 10704                                  GetRdWrInd:				
 10705 00000A68 892E[3205]              		mov	[vretry_cnt], bp ; verify op. retry cnt for write-verify
 10706 00000A6C 892E[3405]              		mov	[soft_ecc_cnt], bp ; soft ecc error retry count.
 10707 00000A70 8A26[2001]              		mov	ah, [rflag]	; get read/write indicator
 10708                                  ;retry:
 10709                                  ; 09/12/2022
 10710                                  _retry:					
 10711 00000A74 50                      		push	ax
 10712 00000A75 8B16[3301]              		mov	dx, [curtrk]
 10713 00000A79 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 10714 00000A7E 740B                    		jz	short disk_not_mini
 10715 00000A80 26837D4701              		cmp	word [es:di+47h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.bdsm_ismini]
 10716                                  					; is this a mini disk? ((logical dos partition))
 10717 00000A85 7504                    		jnz	short disk_not_mini ; no. continue to next.
 10718 00000A87 26035549                		add	dx, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.bdsm_hidden_trks]
 10719                                  					; add hidden trks.
 10720                                  disk_not_mini:				
 10721 00000A8B D0CE                    		ror	dh, 1
 10722 00000A8D D0CE                    		ror	dh, 1
 10723 00000A8F 0A36[3101]              		or	dh, [cursec]
 10724 00000A93 89D1                    		mov	cx, dx
 10725 00000A95 86E9                    		xchg	ch, cl		;  cl =	sector,	ch = cylinder
 10726 00000A97 8A36[3201]              		mov	dh, [curhd]	; load current head number and
 10727 00000A9B 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; physical drive number
 10728                                  					; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 10729 00000A9F 26807D2205              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 5 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffHardFile
 10730 00000AA4 7413                    		jz	short do_fast	; hard files use fast speed
 10731                                  
 10732                                  ; if we have [step_drv] set to -1, we use the slow settle time.
 10733                                  ; this helps when we have just done a reset disk operation and the head has
 10734                                  ; been moved to another cylinder - the problem crops up with 3.5" drives.
 10735                                  
 10736 00000AA6 803E[7600]FF            		cmp	byte [step_drv], 0FFh ; -1
 10737 00000AAB 740A                    		jz	short do_writej
 10738 00000AAD 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2		; romread
 10739 00000AB0 7407                    		jz	short do_fast
 10740 00000AB2 80FC04                  		cmp	ah, 4		; romverify
 10741 00000AB5 7402                    		jz	short do_fast
 10742                                  do_writej:	
 10743                                  
 10744                                  ; reads always fast, unless we have just done a disk reset operation
 10745                                  			
 10746 00000AB7 EB56                    		jmp	short do_write	; reads	always fast
 10747                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10748                                  
 10749                                  do_fast:				
 10750 00000AB9 E8FC00                  		call	fastspeed	; change settle	mode
 10751                                  
 10752                                  testerr:				
 10753 00000ABC 7295                    		jb	short dskerr_brdg
 10754                                  
 10755                                  ; set drive and track of last access
 10756                                  
 10757 00000ABE 8816[7600]              		mov	[step_drv], dl
 10758 00000AC2 26886D46                		mov	[es:di+46h], ch	; [es:di+BDS.track]
 10759                                  no_set:
 10760                                  		;cmp	word [wrtverify], 103h
 10761 00000AC6 813E[2001]0301          		cmp	word [rflag], 103h ; check for write and verify
 10762 00000ACC 7452                    		jz	short doverify
 10763                                  noverify:				
 10764 00000ACE 58                      		pop	ax
 10765                                  
 10766                                  ; check the flags word in the bds to see if the drive is non removable
 10767                                  ; if not we needn't do anything special
 10768                                  ; if it is a hard disk then check to see if multi-track operation
 10769                                  ; is specified. if specified we don't have to calculate for the next
 10770                                  ; track since we are already done. so we can go to the exit of this routine.
 10771                                  
 10772 00000ACF 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 10773                                  					; fnon_removable
 10774 00000AD4 7407                    		jz	short its_removable
 10775 00000AD6 F606[2F05]80            		test	byte [multrk_flag], 80h ; multrk_on
 10776 00000ADB 7530                    		jnz	short disk_ret
 10777                                  its_removable:				
 10778 00000ADD 80E13F                  		and	cl, 3Fh		; eliminate cylinder bits from sector
 10779 00000AE0 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
 10780 00000AE2 2906[2201]              		sub	[seccnt], ax	; reduce count of sectors to go	next sector
 10781 00000AE6 00C1                    		add	cl, al
 10782 00000AE8 880E[3101]              		mov	[cursec], cl
 10783 00000AEC 263A4D13                		cmp	cl, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 10784                                  					; see if sector/track limit reached
 10785 00000AF0 761B                    		jbe	short disk_ret
 10786 00000AF2 C606[3101]01            		mov	byte [cursec], 1 ; start with first sector of next track
 10787 00000AF7 8A36[3201]              		mov	dh, [curhd]
 10788 00000AFB FEC6                    		inc	dh
 10789 00000AFD 263A7515                		cmp	dh, [es:di+15h]	; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 10790 00000B01 7206                    		jb	short noxor
 10791 00000B03 30F6                    		xor	dh, dh
 10792 00000B05 FF06[3301]              		inc	word [curtrk]
 10793                                  noxor:					
 10794 00000B09 8836[3201]              		mov	[curhd], dh
 10795                                  disk_ret:				
 10796 00000B0D F8                      		clc
 10797 00000B0E C3                      		retn
 10798                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10799                                  
 10800                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10801                                  
 10802                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10803                                  ; the request is for write. determine if we are talking about
 10804                                  ; the same track and drive. if so, use the fast speed.
 10805                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10806                                  
 10807                                  do_write:				
 10808 00000B0F 3A16[7600]              		cmp	dl, [step_drv]
 10809 00000B13 7506                    		jnz	short do_norm	; we have changed drives
 10810 00000B15 263A6D46                		cmp	ch, [es:di+46h]	; [es:di+BDS.track]
 10811 00000B19 749E                    		jz	short do_fast	; we are still on the same track
 10812                                  
 10813                                  do_norm:				
 10814 00000B1B E87500                  		call	normspeed
 10815 00000B1E EB9C                    		jmp	short testerr
 10816                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10817                                  
 10818                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10819                                  ; we have a verify request also. get state info and go verify
 10820                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10821                                  
 10822                                  doverify:				
 10823 00000B20 58                      		pop	ax
 10824 00000B21 50                      		push	ax
 10825 00000B22 B404                    		mov	ah, 4
 10826 00000B24 E89100                  		call	fastspeed
 10827 00000B27 73A5                    		jnb	short noverify
 10828                                  
 10829                                  ; check the error returned in ah to see if it is a soft ecc error.
 10830                                  ; if it is not we needn't do anything special. if it is a soft
 10831                                  ; ecc error then decrement the soft_ecc_cnt error retry count. if
 10832                                  ; this retry count becomes 0 then we just ignore the error and go to
 10833                                  ; no_verify but if we can still try then we call the routine to reset
 10834                                  ; the disk and go to dskerr1 to retry the operation.
 10835                                  
 10836 00000B29 80FC11                  		cmp	ah, 11h		; soft ecc error ?
 10837 00000B2C 750B                    		jnz	short not_softecc_err
 10838 00000B2E FF0E[3405]              		dec	word [soft_ecc_cnt]
 10839 00000B32 749A                    		jz	short noverify	; no more retry
 10840 00000B34 E84405                  		call	ResetDisk	; reset	disk
 10841 00000B37 EB3E                    		jmp	short dskerr1	; retry
 10842                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10843                                  
 10844                                  not_softecc_err:			; other error.			
 10845 00000B39 E83F05                  		call	ResetDisk
 10846 00000B3C FF0E[3205]              		dec	word [vretry_cnt]
 10847 00000B40 EB1C                    		jmp	short dskerr0
 10848                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10849                                  
 10850                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10851                                  ; need to special case the change-line error ah=06h.
 10852                                  ; if we get this, we need to return it.
 10853                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10854                                  
 10855                                  dskerr:					
 10856 00000B42 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0	; do we	have changeline	support?
 10857 00000B47 7403                    		jz	short dskerr_nochangeline ; brif not
 10858 00000B49 E8220D                  		call	checkio
 10859                                  dskerr_nochangeline:			
 10860 00000B4C 803E[3605]01            		cmp	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 1 ; multi trk format request?
 10861 00000B51 7508                    		jnz	short dochkagain ; no more retry.
 10862 00000B53 BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1
 10863 00000B56 C606[3605]00            		mov	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 0 ; clear the flag.
 10864                                  dochkagain:				
 10865 00000B5B E8AA00                  		call	again
 10866                                  dskerr0:				
 10867 00000B5E 7420                    		jz	short harderr
 10868 00000B60 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 10869                                  					; fnon_removable
 10870 00000B65 7505                    		jnz	short skip_timeout_chk
 10871 00000B67 80FC80                  		cmp	ah, 80h		; timeout?
 10872 00000B6A 7414                    		jz	short harderr
 10873                                  skip_timeout_chk:			
 10874 00000B6C 80FCCC                  		cmp	ah, 0CCh	; write	fault error?
 10875 00000B6F 740A                    		jz	short write_fault_err ;	then, don't retry.
 10876 00000B71 C706[3405]0500          		mov	word [soft_ecc_cnt], 5 ; MAXERR
 10877                                  					; set soft_ecc_cnt back	to maxerr
 10878                                  dskerr1:				
 10879 00000B77 58                      		pop	ax		; restore sector count
 10880                                  		;jmp	retry
 10881                                  		; 09/12/2022
 10882 00000B78 E9F9FE                  		jmp	_retry
 10883                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10884                                  
 10885                                  write_fault_err:			
 10886 00000B7B BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1		; just retry only once
 10887                                  					; for write fault error.
 10888 00000B7E EBF7                    		jmp	short dskerr1
 10889                                  
 10890                                  		; fall into harderr
 10891                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10892                                  
 10893                                  ; entry point for routines that call maperror themselves
 10894                                  
 10895                                  harderr:				
 10896 00000B80 E84D00                  		call	maperror
 10897                                  harderr2:				
 10898 00000B83 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 10899                                  					; force a media check through rom
 10900 00000B88 8B0E[2201]              		mov	cx, [seccnt]	; get count of sectors to go
 10901 00000B8C 8B26[3501]              		mov	sp, [spsav]	; recover entry	stack pointer
 10902                                  
 10903                                  ; since we are performing a non-local goto, restore the disk parameters
 10904                                  
 10905                                  		;jmp	diddleback
 10906                                  		; 09/12/2022
 10907 00000B90 E958FE                  		jmp	diddle_back
 10908                                  
 10909                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10910                                  
 10911                                  ; change settle value from settlecurrent to whatever is appropriate
 10912                                  ; note that this routine is never called for a fixed disk.
 10913                                  
 10914                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10915                                  normspeed:
 10916 00000B93 803E[3806]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 10917 00000B98 751E                    		jnz	short fastspeed
 10918 00000B9A 06                      		push	es
 10919 00000B9B 50                      		push	ax
 10920 00000B9C A0[2801]                		mov	al, [settleslow]
 10921 00000B9F C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]	; current disk parm table
 10922 00000BA3 26884409                		mov	[es:si+9], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 10923 00000BA7 58                      		pop	ax
 10924 00000BA8 07                      		pop	es
 10925 00000BA9 E80C00                  		call	fastspeed
 10926 00000BAC 06                      		push	es
 10927 00000BAD C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]
 10928 00000BB1 26C6440901              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 1 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 10929                                  					; 1 is fast settle value
 10930 00000BB6 07                      		pop	es
 10931 00000BB7 C3                      		retn
 10932                                  
 10933                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10934                                  
 10935                                  ; if the drive has been marked as too big (i.e. starting sector of the
 10936                                  ; partition is > 16 bits, then always return drive not ready.
 10937                                  
 10938                                  fastspeed:		
 10939 00000BB8 26F6451F80              		test	byte [es:di+1Fh], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.fatsiz]
 10940                                  					; ftoobig
 10941 00000BBD 750D                    		jnz	short notready
 10942 00000BBF 06                      		push	es
 10943 00000BC0 8E06[3705]              		mov	es, [xfer_seg]
 10944 00000BC4 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 10945 00000BC6 8C06[3705]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es
 10946 00000BCA 07                      		pop	es
 10947 00000BCB C3                      		retn
 10948                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10949                                  
 10950                                  notready:				
 10951 00000BCC F9                      		stc
 10952 00000BCD B480                    		mov	ah, 80h
 10953 00000BCF C3                      		retn
 10954                                  
 10955                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10956                                  
 10957                                  ; map error returned by rom in ah into corresponding code to be returned to
 10958                                  ; dos in al. trashes di. guaranteed to set carry.
 10959                                  
 10960                                  maperror:	
 10961 00000BD0 51                      		push	cx
 10962 00000BD1 06                      		push	es
 10963 00000BD2 1E                      		push	ds		; set es=Bios_Data
 10964 00000BD3 07                      		pop	es
 10965 00000BD4 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; put error code in al
 10966 00000BD6 A2[4401]                		mov	[lsterr], al	; terminate list with error code
 10967 00000BD9 B90900                  		mov	cx, 9		; numerr (= errout-errin)
 10968                                  					; number of possible error conditions
 10969 00000BDC BF[3C01]                		mov	di, errin	; point to error conditions
 10970 00000BDF F2AE                    		repne scasb
 10971                                  		; 10/12/2022
 10972 00000BE1 8A4508                  		mov	al, [di+8]	; [di+numerr-1]
 10973                                  					; get translation
 10974                                  		; 19/10/2022 - Temporary ! 
 10975                                  		;db	8Ah, 85h, 8, 0	; mov al, [di+8]
 10976 00000BE4 07                      		pop	es
 10977 00000BE5 59                      		pop	cx
 10978 00000BE6 F9                      		stc			; flag error condition
 10979 00000BE7 C3                      		retn
 10980                                  
 10981                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10982                                  
 10983                                  ; set the time of last access for this drive.
 10984                                  ; this is done only for removable media. es:di -> bds
 10985                                  
 10986                                  set_tim:		
 10987 00000BE8 50                      		push	ax
 10988 00000BE9 E88EF8                  		call	GetTickCnt	; Does INT 1A ah=0 & updates daycnt
 10989                                  
 10990                                  ; we have the new time. if we see that the time has passed,
 10991                                  ; then we reset the threshold counter...
 10992                                  
 10993 00000BEC 263B5547                		cmp	dx, [es:di+47h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 10994 00000BF0 7506                    		jnz	short setaccess
 10995 00000BF2 263B4D49                		cmp	cx, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 10996                                  		;jz	short done_set
 10997                                  		; 12/12/2022
 10998 00000BF6 740E                    		je	short done_set2
 10999                                  setaccess:				
 11000 00000BF8 C606[1D01]00            		mov	byte [accesscount], 0
 11001 00000BFD 26895547                		mov	[es:di+47h], dx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 11002 00000C01 26894D49                		mov	[es:di+49h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 11003                                  done_set:				
 11004 00000C05 F8                      		clc
 11005                                  done_set2:		; 12/12/2022
 11006 00000C06 58                      		pop	ax
 11007 00000C07 C3                      		retn
 11008                                  
 11009                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11010                                  
 11011                                  ; this routine is called if an error occurs while formatting or verifying.
 11012                                  ; it resets the drive,and decrements the retry count.
 11013                                  ; on entry - ds:di - points to bds for the drive
 11014                                  ;	     bp    - contains retry count
 11015                                  ; on exit    flags indicate result of decrementing retry count
 11016                                  
 11017                                  again:	
 11018 00000C08 E87004                  		call	ResetDisk
 11019 00000C0B 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 11020 00000C0E 7402                    		jz	short dont_dec_retry_count ; If	it is a	media change error
 11021                                  					; do not decrement retry count.
 11022 00000C10 4D                      		dec	bp		; decrement retry count
 11023 00000C11 C3                      		retn
 11024                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11025                                  
 11026                                  dont_dec_retry_count:			
 11027 00000C12 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 11028 00000C14 C3                      		retn
 11029

 11039                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11040                                  ;
 11041                                  ; NOTE: GetAccessFlag/SetAccessFlag is unpublished function.
 11042                                  ;
 11043                                  ;      This function is intended to give the user to control the
 11044                                  ;      bds table flags of unformatted_media bit.
 11045                                  ;      GetAccessFlag will show the status -
 11046                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 disk i/o not allowed
 11047                                  ;						1 disk i/o allowed
 11048                                  ;      SetAccessFlag will set/reset the unformatted_media bit in flags -
 11049                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 allow disk i/o
 11050                                  ;						1 disallow disk i/o

 11134                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11135                                  ; Do_Generic_IOCtl: perform generic ioctl request
 11136                                  ;
 11137                                  ;    input: AL contains logical drive
 11138                                  ;
 11139                                  ;	functions are dispatched through a call. On return, carry indicates
 11140                                  ;	error code in al. Note::bES:b& ds undefined on return from
 11141                                  ;	subfunctions.
 11142                                  ;
 11143                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11144                                  
 11145                                  ; 11/03/2019
 11146                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11147                                  do_generic_ioctl:			; 2C7h:0C6Bh = 70h:31DBh
 11148 00000C45 E883F8                  		call	SetDrive	; ES:DI	Points to bds for drive
 11149 00000C48 06                      		push	es
 11150 00000C49 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	Points to request header
 11151 00000C4D 26807F0D08              		cmp	byte [es:bx+0Dh], 8 ; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 11152                                  					; RAWIO
 11153 00000C52 268A470E                		mov	al, [es:bx+0Eh]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
 11154 00000C56 07                      		pop	es
 11155 00000C57 7525                    		jnz	short IoctlFuncErr
 11156                                  
 11157                                  		; cas note: Could do the above two blocks in reverse order.
 11158                                  		; Would have to preserve al for SetDrive
 11159                                  
 11160                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11161 00000C59 BE[160C]                		mov	si, IoReadJumpTable
 11162                                  		;mov	si, 0C3Ch	; IoReadJumpTable
 11163                                  					; at 2C7h:0C3Ch	= 70h:31ACh
 11164 00000C5C A820                    		test	al, 20h		; GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; test of req. function
 11165 00000C5E 7503                    		jnz	short NotGenericWrite ; function is a read.
 11166                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11167 00000C60 BE[290C]                		mov	si, IoWriteJumpTable
 11168                                  		;mov	si, 0C4Fh	; IoWriteJumpTable
 11169                                  					; at 2C7h:0C4Fh	= 70h:31BFh
 11170                                  NotGenericWrite:			
 11171 00000C63 24DF                    		and	al, 0DFh	; ~GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; get rid of read/write bit
 11172 00000C65 2C40                    		sub	al, 40h		; offset for base function
 11173 00000C67 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, [cs:si]
 11174 00000C6A 7712                    		ja	short IoctlFuncErr
 11175 00000C6C 98                      		cbw
 11176 00000C6D D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 11177 00000C6F 46                      		inc	si
 11178 00000C70 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 11179 00000C72 2EFF14                  		call	near [cs:si]
 11180                                  		;call	word ptr cs:[si]
 11181 00000C75 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 11182                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 11183                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 11184 00000C7A B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Return this status in	case of	carry
 11185 00000C7C C3                      		retn			; Pass carry flag through to exit code
 11186                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11187                                  
 11188                                  		; Cmd_Error_Proc is called as a procedure and also use
 11189                                  		; as a fall through from above
 11190                                  Cmd_Error_Proc:				; 2C7h:0CA3h = 70h:3213h
 11191 00000C7D 5A                      		pop	dx

 11200                                  ;**	GetDeviceParameters:
 11201                                  ;
 11202                                  ;	GetDeviceParameters implements the generic ioctl function:
 11203                                  ;	majorcode=RAWIO, minorcode=GetDeviceParameters (60h)
 11204                                  ;
 11205                                  ;	ENTRY	(ES:di) = BDS for drive
 11206                                  ;		PtrSav = long pointer to request header
 11207                                  ;	EXIT	??? BUGBUG
 11208                                  ;	USES	??? BUGBUG

 11212                                  GetDeviceParameters:
 11213                                  		; Copy info from bds to the device parameters packet
 11214

 11217                                  					; (DS:BX) = return buffer

 11220 00000C8F 268B4523                		mov	ax, [es:di+35]	; [es:di+BDS.flags]

 11222                                  					; Mask off other bits

 11227 00000CA2 884706                  		mov	[bx+6],	al	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_MEDIATYPE]
 11228                                  					
 11229                                  		; copy recommended bpb
 11230 00000CA5 8D7527                  		lea	si, [di+39]	; [di+BDS.rbytespersec]	= [di+BDS.R_BPB]

 11244                                  					; Use this subfield of bds instead
 11245                                  UseBpbPresent:

 11418                                  
 11419                                  ; 16/10/2022
 11420                                  
 11421                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11422                                  ; FormatTrack:
 11423                                  ; if specialfunction byte is 1,then this is a status call to see if there is
 11424                                  ; rom support for the combination of sec/trk and # of cyln,and if the
 11425                                  ; combination is legal. if specialfunction byte is 0,then format the track.
 11426                                  ;
 11427                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 11428                                  ;
 11429                                  ; output:
 11430                                  ;	for status call:
 11431                                  ;	specialfunction byte set to:
 11432                                  ;		0 - rom support + legal combination
 11433                                  ;		1 - no rom support
 11434                                  ;		2 - illegal combination
 11435                                  ;		3 - no media present
 11436                                  ;	carry cleared.
 11437                                  ;
 11438                                  ;	for format track:
 11439                                  ;		carry set if error
 11440                                  ;
 11441                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11442                                  
 11443                                  ; 16/03/2019
 11444                                  
 11445                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11446                                  FormatTrack:
 11447 00000D97 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 11448 00000D9B C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET

 11592                                  
 11593                                  		; Check specialfunctions to see if DO_FAST_FORMAT has been
 11594                                  		; specified if not we should go to the normal track verification
 11595                                  		; routine. If fast format has been specified we should get the
 11596                                  		; number of tracks to be verified and check it to see if it is
 11597                                  		; > 255. If it is then it is an error and we should go to
 11598                                  		; VerifyTrack_Err. If not multiply the number of tracks by the
 11599                                  		; sectors per track to get the total number of sectors to be
 11600                                  		; verified. This should also be less than equal to 255
 11601                                  		; otherwise we go to same error exit. If everything is okay
 11602                                  		; we initalise cx to the total sectors. use ax as a temporary
 11603                                  		; register.
 11604

 11704                                  		; Fall into TrackIo

 11706                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11707                                  
 11708                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 11709                                  
 11710                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11711                                  ;
 11712                                  ; TrackIo:
 11713                                  ;    performs track read/write/verify
 11714                                  ;
 11715                                  ;   input:
 11716                                  ;      rFlag	- 2 = read
 11717                                  ;		  3 = write
 11718                                  ;		  4 = verify
 11719                                  ;      AX	- Index into track table of first sector to io
 11720                                  ;      CX	- Number of sectors to io
 11721                                  ;      Xfer_Seg:BX - Transfer address
 11722                                  ;      ES:DI	- Pointer to bds
 11723                                  ;      CurTrk	- Current cylinder
 11724                                  ;      CurHd	- Current head
 11725                                  ;
 11726                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11727                                  
 11728                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 11729                                  		
 11730                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11731                                  TrackIo:	
 11732                                  					; Procedure `disk' will pop stack to
 11733 00000EF0 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; SpSav	and return if error
 11734 00000EF4 E844F9                  		call	checksingle	; Ensure correct disk is in drv
 11735 00000EF7 803E[3806]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 11736                                  					; See if we have already set	disk
 11737 00000EFC 7407                    		jz	short Dptalreadyset ; base table
 11738 00000EFE 50                      		push	ax		; set up tables	and variables for i/o
 11739 00000EFF 51                      		push	cx
 11740 00000F00 E896FA                  		call	iosetup
 11741 00000F03 59                      		pop	cx
 11742 00000F04 58                      		pop	ax
 11743                                  Dptalreadyset:				; Point si at the table entry of the			
 11744 00000F05 BE[3B05]                		mov	si, tracktable	; first sector to be io'd
 11745 00000F08 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 11746 00000F0A D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 11747 00000F0C 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 11748                                  
 11749                                  		; WE WANT:
 11750                                  		; CX to	be the number of times we have to loop
 11751                                  		; DX to	be the number of sectors we read on each iteration
 11752                                  		
 11753 00000F0E BA0100                  		mov	dx, 1
 11754                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11755 00000F11 26F6452308              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 8
 11756                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 8 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11757                                  					; good_tracklayout
 11758 00000F16 7402                    		jz	short ionextsector
 11759                                  		
 11760 00000F18 87D1                    		xchg	dx, cx		; HEY! We can read all secs in one blow
 11761                                  ionextsector:				
 11762 00000F1A 51                      		push	cx
 11763 00000F1B 52                      		push	dx
 11764 00000F1C 46                      		inc	si
 11765 00000F1D 46                      		inc	si		; Skip over the	cylinder and head in
 11766                                  					; the track table
 11767 00000F1E AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector ID	from track table
 11768 00000F1F A2[3101]                		mov	[cursec], al
 11769                                  
 11770                                  		; assumptions for a fixed disk multi-track disk	i/o
 11771                                  		; 1). In the input CX (# of sectors to go) to TrackIo,
 11772                                  		;     only CL is valid.
 11773                                  		; 2). Sector size should be set	to 512 bytes.
 11774                                  		; 3). Good track layout
 11775                                  		
 11776                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11777 00000F22 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 11778                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11779                                  					; fnon_removable ; Fixed disk?
 11780 00000F27 7414                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No
 11781                                  		; 12/12/2022

 11783                                  		;test	word [multrk_flag], 80h ; MULTI_TRK_ON
 11784                                  						; Allow multi-track operation?
 11785 00000F2E 740D                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No,don't do that.
 11786 00000F30 8916[2201]              		mov	[seccnt], dx
 11787 00000F34 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
 11788 00000F36 E81DFB                  		call	Disk
 11789 00000F39 5A                      		pop	dx
 11790 00000F3A 59                      		pop	cx
 11791 00000F3B F8                      		clc
 11792 00000F3C C3                      		retn
 11793                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11794                                  
 11795                                  IoRemovable:				
 11796 00000F3D AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector size index	from track
 11797                                  					; table	and save it
 11798 00000F3E 50                      		push	ax
 11799 00000F3F 56                      		push	si
 11800 00000F40 1E                      		push	ds		; Save Bios_Data
 11801 00000F41 50                      		push	ax

 11803                                  					; Fetch	EOT while ds-> Bios_Data
 11804 00000F46 C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 11805 00000F4A 884403                  		mov	[si+3],	al	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_SECTOR_SIZ]
 11806 00000F4D 886404                  		mov	[si+4],	ah	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_EOT]
 11807 00000F50 58                      		pop	ax
 11808 00000F51 1F                      		pop	ds
 11809 00000F52 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 11810 00000F54 A3[2201]                		mov	[seccnt], ax
 11811 00000F57 E8FCFA                  		call	Disk
 11812 00000F5A 5E                      		pop	si		; Advance buffer pointer by adding
 11813                                  					; sector size
 11814 00000F5B 58                      		pop	ax
 11815 00000F5C E81D00                  		call	SectorSizeIndexToSectorSize
 11816 00000F5F 01C3                    		add	bx, ax
 11817 00000F61 5A                      		pop	dx
 11818 00000F62 59                      		pop	cx
 11819 00000F63 E2B5                    		loop	ionextsector
 11820 00000F65 803E[3806]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 11821                                  		;jz	short NoNeedDone
 11822                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11823 00000F6A 7404                    		je	short NoNeedDone2
 11824 00000F6C E872FA                  		call	done		; set time of last access, and reset
 11825                                  					; entries in Dpt.
 11826                                  NoNeedDone:				
 11827 00000F6F F8                      		clc
 11828                                  NoNeedDone2:
 11829 00000F70 C3                      		retn
 11830                                  
 11831                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11832                                  
 11833                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11834                                  ;
 11835                                  ; The sector size in bytes needs to be converted to an index value for the ibm
 11836                                  ; rom. (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024). It is assumed that only these values
 11837                                  ; are permissible.
 11838                                  ;
 11839                                  ; On Input   AX contains sector size in bytes
 11840                                  ; On Output  AL Contains index
 11841                                  ; All other registers preserved
 11842                                  ;
 11843                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11844                                  
 11845                                  SectSizeToSectIndex:	
 11846 00000F71 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2		; (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024)
 11847                                  					; examine upper	byte only
 11848 00000F74 7703                    		ja	short OneK
 11849 00000F76 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; value	in AH is the index!
 11850 00000F78 C3                      		retn
 11851                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11852                                  
 11853                                  OneK:					
 11854 00000F79 B003                    		mov	al, 3
 11855 00000F7B C3                      		retn
 11856                                  
 11857                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11858                                  
 11859                                  
 11860                                  SectorSizeIndexToSectorSize:
 11861 00000F7C 88C1                    		mov	cl, al
 11862 00000F7E B88000                  		mov	ax, 128
 11863 00000F81 D3E0                    		shl	ax, cl
 11864 00000F83 C3                      		retn

 11871                                  ;
 11872                                  ; SetDASD
 11873                                  ;
 11874                                  ; Set up the rom for formatting.
 11875                                  ; we have to tell the rom bios what type of disk is in the drive.
 11876                                  ;
 11877                                  ; On Input   - ES:di - Points to bds

 11882                                  SetDasd:

 11887 00000F8B 26F6452380              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 80h
 11888                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11889                                  					; set_dasd_true
 11890 00000F90 744A                    		jz	short DasdHasBeenSet
 11891                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11892 00000F92 268065237F              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 7Fh
 11893                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FF7Fh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11894                                  					; ~set_dasd_true
 11895                                  DoSetDasd:				
 11896 00000F97 C606[3906]00            		mov	byte [had_format_error], 0 ; Reset it
 11897 00000F9C C606[3B01]50            		mov	byte [gap_patch], 50h ; Format gap for 48tpi disks
 11898 00000FA1 B004                    		mov	al, 4
 11899 00000FA3 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 11900                                  					; DEV_3INCH720KB
 11901 00000FA8 741A                    		jz	short DoSet
 11902 00000FAA 26807D2201              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 11903                                  					; DEV_5INCH96TPI
 11904 00000FAF 7404                    		jz	short GotBig
 11905 00000FB1 B001                    		mov	al, 1
 11906 00000FB3 EB0F                    		jmp	short DoSet
 11907                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11908                                  
 11909                                  GotBig:					
 11910 00000FB5 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; 160/320k in a	1.2 meg	drive
 11911 00000FB7 803E[3706]00            		cmp	byte [mediatype], 0
 11912 00000FBC 7506                    		jnz	short DoSet
 11913                                  		;mov	al, 3		; 1.2meg in a 1.2meg drive
 11914                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11915                                  		;inc	al  ; al = 3
 11916                                  		; 18/12/2022

 11918 00000FBF C606[3B01]54            		mov	byte [gap_patch], 54h
 11919                                  DoSet:					
 11920 00000FC4 1E                      		push	ds
 11921 00000FC5 56                      		push	si
 11922 00000FC6 8E1E[1A00]              		mov	ds, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vectors
 11923                                  
 11924 00000FCA C5367800                		lds	si, [DSKADR]
 11925                                  		;lds	si, [78h]	; [DSKADR]  (Int 1Eh)
 11926                                  		;;lds	si, ds:78h		
 11927                                  
 11928 00000FCE C644090F                		mov	byte [si+9], 0Fh ;
 11929                                  					; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11930 00000FD2 5E                      		pop	si
 11931 00000FD3 1F                      		pop	ds
 11932 00000FD4 B417                    		mov	ah, 17h
 11933 00000FD6 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]
 11934 00000FDA CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	SET TYPE (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS
 11935                                  					; AL = disk type AL = 03h - high-capacity disk in high-capacity	drive
 11936                                  DasdHasBeenSet:				
 11937 00000FDC 268A6513                		mov	ah, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 11938 00000FE0 8826[3701]              		mov	[formt_eot], ah
 11939 00000FE4 C3                      		retn
 11940                                  
 11941                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11942                                  
 11943                                  ; 16/10/2022
 11944                                  
 11945                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11946                                  ;
 11947                                  ; Set Media Type for Format
 11948                                  ; Performs the int 13 with ah = 18h to see if the medium described in the
 11949                                  ; BPB area in the BDS can be handled by the rom.
 11950                                  ; On Input, ES:DI -> current BDS.
 11951                                  ; The status of the operation is returned in AL
 11952                                  ;
 11953                                  ;	- 0 - if the support is available,and the combination is valid.
 11954                                  ;	- 1 - no rom support
 11955                                  ;	- 2 - illegal combination
 11956                                  ;	- 3 - no media present (rom support exists but cannot determine now)
 11957                                  ;
 11958                                  ; Flags also may be altered. All other registers preserved.
 11959                                  ; If the call to rom returns no error,then the current Dpt is "replaced" by
 11960                                  ; the one returned by the rom. This is Done by changing the pointer in [Dpt]
 11961                                  ; to the one returned. the original pointer to the disk base table is stored
 11962                                  ; in TempDpt, until it is restored.
 11963                                  ;
 11964                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11965                                  
 11966                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11967                                  SetMediaForFormat:	
 11968 00000FE5 51                      		push	cx
 11969 00000FE6 52                      		push	dx
 11970                                  
 11971                                  		; If we have a format error, then do not change Dpt, TempDpt.
 11972                                  		; but we need to call int 13h, ah=18h again.
 11973                                  
 11974 00000FE7 803E[3906]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 11975 00000FEC 7425                    		jz	short SkipSaveDskAdr
 11976 00000FEE 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; If already done return 0
 11977 00000FF0 803E[3806]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 11978 00000FF5 7502                    		jnz	short DoSetMediaForFormat
 11979 00000FF7 EB7F                    		jmp	SetMediaRet	; Media	already	set
 11980                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11981                                  
 11982                                  DoSetMediaForFormat:			
 11983 00000FF9 06                      		push	es
 11984 00000FFA 56                      		push	si
 11985 00000FFB 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point to interrupt vectors
 11986 00000FFF 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 11987                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR]
 11988                                  					; Get pointer to disk base table
 11989 00001004 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 11990 00001008 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 11991                                  
 11992                                  		; Initialize the head settle time to 0Fh. See the offsets
 11993                                  		; given in dskprm.inc.
 11994                                  
 11995 0000100C 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11996 00001011 5E                      		pop	si
 11997 00001012 07                      		pop	es
 11998                                  
 11999                                  SkipSaveDskAdr:				
 12000 00001013 268B4D25                		mov	cx, [es:di+25h]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 12001 00001017 49                      		dec	cx
 12002 00001018 80E503                  		and	ch, 3
 12003 0000101B D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 12004 0000101D D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 12005 0000101F 86E9                    		xchg	ch, cl
 12006 00001021 260A4D13                		or	cl, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 12007 00001025 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12008 00001029 06                      		push	es
 12009 0000102A 1E                      		push	ds
 12010 0000102B 56                      		push	si
 12011 0000102C 57                      		push	di
 12012 0000102D B418                    		mov	ah, 18h
 12013 0000102F CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - SET MEDIA TYPE	FOR FORMAT (AT model 3x9,XT2,XT286,PS)
 12014                                  					; DL = drive number, CH	= lower	8 bits of number of tracks, CL = sectors per track
 12015 00001031 7233                    		jb	short FormaStatErr
 12016 00001033 803E[3906]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 12017 00001038 7425                    		jz	short skip_disk_base_setting
 12018 0000103A 06                      		push	es		; Save segment returned	by the rom
 12019 0000103B 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vector segment
 12020 0000103F 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12021                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR] (Int 1Eh)
 12022                                  					; Get current disk base	table
 12023 00001044 8936[3A06]              		mov	[tempdpt], si
 12024 00001048 8C06[3C06]              		mov	[tempdpt+2], es ; Save it
 12025 0000104C 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 12026                                  		;mov	es:78h,	di
 12027 00001050 26893E7800              		mov	[es:DSKADR], di
 12028                                  		;pop	word ptr es:7Ah	; replace with one returned by rom
 12029 00001055 268F067A00              		pop	word [es:DSKADR+2]
 12030 0000105A C606[3806]01            		mov	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12031                                  skip_disk_base_setting:			
 12032 0000105F 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; Legal	combination + rom support code
 12033                                  		;mov	ds:had_format_error, al	; Reset	the flag
 12034 00001061 A2[3906]                		mov	[had_format_error], al
 12035 00001064 EB0E                    		jmp	short PopStatRet
 12036                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12037                                  
 12038                                  FormaStatErr:
 12039                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12040 00001066 B003                    		mov	al, 3
 12041                                  				
 12042 00001068 80FC0C                  		cmp	ah, 0Ch		; DSK_ILLEGAL_COMBINATION
 12043                                  					; Illegal combination =	0Ch
 12044 0000106B 7406                    		jz	short FormatStatIllegalComb
 12045 0000106D 80FC80                  		cmp	ah, 80h		; DSK_TIMEOUT_ERR
 12046 00001070 7402                    		jz	short FormatStatTimeOut
 12047                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12048                                  		;dec	al
 12049                                  		; 18/12/2022
 12050 00001072 48                      		dec	ax
 12051                                  		; al = 2
 12052                                  		;mov	al, 1		; Function not supported.
 12053                                  		;jmp	short PopStatRet
 12054                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12055                                  
 12056                                  FormatStatIllegalComb:
 12057                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12058                                  		;dec	al	; 3 -> 2 or 2 -> 1
 12059                                  		; 18/12/2022
 12060 00001073 48                      		dec	ax
 12061                                  		; al = 2				
 12062                                  		;mov	al, 2		; Function supported, but
 12063                                  					; Illegal sect/trk,trk combination.
 12064                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12065                                  		;jmp	short PopStatRet
 12066                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12067                                  
 12068                                  FormatStatTimeOut:			
 12069                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12070                                  		; al = 3
 12071                                  		;mov	al, 3		; Function supported, but
 12072                                  					; Media	not present.
 12073                                  PopStatRet:				
 12074 00001074 5F                      		pop	di
 12075 00001075 5E                      		pop	si
 12076 00001076 1F                      		pop	ds
 12077 00001077 07                      		pop	es
 12078                                  SetMediaRet:

 12080 00001079 59                      		pop	cx
 12081 0000107A C3                      		retn

 12084                                  
 12085                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12086                                  
 12087                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12088                                  ;
 12089                                  ; RESET THE DRIVE
 12090                                  ;
 12091                                  ; we also set [Step_Drv] to -1 to force the main disk routine to use the
 12092                                  ; slow head settle time for the next operation. this is because the reset
 12093                                  ; operation moves the head to cylinder 0,so we need to do a seek the next
 12094                                  ; time around - there is a problem with 3.5" drives in that the head does
 12095                                  ; not settle down in time,even for read operations!!
 12096                                  ;
 12097                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12098                                  
 12099                                  ResetDisk:	
 12100 0000107B 50                      		push	ax
 12101 0000107C 803E[3806]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12102                                  					; Reset while formatting?
 12103 00001081 7505                    		jnz	short ResetDisk_cont
 12104                                  					; Then verify operation in "fmt & vrfy"
 12105 00001083 C606[3906]01            		mov	byte [had_format_error], 1 ; Might have failed.
 12106                                  ResetDisk_cont:				
 12107 00001088 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah		; So signals that we had a format error
 12108 0000108A CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - RESET DISK SYSTEM
 12109                                  					; DL = drive (if bit 7 is set both hard	disks and floppy disks reset)
 12110 0000108C C606[7600]FF            		mov	byte [step_drv], 0FFh ; -1
 12111                                  					; Zap up the speed
 12112 00001091 58                      		pop	ax
 12113 00001092 C3                      		retn
 12114                                  
 12115                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12116                                  
 12117                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12118                                  
 12119                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12120                                  ;
 12121                                  ; This routine sets up the drive parameter table with the values needed for
 12122                                  ; format,does an int 13. values in Dpt are restored after a verify is done.
 12123                                  ;
 12124                                  ; on entry  -	ES:DI - points to bds for the drive
 12125                                  ;		Xfer_Seg:BX - points to trkbuf
 12126                                  ;		AL    - number of sectors
 12127                                  ;		AH    - int 13 function code
 12128                                  ;		CL    - sector number for verify
 12129                                  ;		DS    - Bios_Data
 12130                                  ;
 12131                                  ; ON EXIT   -	DS,DI,ES,BX remain unchanged.
 12132                                  ;		AX and flags are the results of the int 13
 12133                                  ;
 12134                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12135                                  
 12136                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12137                                  ToRom:	
 12138 00001093 53                      		push	bx
 12139 00001094 56                      		push	si
 12140                                  
 12141                                  		; Compaq bug fix - check whether we are using new ROM
 12142                                  		; functionality to set up format, not merely if it exists.
 12143                                  		; This was formerly a check against [new_rom]
 12144                                  
 12145 00001095 F606[3806]01            		test	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12146 0000109A 7536                    		jnz	short GotValidDpt
 12147 0000109C 50                      		push	ax
 12148 0000109D 06                      		push	es		; Save bds segment
 12149 0000109E 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12150                                  					; ffSmall ; is it a 3.5" drive?
 12151 000010A3 9C                      		pushf			; (Save	the cmp	result)
 12152 000010A4 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 12153                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; Get pointer to disk base table
 12154 000010A8 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12155                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:dpt, si
 12156                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:dpt+2, es ;	 Save pointer to table
 12157 000010AD 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 12158 000010B1 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 12159                                  		
 12160 000010B5 A0[3701]                		mov	al, [formt_eot]
 12161 000010B8 26884404                		mov	[es:si+4], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_EOT]
 12162 000010BC A0[3B01]                		mov	al, [gap_patch]
 12163 000010BF 26884407                		mov	[es:si+7], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_FORMT_GAP]
 12164                                  					; Important for	format
 12165 000010C3 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12166                                  					; Assume we are	doing a	seek operation
 12167                                  					; Setup	motor start correctly for 3.5" drives
 12168 000010C8 9D                      		popf			; Get result of	earlier	cmp
 12169 000010C9 7505                    		jnz	short MotorStrtOK
 12170 000010CB 26C6440A04              		mov	byte [es:si+0Ah], 4 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_MOTOR_STRT]
 12171                                  MotorStrtOK:				
 12172 000010D0 07                      		pop	es		; Restore bds segment
 12173 000010D1 58                      		pop	ax
 12174                                  GotValidDpt:				
 12175 000010D2 8B16[3901]              		mov	dx, [trknum]	; Set track number
 12176 000010D6 88D5                    		mov	ch, dl		; Set low 8 bits in ch
 12177 000010D8 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; Set drive number
 12178 000010DC 8A36[3801]              		mov	dh, [hdnum]	; Set head number
 12179 000010E0 06                      		push	es		; Save bds segment
 12180 000010E1 8E06[3705]              		mov	es, [xfer_seg]
 12181 000010E5 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 12182 000010E7 07                      		pop	es		; Restore bds segment
 12183 000010E8 5E                      		pop	si
 12184 000010E9 5B                      		pop	bx
 12185 000010EA C3                      		retn

 12188                                  
 12189                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 12190                                  
 12191                                  ; BIOSCODE:1124h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 12192                                  
 12193                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12194                                  ;
 12195                                  ; get the owner of the physical drive represented by the logical drive in al.
 12196                                  ; the assumption is that we **always** keep track of the owner of a drive!!
 12197                                  ; if this is not the case, the system may hang, just following the linked list.
 12198                                  ;
 12199                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12200                                  
 12201                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12202                                  ioctl_getown:
 12203 000010EB E8DDF3                  		call	SetDrive
 12204 000010EE 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12205                                  					; Get physical drive number
 12206 000010F2 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; Get start of bds chain
 12207                                  ownloop:				
 12208 000010F6 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12209 000010FA 7507                    		jnz	short getnextBDS
 12210                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12211 000010FC 26F6452320              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 20h
 12212                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 20h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12213                                  					; fi_own_physical
 12214 00001101 7515                    		jnz	short exitown
 12215                                  getnextBDS:				
 12216 00001103 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 12217 00001106 EBEE                    		jmp	short ownloop
 12218                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12219                                  
 12220                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12221                                  ;
 12222                                  ; set the ownership of the physical drive represented by the logical drive
 12223                                  ; in al to al.
 12224                                  ;
 12225                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12226                                  
 12227                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12228                                  ioctl_setown:
 12229 00001108 E8C0F3                  		call	SetDrive
 12230 0000110B C606[7A00]01            		mov	byte [fsetowner], 1
 12231                                  					; set flag for CheckSingle to look at.
 12232 00001110 E828F7                  		call	checksingle
 12233 00001113 C606[7A00]00            		mov	byte [fsetowner], 0
 12234                                  					; set ownership	of drive reset flag
 12235                                  		; Fall into ExitOwn
 12236                                  
 12237                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12238                                  ;
 12239                                  ; if there is only one logical drive assigned to this physical drive, return
 12240                                  ; 0 to user to indicate this. Enter with ES:di -> the owner's bds.
 12241                                  ;
 12242                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12243                                  
 12244                                  exitown:				
 12245 00001118 30C9                    		xor	cl, cl
 12246                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12247 0000111A 26F6452310              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 10h
 12248                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 10h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12249                                  					; fi_am_mult
 12250 0000111F 7406                    		jz	short exitnomult
 12251 00001121 268A4D05                		mov	cl, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 12252                                  					; Get logical drive number
 12253                                  					; Get it 1-based
 12254 00001125 FEC1                    		inc	cl
 12255                                  exitnomult:				
 12256 00001127 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 12257 0000112B 884F01                  		mov	[bx+1],	cl	; [bx+unit]
 12258                                  					; Exit normal termination
 12259                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12260                                  		; cf=0
 12261                                  		;clc
 12262 0000112E C3                      		retn
 12263                                  
 12264                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12265                                  
 12266                                  ; 16/10/2022

 12268                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12269                                  ;
 12270                                  ; moves the old Dpt that had been saved in TempDpt back to Dpt. this is done
 12271                                  ; only if the first byte of TempDpt is not -1.
 12272                                  ; all registers (including flags) are preserved.
 12273                                  ;
 12274                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12275                                  
 12276                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12277                                  RestoreOldDpt:
 12278                                  		; if we have already restored the disk base table earlier,
 12279                                  		; do not do it again.
 12280                                  	
 12281 0000112F 50                      		push	ax

 12284 00001135 8606[3806]              		xchg	al, [media_set_for_format] ; get current flag setting
 12285 00001139 08C0                    		or	al, al

 12287 0000113D 56                      		push	si

 12289 0000113F 06                      		push	es

 12293 00001144 2E8E06[3000]            		mov	es, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]

 12295 00001149 268E06[1A00]            		mov	es, [es:zeroseg]
 12296                                  		;mov	es, es:zeroseg	; CAS -- bleeeech!
 12297                                  
 12298                                  		;mov	es:78h,	si	; [es:DSKADR]
 12299 0000114E 2689367800              		mov	[es:DSKADR], si
 12300                                  		;mov	word ptr es:7Ah, ds ; [es:DSKADR+2]
