 14138                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14139                                  ; 17/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 14140                                  
 14141                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D38h or 02C7h:17C8h
 14142 0000176E 0D0A                    sngmsg:		db 0Dh,0Ah
 14143 00001770 496E73657274206469-     		db 'Insert diskette for drive '
 14143 00001779 736B6574746520666F-
 14143 00001782 7220647269766520   
 14144                                  
 14145                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D54h or 02C7h:17E4h
 14146 0000178A 413A20616E64207072-     drvlet:		db 'A: and press any key when ready',0Dh,0Ah
 14146 00001793 65737320616E79206B-
 14146 0000179C 6579207768656E2072-
 14146 000017A5 656164790D0A       
 14147 000017AB 0A00                    		db 0Ah,0
 14148                                  
 14149                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14150                                  
 14151                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14152                                  ; input : es:di points to current bds for drive.
 14153                                  ; return : zero set if no open files
 14154                                  ;	   zero reset if open files
 14155                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14156                                  
 14157                                  chkopcnt:		
 14158 000017AD 26837D2000              		cmp	word [es:di+20h], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.opcnt]
 14159 000017B2 C3                      		retn
 14160                                  
 14161                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14162                                  
 14163                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14164                                  ; at media check time, we need to really get down and check what the change is.
 14165                                  ; this is guaranteed to be expensive.
 14166                                  ;
 14167                                  ;	es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14168                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14169                                  
 14170                                  mediacheck:	
 14171 000017B3 E885F0                  		call	checksingle	; make sure correct disk is in place
 14172 000017B6 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14173 000017B8 E85501                  		call	haschange
 14174 000017BB 742F                    		jz	short mediaret
 14175 000017BD E84401                  		call	checkromchange
 14176 000017C0 752B                    		jnz	short mediadovolid
 14177 000017C2 50                      		push	ax
 14178 000017C3 52                      		push	dx
 14179 000017C4 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14180                                  					; set logical drive number
 14181 000017C8 B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 14182 000017CA CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 14183                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 14184                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 14185 000017CC 5A                      		pop	dx
 14186 000017CD 58                      		pop	ax
 14187 000017CE 721D                    		jb	short mediadovolid
 14188 000017D0 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; signal no change
 14189                                  
 14190                                  ; there are some drives with changeline that "lose" the changeline indication
 14191                                  ; if a different drive is accessed after the current one. in order to avoid
 14192                                  ; missing a media change, we return an "i don't know" to dos if the changeline
 14193                                  ; is not active and we are accessing a different drive from the last one.
 14194                                  ; if we are accessing the same drive, then we can safely rely on the changeline
 14195                                  ; status.
 14196                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14197 000017D3 8A1E[1E01]              		mov	bl, [tim_drv]	; get last drive accessed
 14198 000017D7 26385D04                		cmp	[es:di+4], bl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14199                                  					; (If the last drive accessed is not current drive
 14200                                  					; media	change status may be incorrect.	So,
 14201                                  					; "I don't now" will be returned even if it is indicated
 14202                                  					; as media is not changed.)
 14203 000017DB 740F                    		jz	short mediaret	; (same	drive,
 14204                                  					; media	changeline indication is reliable)
 14205                                  
 14206                                  ; do the 2 second twiddle. if time >= 2 seconds, do a volid check.
 14207                                  ; otherwise return "i don't know" (strictly speaking, we should return a
 14208                                  ; "not changed" here since the 2 second test said no change.)
 14209                                  
 14210 000017DD 50                      		push	ax
 14211 000017DE 51                      		push	cx
 14212 000017DF 52                      		push	dx
 14213 000017E0 E870ED                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access
 14214 000017E3 5A                      		pop	dx
 14215 000017E4 59                      		pop	cx
 14216 000017E5 58                      		pop	ax
 14217 000017E6 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14218 000017E8 7403                    		jz	short mediadovolid ; check_time	says ">= 2 secs	passed"
 14219                                  					; (volume id will be checked)
 14220 000017EA 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; return "i don't know"
 14221                                  mediaret:				
 14222 000017EC C3                      		retn
 14223                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14224                                  
 14225                                  ; somehow the media was changed. look at vid to see. we do not look at fat
 14226                                  ; because this may be different since we only set medbyt when doing a read
 14227                                  ; or write.
 14228                                  
 14229                                  mediadovolid:				
 14230 000017ED E807EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	a new bpb in current bds
 14231 000017F0 72FA                    		jb	short mediaret
 14232 000017F2 E82D00                  		call	check_vid
 14233 000017F5 73F5                    		jnb	short mediaret
 14234 000017F7 E9D6F3                  		jmp	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14235                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14236                                  
 14237                                  ; simple, quick check of latched change. if no indication, then return
 14238                                  ; otherwise do expensive check. if the expensive test fails, pop off the
 14239                                  ; return and set al = 15 (for invalid media change) which will be returned to
 14240                                  ; dos.
 14241                                  ;
 14242                                  ; for dos 3.3, this will work only for the drive that has changeline.
 14243                                  
 14244                                  ;	call with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14245                                  ;	***** warning:  this routine will return one level up on the stack
 14246                                  ;			if an error occurs!
 14247                                  
 14248                                  checklatchio:	
 14249                                  
 14250                                  ; if returning fake bpb then assume the disk has not changed
 14251                                  			
 14252 000017FA E8B0FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 14253 000017FD 741B                    		jz	short checkret	; done if zero
 14254                                  
 14255                                  ; check for past rom indications. if no rom change indicated, then return ok.
 14256                                  
 14257 000017FF E80201                  		call	checkromchange
 14258 00001802 7416                    		jz	short checkret
 14259                                  
 14260                                  ; we now see that a change line has been seen in the past. let's do the
 14261                                  ; expensive verification.
 14262                                  
 14263 00001804 E8F0ED                  		call	GetBp		; build	bpb in current bds
 14264 00001807 720F                    		jb	short ret_no_error_map ; getbp has already called maperror
 14265 00001809 E81600                  		call	check_vid
 14266 0000180C 7207                    		jb	short checklatchret ; disk error trying	to read	in.
 14267 0000180E 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 14268 00001810 7908                    		jns	short checkret
 14269 00001812 E87D00                  		call	returnvid
 14270                                  checklatchret:				
 14271 00001815 E8B8F3                  		call	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14272                                  ret_no_error_map:			
 14273 00001818 F9                      		stc
 14274 00001819 5E                      		pop	si		; pop off return address
 14275                                  checkret:				
 14276 0000181A C3                      		retn
 14277                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14278                                  
 14279                                  ; check the fat and the vid. return in di -1 or 0. return with carry set
 14280                                  ; only if there was a disk error. return that error code in ax.
 14281                                  ;
 14282                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14283                                  
 14284                                  checkfatvid:				
 14285 0000181B E8CD01                  		call	fat_check	; check	the fat	and the	vid
 14286 0000181E 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14287 00001820 7827                    		js	short changed_drv ;
 14288                                  
 14289                                  ; the fat was the same. fall into check_vid and check volume id.
 14290                                  
 14291                                  		; fall into check_vid
 14292                                  
 14293                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14294                                  
 14295                                  ; now with the extended boot record, the logic should be enhanced.
 14296                                  ;
 14297                                  ; if it is the extended boot record, then we check the volume serial
 14298                                  ; number instead of volume id. if it is different, then set si to -1.
 14299                                  ;
 14300                                  ; if it is same, then si= 1 (no change).
 14301                                  ;
 14302                                  ; if it is not the extended boot record, then just follows the old
 14303                                  ; logic. dos 4.00 will check if the # of fat in the boot record bpb
 14304                                  ; is not 0.  if it is 0 then it must be non_fat based system and
 14305                                  ; should have already covered by extended boot structure checking.
 14306                                  ; so, we will return "i don't know" by setting si to 0.
 14307                                  ;
 14308                                  ; this routine assume the newest valid boot record is in cs:[disksector].
 14309                                  ; (this will be gauranteed by a successful getbp call right before this
 14310                                  ; routine.)
 14311                                  ;
 14312                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> bds
 14313                                  
 14314                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14315                                  check_vid:
 14316                                  
 14317                                  ; check the disksector.EXT_BOOT_SIG variable for the extended
 14318                                  ; boot signature. if it is set then go to do the extended
 14319                                  ; id check otherwise continue with code below
 14320                                  
 14321 00001822 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 14322                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 14323                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 14324 00001827 7427                    		jz	short do_ext_check_id
 14325 00001829 E8E400                  		call	haschange
 14326 0000182C 74EC                    		jz	short checkret
 14327 0000182E 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14328 00001830 803E[5E01]00            		cmp	byte [disksector+10h], 0 
 14329                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.NUMBEROFFATS]
 14330 00001835 7411                    		jz	short checkfatret ; don't read vol id
 14331                                  					; if not fat system
 14332 00001837 E8F600                  		call	read_volume_id
 14333 0000183A 720C                    		jb	short checkfatret
 14334 0000183C E89B01                  		call	check_volume_id
 14335 0000183F BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14336                                  					; definitely changed
 14337 00001842 7505                    		jnz	short changed_drv
 14338                                  
 14339 00001844 46                      		inc	si		; not changed
 14340                                  vid_no_changed:				
 14341 00001845 E8C200                  		call	resetchanged
 14342                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14343                                  		; cf=0 ('and' instruction in 'resetchanged' clears cf) 
 14344                                  		;clc
 14345                                  checkfatret:				
 14346 00001848 C3                      		retn
 14347                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14348                                  
 14349                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14350                                  changed_drv:
 14351 00001849 F8                      		clc			; cas -- return	no error
 14352 0000184A C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte  [tim_drv], 0FFh 
 14353                                  					; ensure that we ask rom for media
 14354 0000184F C3                      		retn			; check	next time round
 14355                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14356                                  
 14357                                  ; extended id check
 14358                                  
 14359                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14360                                  
 14361                                  ; the code to check extended id is basically a check to see if the
 14362                                  ; volume serial number is still the same. the volume serial number
 14363                                  ; previously read is in cs:disksector.EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 14364                                  ; ds:di points to the bds of the drive under consideration.
 14365                                  ; the bds has fields containing the high and low words 
 14366                                  ; of the volume serial number of the media in the drive.
 14367                                  ; compare these fields to the fields mentioned above. if these fields
 14368                                  ; do not match the media has changed and so we should jump to the code
 14369                                  ; starting at ext_changed else return "i don't know" status
 14370                                  ; in the register used for the changeline status and continue executing
 14371                                  ; the code given below. for temporary storage use the register which
 14372                                  ; has been saved and restored around this block.
 14373                                  ;
 14374                                  ; bds fields in inc\msbds.inc
 14375                                  
 14376                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14377                                  do_ext_check_id:			
 14378 00001850 50                      		push	ax
 14379                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr ds:disksector+27h
 14380                                  					; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 14381 00001851 A1[7501]                		mov	ax, [disksector+27h]
 14382 00001854 263B4557                		cmp	ax, [es:di+57h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial]
 14383 00001858 750E                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 14384 0000185A A1[7701]                		mov	ax, [disksector+29h] ; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 14385 0000185D 263B4559                		cmp	ax, [es:di+59h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 14386 00001861 7505                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 14387 00001863 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; 0
 14388                                  					; don't know
 14389 00001865 58                      		pop	ax
 14390 00001866 EBDD                    		jmp	short vid_no_changed
 14391                                  					; reset the flag
 14392                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14393                                  
 14394                                  ext_changed:				
 14395 00001868 58                      		pop	ax
 14396 00001869 BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14397                                  					; disk changed!
 14398                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14399                                  		; ('changed_drv' clears cf)
 14400                                  		;clc
 14401 0000186C EBDB                    		jmp	short changed_drv
 14402                                  
 14403                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14404                                  
 14405                                  ; at i/o time, we detected the error. now we need to determine whether the
 14406                                  ; media was truly changed or not. we return normally if media change unknown.
 14407                                  ; and we pop off the call and jmp to harderr if we see an error.
 14408                                  ;
 14409                                  ; es:di -> bds
 14410                                  
 14411                                  checkio:				
 14412 0000186E 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 14413 00001871 75D5                    		jnz	short checkfatret
 14414 00001873 E837FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 14415 00001876 74D0                    		jz	short checkfatret
 14416 00001878 E87CED                  		call	GetBp
 14417 0000187B 7212                    		jb	short no_error_map
 14418 0000187D E89BFF                  		call	checkfatvid
 14419 00001880 7209                    		jb	short checkioret ; disk	error trying to	read in.
 14420 00001882 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 14421 00001884 7802                    		js	short checkioerr ; yes changed
 14422 00001886 45                      		inc	bp		; allow	a retry
 14423 00001887 C3                      		retn
 14424                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14425                                  
 14426                                  checkioerr:				
 14427 00001888 E80700                  		call	returnvid
 14428                                  
 14429                                  checkioret:				
 14430 0000188B F9                      		stc			; make sure carry gets passed through
 14431 0000188C E9F1F2                  		jmp	harderr
 14432                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14433                                  
 14434                                  no_error_map:				
 14435 0000188F E9F1F2                  		jmp	harderr2
 14436                                  
 14437                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14438                                  
 14439                                  ; return vid sets up the vid for a return to dos.
 14440                                  ;  es:di -> bds, returns pointer in packet to bds_volid
 14441                                  ;  **** trashes si! ****
 14442                                  
 14443                                  returnvid:		
 14444 00001892 BE1600                  		mov	si, 22		; extra
 14445                                  					; offset into pointer to return	value
 14446 00001895 E80700                  		call	vid_into_packet
 14447 00001898 B406                    		mov	ah, 6
 14448 0000189A F9                      		stc
 14449 0000189B C3                      		retn
 14450                                  
 14451                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14452                                  
 14453                                  ; moves the pointer to the volid for the drive into the original request packet
 14454                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers.
 14455                                  ;
 14456                                  ; assumes es:di -> bds
 14457                                  ; **trashes si**
 14458                                  
 14459                                  media_set_vid:				
 14460 0000189C BE0F00                  		mov	si, 15		; trans+1
 14461                                  					; return the value here	in packet
 14462                                  
 14463                                  		; fall into vid_into_packet
 14464                                  
 14465                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14466                                  
 14467                                  ; return pointer to vid in bds at es:di in packet[si]
 14468                                  
 14469                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14470                                  vid_into_packet:
 14471 0000189F 1E                      		push	ds		; return pointer to vid	in bds at es:di	in packet[si]
 14472 000018A0 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 14473 000018A4 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14474 000018A7 8938                    		mov	[bx+si], di
 14475 000018A9 83EF4B                  		sub	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14476 000018AC 8C4002                  		mov	[bx+si+2], es
 14477 000018AF 1F                      		pop	ds
 14478                                  dofloppy:	; 18/12/2022
 14479 000018B0 C3                      		retn
 14480                                  
 14481                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14482                                  
 14483                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14484                                  ;   hidensity - examine a drive/media descriptor to set the media type. if
 14485                                  ;   the media descriptor is not f9 (not 96tpi or 3 1/2), we return and let the
 14486                                  ;   caller do the rest. otherwise, we pop off the return and jump to the tail
 14487                                  ;   of getbp. for 3.5" media, we just return.
 14488                                  ;
 14489                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds for this drive
 14490                                  ;		ah has media byte
 14491                                  ;
 14492                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 14493                                  ;		    no registers modified
 14494                                  ;		carry set
 14495                                  ;		    al = sectors/fat
 14496                                  ;		    bh = number of root directory entries
 14497                                  ;		    bl = sectors per track
 14498                                  ;		    cx = number of sectors
 14499                                  ;		    dh = sectors per allocation unit
 14500                                  ;		    dl = number of heads
 14501                                  ;
 14502                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14503                                  
 14504                                  hidensity:
 14505                                  
 14506                                  ; check for correct drive
 14507                                  		
 14508                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14509 000018B1 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 14510                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; is it special?	
 14511                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline
 14512 000018B6 74F8                    		jz	short dofloppy	; no, do normal floppy test
 14513                                  
 14514                                  ; we have a media byte that is pretty complex. examine drive information
 14515                                  ; table to see what kind it is.
 14516                                  
 14517 000018B8 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; is it single-media?
 14518 000018BD 74F1                    		jz	short dofloppy	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffSmall
 14519                                  					; yes, use fatid...
 14520                                  ; 96 tpi drive?
 14521 000018BF 80FCF9                  		cmp	ah, 0F9h
 14522 000018C2 75EC                    		jnz	short dofloppy
 14523                                  
 14524                                  ;------ If formfactor of drive = ffother or ff288 it has to be
 14525                                  ;------ a 720K diskette
 14526                                  
 14527 000018C4 26807D2207              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 7 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 14528                                  					; ffOther
 14529 000018C9 7418                    		jz	short Is720K
 14530 000018CB 26807D2209              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 9 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 14531                                  					; ff288
 14532 000018D0 7411                    		jz	short Is720K
 14533 000018D2 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; seven	sectors	/ fat
 14534 000018D4 BB0FE0                  		mov	bx, 57359	; 224*256+0Fh
 14535                                  					; 224 root dir entries
 14536                                  					; & 0Fh sector max
 14537 000018D7 B96009                  		mov	cx, 2400	; 80*15*2
 14538                                  					; 80 tracks, 15 sectors/track,
 14539                                  					; 2 sides
 14540 000018DA BA0201                  		mov	dx, 258		; 1*256+2
 14541                                  					; sectors/allocation unit
 14542                                  					; & head max
 14543 000018DD 83C402                  		add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 14544 000018E0 E986ED                  		jmp	Has1		; return to tail of getbp
 14545                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14546                                  
 14547                                  Is720K:					
 14548 000018E3 83C402                  		add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 14549 000018E6 E947ED                  		jmp	Has720K		; return to 720K code
 14550                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14551                                  
 14552                                  		; 18/12/2022
 14553                                  ;dofloppy:				
 14554                                  		;retn
 14555                                  
 14556                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14557                                  
 14558                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14559                                  
 14560                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14561                                  ; set_changed_dl - sets flag bits according to bits set in bx.
 14562                                  ;		   essentially used to indicate changeline, or format.
 14563                                  ;
 14564                                  ;   inputs:	dl contains physical drive number
 14565                                  ;		bx contains bits to set in the flag field in the bdss
 14566                                  ;   outputs:	none
 14567                                  ;   registers modified: flags
 14568                                  ;
 14569                                  ;	called from int13 hooker.  Must preserve ALL registers!!!
 14570                                  ;
 14571                                  ; in the virtual drive system we *must* flag the other drives as being changed
 14572                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14573                                  
 14574                                  set_changed_dl:	
 14575 000018E9 06                      		push	es
 14576 000018EA 57                      		push	di
 14577                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds
 14578                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14579 000018EB C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds]
 14580                                  
 14581                                  ; note: we assume that the list is non-empty
 14582                                  
 14583                                  scan_bds:				
 14584 000018EF 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14585 000018F3 7504                    		jnz	short get_next_bds
 14586                                  
 14587                                  ; someone may complain, but this *always* must be done when a disk change is
 14588                                  ; noted. there are *no* other compromising circumstances.
 14589                                  
 14590 000018F5 26095D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bx	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14591                                  					; signal change	on other drive
 14592                                  get_next_bds:				
 14593 000018F9 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 14594                                  					; go to	next bds
 14595 000018FC 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 14596 000018FF 75EE                    		jnz	short scan_bds	; loop unless we hit end of chain
 14597 00001901 5F                      		pop	di
 14598 00001902 07                      		pop	es
 14599 00001903 C3                      		retn
 14600                                  
 14601                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14602                                  
 14603                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14604                                  ; checkromchange - see if external program has diddled rom change line.
 14605                                  ;
 14606                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds.
 14607                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change
 14608                                  ;		zero reset - change
 14609                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14610                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14611                                  
 14612                                  checkromchange:	
 14613                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchanged ; 40h
 14614                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14615 00001904 26F6452340              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 40h
 14616                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 40h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14617                                  					; fchanged
 14618 00001909 C3                      		retn
 14619                                  
 14620                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14621                                  
 14622                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14623                                  ; resetchanged - restore value of change line
 14624                                  ;
 14625                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 14626                                  ;   outputs:	none
 14627                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14628                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14629                                  
 14630                                  resetchanged:	
 14631                                  		;and	word [es:di+BDS.flags], ~fchanged ; 0FFBFh	
 14632                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14633 0000190A 26806523BF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0BFh
 14634                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FFBFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14635                                  					; ~fchanged
 14636 0000190F C3                      		retn
 14637                                  
 14638                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14639                                  
 14640                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14641                                  ; haschange - see if drive can supply change line
 14642                                  ;
 14643                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 14644                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change line available
 14645                                  ;		zero reset - change line available
 14646                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14647                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14648                                  
 14649                                  haschange:
 14650                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline ; 2
 14651                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14652 00001910 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 14653                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14654                                  					; fchangeline
 14655 00001915 C3                      		retn
 14656                                  
 14657                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14658                                  
 14659                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14660                                  
 14661                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14662                                  ; set_volume_id      -	main routine, calls other routines.
 14663                                  ; read_volume_id     -	read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 14664                                  ; transfer_volume_id -	copy the volume id from tmp to special drive.
 14665                                  ; check_volume_id    -	compare volume id in tmp area with one expected for drive.
 14666                                  ; fat_check          -	see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 14667                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14668                                  
 14669                                  ; set_volume_id
 14670                                  ;   if drive has changeline support, read in and set the volume_id
 14671                                  ; and the last fat_id byte. if no change line support then do nothing.
 14672                                  ;
 14673                                  ;   on entry:
 14674                                  ;	es:di points to the bds for this disk.
 14675                                  ;	ah contains media byte
 14676                                  ;
 14677                                  ;   on exit:
 14678                                  ;	carry clear:
 14679                                  ;	   successful call
 14680                                  ;	carry set
 14681                                  ;	   error and ax has error code
 14682                                  
 14683                                  set_volume_id:				
 14684 00001916 52                      		push	dx		; save registers
 14685 00001917 50                      		push	ax
 14686 00001918 E8F5FF                  		call	haschange	; does drive have changeline support?
 14687 0000191B 740B                    		jz	short setvret	; no, get out
 14688 0000191D E81000                  		call	read_volume_id
 14689 00001920 7209                    		jb	short seterr
 14690 00001922 E8A200                  		call	transfer_volume_id ; copy the volume id	to special drive
 14691 00001925 E8E2FF                  		call	resetchanged	; restore value	of change line
 14692                                  setvret:				
 14693                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14694                                  		; cf = 0
 14695                                  		;clc			; no error, clear carry flag
 14696 00001928 58                      		pop	ax		; restore registers
 14697 00001929 5A                      		pop	dx
 14698 0000192A C3                      		retn
 14699                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14700                                  
 14701                                  seterr:					
 14702 0000192B 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop stack but don't overwrite ax
 14703 0000192C 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore dx
 14704 0000192D C3                      		retn
 14705                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14706 0000192E 0000                    root_sec:	dw 0			; root sector #
 14707                                  
 14708                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14709                                  ;ROOTSEC equ root_sec - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h		
 14710                                  ; 09/12/2022
 14711                                  ROOTSEC equ root_sec
 14712                                  
 14713                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14714                                  
 14715                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14716                                  
 14717                                  ; read_volume_id read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 14718                                  ;
 14719                                  ;   on entry:
 14720                                  ;	es:di points to current bds for drive.
 14721                                  ;
 14722                                  ;   on exit:
 14723                                  ;	carry clear
 14724                                  ;	    si = 1  no change
 14725                                  ;	    si = 0  ?
 14726                                  ;	    si = -1 change
 14727                                  ;
 14728                                  ;	carry set:
 14729                                  ;	    error and ax has error code.
 14730                                  
 14731                                  read_volume_id:
 14732 00001930 52                      		push	dx		; preserve registers
 14733 00001931 51                      		push	cx
 14734 00001932 53                      		push	bx
 14735 00001933 50                      		push	ax
 14736 00001934 06                      		push	es		; stack the bds last
 14737 00001935 57                      		push	di
 14738 00001936 1E                      		push	ds		; point es to Bios_Data
 14739 00001937 07                      		pop	es
 14740 00001938 BF[0A09]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14741 0000193B BE[FE08]                		mov	si, nul_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14742 0000193E B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; initialize tmp_vid to	null vi_id
 14743 00001941 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 14744 00001943 5F                      		pop	di
 14745 00001944 07                      		pop	es
 14746 00001945 268A450B                		mov	al, [es:di+11]	; [es:di+BDS.fats]
 14747                                  					; # of fats
 14748 00001949 268B4D11                		mov	cx, [es:di+17]	; [es:di+BDS.fatsecs]
 14749                                  					; sectors / fat
 14750 0000194D F6E1                    		mul	cl		; size taken by	fats
 14751 0000194F 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
 14752                                  					; add on reserved sectors
 14753                                  					;
 14754                                  					; ax is	now sector # (0	based)
 14755                                  		; 17/10/2022
 14756 00001953 2EA3[2E19]              		mov	[cs:ROOTSEC], ax
 14757                                  		;mov	word ptr cs:198Fh, ax ; [cs:root_sec]
 14758                                  					; 0070h:3EFFh =	2C7h:198Fh
 14759 00001957 268B450C                		mov	ax, [es:di+12]	; [es:di+BDS.direntries]
 14760                                  					; # root dir entries
 14761 0000195B B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 entries/sector
 14762 0000195D D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl		; divide by 16
 14763 0000195F 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 14764                                  next_sec:				
 14765 00001961 51                      		push	cx		; save outer loop counter
 14766 00001962 2EA1[2E19]              		mov	ax, [cs:ROOTSEC]
 14767                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr cs:198Fh ; [cs:root_sec]
 14768                                  					; get sector #
 14769 00001966 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 14770                                  					; sectors / track
 14771 0000196A 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 14772 0000196C F7F1                    		div	cx
 14773                                  
 14774                                  ; set up registers for call to read_sector
 14775                                  
 14776 0000196E 42                      		inc	dx		; dx= sectors into track
 14777                                  					; ax= track count from 0
 14778 0000196F 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl		; sector to read
 14779 00001971 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 14780 00001973 26F77515                		div	word [es:di+21] ; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 14781                                  					; # heads on this disc
 14782 00001977 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl		; head number
 14783 00001979 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; track	#
 14784 0000197B E8FBED                  		call	read_sector	; get first sector of the root directory,
 14785                                  					; ds:bx	-> directory sector
 14786 0000197E 7243                    		jb	short readviderr
 14787 00001980 B91000                  		mov	cx, 16		; # of dir entries in a	block of root
 14788 00001983 B008                    		mov	al, 8		; volume label bit
 14789                                  fvid_loop:				
 14790 00001985 803F00                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0 ; end of dir?
 14791 00001988 7436                    		jz	short no_vid	; yes, no vol id
 14792 0000198A 803FE5                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0E5h ; empty entry?
 14793 0000198D 7405                    		jz	short ent_loop	; yes, skip
 14794 0000198F 84470B                  		test	[bx+11], al	; is volume label bit set in fcb?
 14795 00001992 7511                    		jnz	short found_vid	; jmp yes
 14796                                  ent_loop:				
 14797 00001994 83C320                  		add	bx, 32		; add length of	directory entry
 14798 00001997 E2EC                    		loop	fvid_loop
 14799 00001999 59                      		pop	cx		; outer loop
 14800 0000199A 2EFF06[2E19]            		inc	word [cs:ROOTSEC]
 14801                                  		;inc	word ptr cs:198Fh ; inc word [root_sec]
 14802                                  					; next sector
 14803 0000199F E2C0                    		loop	next_sec	; continue
 14804                                  notfound:				
 14805 000019A1 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14806 000019A3 EB16                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 14807                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14808                                  
 14809                                  found_vid:				
 14810 000019A5 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 14811 000019A6 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; point	to volume_id
 14812 000019A8 06                      		push	es		; preserve current bds
 14813 000019A9 57                      		push	di
 14814 000019AA 1E                      		push	ds
 14815 000019AB 07                      		pop	es		; point es to Bios_Data
 14816 000019AC BF[0A09]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14817 000019AF B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ-1
 14818                                  					; length of string minus nul
 14819 000019B2 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; mov volume label to tmp_vid
 14820 000019B4 30C0                    		xor	al, al
 14821 000019B6 AA                      		stosb			; null terminate
 14822 000019B7 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14823 000019B9 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 14824 000019BA 07                      		pop	es
 14825                                  fvid_ret:				
 14826 000019BB 58                      		pop	ax
 14827                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14828                                  		; cf = 0
 14829                                  		;clc
 14830                                  rvidret:				
 14831 000019BC 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore registers
 14832 000019BD 59                      		pop	cx
 14833 000019BE 5A                      		pop	dx
 14834 000019BF C3                      		retn
 14835                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14836                                  
 14837                                  no_vid:					
 14838 000019C0 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 14839 000019C1 EBDE                    		jmp	short notfound	; not found
 14840                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14841                                  
 14842                                  readviderr:				
 14843 000019C3 5E                      		pop	si		; trash the outer loop counter
 14844 000019C4 5E                      		pop	si		; caller's ax, return error code instead 
 14845 000019C5 EBF5                    		jmp	short rvidret
 14846                                  
 14847                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14848                                  
 14849                                  ; transfer_volume_id - copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 14850                                  ;
 14851                                  ; inputs:	es:di has current bds
 14852                                  ; outputs:	bds for drive has volume id from tmp
 14853                                  
 14854                                  transfer_volume_id:	
 14855 000019C7 57                      		push	di		; copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 14856 000019C8 56                      		push	si
 14857 000019C9 51                      		push	cx
 14858 000019CA BE[0A09]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14859                                  		;add	di, BDS.volid
 14860 000019CD 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14861                                  		;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 14862 000019D0 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 14863 000019D3 FC                      		cld
 14864 000019D4 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 14865 000019D6 59                      		pop	cx
 14866 000019D7 5E                      		pop	si
 14867 000019D8 5F                      		pop	di
 14868 000019D9 C3                      		retn
 14869                                  
 14870                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14871                                  
 14872                                  ;  check_volume_id - compare volume id in tmp area with
 14873                                  ;		     one expected for drive
 14874                                  ;
 14875                                  ;   inputs:	es:di has current bds for drive
 14876                                  ;   outputs:	zero true means it matched
 14877                                  
 14878                                  check_volume_id:	
 14879 000019DA 57                      		push	di
 14880 000019DB 51                      		push	cx
 14881 000019DC BE[0A09]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14882                                  		;add	di, BDS.volid
 14883 000019DF 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14884                                  		;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 14885 000019E2 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 14886 000019E5 FC                      		cld
 14887 000019E6 F3A6                    		repe cmpsb		; are the 2 volume_ids the same?
 14888 000019E8 59                      		pop	cx
 14889 000019E9 5F                      		pop	di
 14890 000019EA C3                      		retn
 14891                                  
 14892                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14893                                  
 14894                                  ;   fat_check - see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 14895                                  ;	      - uses the fat id obtained from the boot sector.
 14896                                  ;
 14897                                  ;   inputs:	medbyt is expected fat id
 14898                                  ;		es:di points to current bds
 14899                                  ;
 14900                                  ;   output:	si = -1 if fat id different,
 14901                                  ;		si = 0 otherwise
 14902                                  ;
 14903                                  ;   no other registers changed.
 14904                                  
 14905                                  fat_check:		
 14906 000019EB 50                      		push	ax
 14907 000019EC 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; say fat id's are same.
 14908 000019EE A0[1F01]                		mov	al, [medbyt]	; 19/10/2022
 14909 000019F1 263A4510                		cmp	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 14910                                  					; compare it with the bds medbyte
 14911 000019F5 7401                    		jz	short okret1	; carry	clear
 14912 000019F7 4E                      		dec	si
 14913                                  okret1:					
 14914 000019F8 58                      		pop	ax
 14915 000019F9 C3                      		retn
 14916                                  
 14917                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14918                                  
 14919                                  ; BIOSCODE:1A69h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 14920                                  		;times 7 db 0
 14921                                  
 14922                                  ; BIOSCODE:180Bh (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)	
 14923                                  
 14924                                  		; 09/12/2022
 14925                                  		;times 4 db 0	; 17/10/2022
 14926                                  		;db 4 dup(0)	; times 4 db 0
 14927                                  
 14928                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14929                                  
 14930                                  		; 09/12/2022
 14931                                  		;db 0
 14932                                  
 14933                                  number2div	equ ($-BCode_start)
 14934                                  number2mod	equ (number2div % 16)
 14935                                  
 14936                                  %if number2mod>0 & number2mod<16
 14937 000019FA 00<rep 6h>              		times (16-number2mod) db 0
 14938                                  %endif
 14939                                  
 14940                                  ;align 16
 14941                                  
 14942                                  ; 09/12/2022
 14943                                  BCODE_END	equ $ - BCode_start
 14944                                  ;SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(BCODE_END>>4)
 14945                                  ; 13/12/2022
 14946                                  SYSINITOFFSET	equ BCODE_END
 14947                                  SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(SYSINITOFFSET>>4)
 14948                                  
 14949                                  ; 30/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.2
 14950                                  ; (SYSINITSEG is 473h for MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 14951                                  
 14952                                  ;--- End of DOSBIOS code segment ---------------------------------------------
 14953

 14955                                  ; 01/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 
 14956                                  ; ============================================================================
 14957                                  ; end of BIOSCODE

 14960                                  ; %include sysinit5.s	; 09/12/2022

 14964                                  ; (IO.SYS) SYSINIT SEGMENT

 14966                                  ; 09/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
