 30802                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30803                                  ;*** findUMB - makes ES:0 point to the first MCB in UMB given as AL
 30804                                  ;            -- returns UmbHEAD pointer (0x9FFF) if passed AL==0
 30805                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30806                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 30807                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to first MCB in UMB (_not_ the 8+SC MCB that heads it)
 30808                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (too high)
 30809                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 30810                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30811                                  
 30812                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 30813                                  	; (SYSINIT:3344h)
 30814                                  findUMB:
 30815                                  	; 01/01/2023
 30816                                  	;push	ax
 30817                                  	; 02/01/2023
 30818 00002E17 51                      	push	cx ; *
 30819                                  	;push	dx
 30820                                  
 30821 00002E18 30E4                    	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 30822                                  
 30823 00002E1A 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax		; Store the to-be-found UMB number in DX
 30824                                  
 30825 00002E1C E8B8FE                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 30826 00002E1F 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 30827 00002E21 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 30828                                  
 30829                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 30830                                  ; FU10--CX - This UMB number; 0 == conventional
 30831                                  ;       DX - The UMB number they're looking for
 30832                                  ;       ES - The current MCB address
 30833                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 30834                                  
 30835                                  fu10:	
 30836 00002E23 39D1                    	cmp	cx,dx		; If CX==DX, we've found the UMB we're
 30837 00002E25 741B                    	je	short fuX	; searching for--so exit.
 30838                                  
 30839 00002E27 E8BAFE                  	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 30840 00002E2A 7501                    	jnz	short fu20
 30841                                  
 30842 00002E2C 41                      	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 30843                                  fu20:	
 30844 00002E2D 26A00000                	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30845 00002E31 3C5A                    	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 30846 00002E33 740C                    	je	short fuE	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 30847                                  
 30848                                  	;NextMCB es,ax		; Go on forward.
 30849 00002E35 8CC0                    	mov     ax,es
 30850                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 30851 00002E37 2603060300              	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30852 00002E3C 40                      	inc     ax
 30853 00002E3D 8EC0                    	mov     es,ax
 30854                                  
 30855 00002E3F EBE2                    	jmp	short fu10
 30856                                  fuE:	
 30857 00002E41 F9                      	stc
 30858                                  fuX:
 30859                                  	; 01/01/2023
 30860                                  	;pop	dx
 30861                                  	; 02/01/2023
 30862 00002E42 59                      	pop	cx ; *
 30863                                  	;pop	ax		; The address is already in ES.
 30864 00002E43 C3                      	retn
 30865                                  
 30866                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30867                                  ;*** BigFree - makes ES:0 point to the largest free MCB in UMB given as AL
 30868                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30869                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 30870                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to largest free MCB in UMB, AX returns its size
 30871                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (0 or too high)
 30872                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 30873                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30874                                  
 30875                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 30876                                  BigFree:
 30877                                  	; 01/01/2023
 30878                                  	;push	bx
 30879 00002E44 51                      	push	cx
 30880                                  
 30881 00002E45 E8CFFF                  	call	findUMB			; Returns with CF if err, else ES==MCB
 30882 00002E48 723A                    	jc	short bfX		; (would be "jc bfE"; it just does stc)
 30883                                  
 30884 00002E4A 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; Segment address of largest free MCB
 30885 00002E4C 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx			; Size of largest free MCB
 30886                                  
 30887                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 30888                                  ; BF10--ES - Current MCB address
 30889                                  ;       BX - Address of largest free MCB so far
 30890                                  ;       CX - Size of largest free MCB so far
 30891                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 30892                                  
 30893                                  bf10:	
 30894 00002E4E E893FE                  	call	isSysMCB		; If we've left the MCB, we're done.
 30895 00002E51 7428                    	jz	short bf30
 30896                                  
 30897                                  	;call	isFreeMCB		; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 30898 00002E53 26830E010000            	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 30899 00002E59 750C                    	jnz	short bf20
 30900                                  
 30901 00002E5B 26A10300                	mov	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30902                                  	;cmp	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; Compare sizes...
 30903 00002E5F 39C1                    	cmp	cx,ax
 30904 00002E61 7F04                    	jg	short bf20		; Unless we're bigger,
 30905                                  
 30906 00002E63 8CC3                    	mov	bx,es			; Store this new element's address,
 30907                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; and its size.
 30908 00002E65 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax
 30909                                  
 30910 00002E67 26A00000                bf20:	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30911 00002E6B 3C5A                    	cmp	al,arena_signature_end	; 'Z'
 30912 00002E6D 740C                    	jz	short bf30		; 'Z' means this was the last MCB.
 30913                                  
 30914                                  	;NextMCB es,ax		; Go on forward.
 30915 00002E6F 8CC0                    	mov     ax,es
 30916                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 30917 00002E71 2603060300              	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30918 00002E76 40                      	inc     ax
 30919 00002E77 8EC0                    	mov     es,ax
 30920                                  
 30921 00002E79 EBD3                    	jmp	short bf10
 30922                                  
 30923 00002E7B 8EC3                    bf30:	mov	es,bx			; Return the address
 30924 00002E7D 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx			; Return the size
 30925 00002E7F 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 30926 00002E81 7501                    	jnz	short bfX		; (if size==0, there's nothing free)
 30927                                  bfE:	
 30928 00002E83 F9                      	stc
 30929                                  bfX:
 30930 00002E84 59                      	pop	cx
 30931                                  	; 01/01/2023
 30932                                  	;pop	bx
 30933 00002E85 C3                      	retn
 30934                                  
 30935                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30936                                  ;*** isSpecified - sets ZF if UMB in AL wasn't specified in DH/LH line.
 30937                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30938                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 30939                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if UMB wasn't specified, ZF clear if it was
 30940                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30941                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30942                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30943                                  
 30944                                  	; 02/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 30945                                  
 30946                                  isSpecified:
 30947                                  	; 02/01/2023
 30948                                  	;push	ax
 30949                                  
 30950 00002E86 30FF                    	xor	bh,bh
 30951 00002E88 88C3                    	mov	bl,al
 30952                                  
 30953                                  	;getdata al,DS:UmbUsed[bx]
 30954                                  	;
 30955                                  	;push	ds
 30956                                  	;push	cs
 30957                                  	;pop	ds
 30958                                  	;mov	al,[bx+UmbUsed]
 30959                                  	;pop	ds
 30960                                  	
 30961                                  	;mov	al,[cs:bx+UmbUsed]
 30962                                  	; 02/01/2023
 30963                                  	; ds = cs
 30964 00002E8A 8A87[BA1F]              	mov	al,[bx+UmbUsed]
 30965                                  
 30966 00002E8E 08C0                    	or	al,al			; Sets ZF if al==0 (ie, if unspecified)
 30967                                  
 30968                                  	; 02/01/2023
 30969 00002E90 58                      	pop	ax
 30970 00002E91 C3                      	retn
 30971                                  
 30972                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30973                                  ;*** shrinkMCB - breaks an MCB into two pieces, the lowest one's size==AX
 30974                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30975                                  ; ENTRY:    AX == new size, ES:0 == current MCB
 30976                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB broken if carry clear
 30977                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if MCB isn't as large as AX+0x20 (not a useful split)
 30978                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30979                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30980                                  ; If the size of the to-be-split MCB isn't at least 0x20 bytes greater than
 30981                                  ; the specified new size, the split is useless; if it's only 0x10 bytes, that
 30982                                  ; 0x10 will be used to make a header that mentions a 0-byte free space, and
 30983                                  ; that just sucks up 0x10 bytes for nothing. So we make 0x20 bytes the
 30984                                  ; minimum for performing a split.
 30985                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30986                                  
 30987                                  MIN_SPLIT_SIZE	equ	20h
 30988                                  
 30989                                  	; 02/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 30990                                  
 30991                                  shrinkMCB:
 30992                                  	;pushreg <bx,cx,es>
 30993                                  	; 02/01/2023
 30994                                  	;push	bx
 30995 00002E92 51                      	push	cx
 30996 00002E93 06                      	push	es
 30997                                  
 30998 00002E94 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; Move things around... and
 30999                                  	; 02/01/2023
 31000                                  	;mov	ax,es			; save this one for later.
 31001                                  
 31002 00002E96 268B0E0300              	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31003                                  	; 02/01/2023
 31004 00002E9B 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx 
 31005                                  
 31006 00002E9D 83E820                  	sub	ax,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 31007                                  	;sub	cx,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 31008                                  	;;cmp	bx,cx			; {New size} vs {Current Size-20h}
 31009                                  	;ja	short smE		; if wanted_size > cur-20h, abort.
 31010                                  	; 18/12/2022
 31011                                  	;cmp	cx,bx
 31012                                  	; 02/01/2023
 31013 00002EA0 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx
 31014 00002EA2 7228                    	jb	short smE ; (*)
 31015                                  
 31016 00002EA4 268A160000              	mov	dl,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31017                                  	
 31018                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31019                                  	; 02/01/2023
 31020 00002EA9 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 31021                                  
 31022 00002EAB 26891E0300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],bx
 31023 00002EB0 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],'M'
 31024                                  
 31025 00002EB6 01D8                    	add	ax,bx
 31026 00002EB8 40                      	inc	ax
 31027 00002EB9 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax			; Move to new arena area
 31028                                  
 31029 00002EBB 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx
 31030 00002EBD 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx
 31031                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31032                                  	; ax > 0
 31033 00002EBF 48                      	dec	ax			; And prepare the new size
 31034                                  
 31035                                  	; 18/12/2022
 31036 00002EC0 2688160000              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],dl
 31037                                  	;mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0 ; (**)
 31038 00002EC5 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax
 31039                                  	;mov	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 31040                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax ; (**)
 31041                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax ; (**)
 31042                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax ; (**)
 31043                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax ; (**)
 31044                                  
 31045                                  	; 18/12/2022
 31046 00002EC9 E8B601                  	call	freeMCB	; (**)
 31047                                  
 31048                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31049                                  	; cf=0
 31050                                  	;clc
 31051                                  	; 18/12/2022
 31052                                  	;jmp	short smX
 31053                                  smE:	
 31054                                  	; 18/12/2022
 31055                                  	; cf=1 (*)
 31056                                  	;stc
 31057                                  smX:	
 31058                                  	;popreg	<es,cx,bx>
 31059 00002ECC 07                      	pop	es
 31060 00002ECD 59                      	pop	cx
 31061                                  	; 02/01/2023
 31062                                  	;pop	bx
 31063 00002ECE C3                      	retn
 31064                                  
 31065                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31066                                  ;*** hideUMB? - hides as appropriate the UMB in CL
 31067                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31068                                  ; ENTRY:    CL should be to a valid UMB number, and AX to its address (findUMB)
 31069                                  ; EXIT:     None; UMB is hidden as necessary
 31070                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31071                                  ; USES:     Flags, AX, CX
 31072                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31073                                  ; PRIMARY LOGIC:
 31074                                  ;
 31075                                  ; If the UMB is specified in the DH/LH statement, then:
 31076                                  ;    If the largest free segment is too small (check specified size), then:
 31077                                  ;       Pretend it wasn't ever specified, and fall out of this IF.
 31078                                  ;    Else, if largest free segment is LARGER than specified size, then:
 31079                                  ;       If /S was given on the command-line, then:
 31080                                  ;          Break that element into two pieces
 31081                                  ;          Set a flag that we're shrinking
 31082                                  ;       Endif
 31083                                  ;    Endif
 31084                                  ; Endif
 31085                                  ; If the UMB is NOT specified (or was removed by the above):
 31086                                  ;    Hide all free elements in the UMB
 31087                                  ;    If the flag that we're shrinking was set, then:
 31088                                  ;       UN-hide the lower portion of the shrunken UMB
 31089                                  ;    ENDIF
 31090                                  ; ENDIF
 31091                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31092                                  
 31093                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 31094                                  	; (SYSINIT:3426h)
 31095                                  _hideUMB_:
 31096                                  	; 02/01/2023
 31097                                  	; ds = cs
 31098                                  
 31099                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31100                                  	;push	bx
 31101                                  	;push	dx
 31102 00002ECF 06                      	push	es
 31103                                  
 31104 00002ED0 88C8                    	mov	al,cl
 31105 00002ED2 E8B1FF                  	call	isSpecified	; Returns ZF set if al's umb was NOT specified
 31106 00002ED5 742D                    	jz	short hu_20
 31107                                  
 31108 00002ED7 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the size of the largest
 31109 00002ED9 E868FF                  	call	BigFree		; free element in AX; put its address in ES
 31110 00002EDC 7226                    	jc	short hu_20	; Oops. Errors mean skip this part.
 31111                                  
 31112 00002EDE 50                      	push	ax		; TOS==size of BigFree in UMB (popped as BX)
 31113 00002EDF 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the user's specified
 31114 00002EE1 E8ACFE                  	call	GetSize		; minimum size for this umb (into AX)
 31115 00002EE4 5B                      	pop	bx		; Now BX==BigFree, AX==Specified Size
 31116                                  
 31117 00002EE5 09C0                    	or	ax,ax		; If they didn't specify one,
 31118 00002EE7 741B                    	jz	short hu_20	; Skip over all this.
 31119                                  
 31120 00002EE9 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx		; Ah... if (specified > max free)
 31121 00002EEB 7607                    	jbe	short hu_10
 31122                                  
 31123 00002EED 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		;  Then mark that UMB as unused. Nya nya.
 31124 00002EEF E8F2FC                  	call	unMarkUMB
 31125 00002EF2 EB10                    	jmp	short hu_20
 31126                                  hu_10:	
 31127                                  	;call	isTiny		; Returns ZF clear if user specified /S
 31128                                  	;jz	short hu_20
 31129                                  	; 02/01/2023
 31130                                  ;isTiny:
 31131                                  	;mov	al,[fUmbTiny] ; ds = cs
 31132                                  	;or	al,al
 31133 00002EF4 800E[B61F]00            	or	byte [fUmbTiny],0
 31134 00002EF9 7409                    	jz	short hu_20
 31135                                  
 31136 00002EFB E894FF                  	call	shrinkMCB	; They specified /S, so shrink the MCB to AX
 31137 00002EFE 7204                    	jc	short hu_20	; Ah... if didn't shrink after all, skip this:
 31138                                  
 31139 00002F00 8CC2                    	mov	dx,es
 31140 00002F02 EB09                    	jmp	short hu_30	; Skip the spec check.. we wanna hide this one.
 31141                                  
 31142 00002F04 89C8                    hu_20:	mov	ax,cx
 31143 00002F06 E87DFF                  	call	isSpecified	; If they specified this UMB, we're done...
 31144 00002F09 7510                    	jnz	short hu_X	; so leave.
 31145                                  
 31146 00002F0B 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 31147                                  hu_30:	
 31148 00002F0D 88C8                    	mov	al,cl
 31149                                  
 31150 00002F0F E898FE                  	call	hideUMB		; Hides everything in UMB #al
 31151                                  
 31152 00002F12 09D2                    	or	dx,dx		; Did we shrink a UMB? If not, DX==0,
 31153 00002F14 7405                    	jz	short hu_X	; So we should leave.
 31154                                  
 31155 00002F16 8EC2                    	mov	es,dx		; Ah, but if it isn't, DX==the MCB's address;
 31156 00002F18 E8E1FE                  	call	unHideMCB	; Un-hides the lower portion of that MCB.
 31157                                  hu_X:	
 31158 00002F1B 07                      	pop	es
 31159                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31160                                  	;pop	dx
 31161                                  	;pop	bx
 31162 00002F1C C3                      	retn
 31163                                  
 31164                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31165                                  ;*** UnFreeze - Marks FROZEN elements as FREE
 31166                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31167                                  ; Entry:  None
 31168                                  ; Exit:   None; all 8+FROZEN elements are marked as FREE, from any UMB.
 31169                                  ; Error:  None
 31170                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 31171                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31172                                  
 31173                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 31174                                  
 31175                                  UnFreeze:
 31176                                  	; 03/01/2023
 31177                                  	;push	ax
 31178 00002F1D 06                      	push	es
 31179                                  
 31180 00002F1E E8B6FD                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 31181 00002F21 721E                    	jc	short ufX
 31182                                  
 31183 00002F23 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 31184                                  
 31185                                  ; ------------------------------
 31186                                  ; UF10--ES - Current MCB address
 31187                                  ; ------------------------------
 31188                                  
 31189 00002F25 E81B00                  uf10:	call	isFrozMCB	; Returns with ZF set if MCB is FROZEN
 31190 00002F28 7503                    	jnz	short uf20
 31191 00002F2A E8CFFE                  	call	unHideMCB
 31192                                  uf20:	
 31193 00002F2D 26A00000                	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31194                                  
 31195 00002F31 3C5A                    	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 31196 00002F33 740C                    	jz	short ufX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 31197                                  
 31198                                  	;NextMCB es,ax		; Go on forward.
 31199 00002F35 8CC0                    	mov     ax,es
 31200                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 31201 00002F37 2603060300              	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31202 00002F3C 40                      	inc     ax
 31203 00002F3D 8EC0                    	mov     es,ax
 31204                                  
 31205 00002F3F EBE4                    	jmp	short uf10
 31206                                  ufX:	
 31207 00002F41 07                      	pop	es
 31208                                  	; 03/01/2023
 31209                                  	;pop	ax
 31210 00002F42 C3                      	retn
 31211                                  
 31212                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31213                                  ;*** isFrozMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is FROZEN
 31214                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31215                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 31216                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is frozen, else !ZF
 31217                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31218                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31219                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31220                                  
 31221                                  isFrozMCB:
 31222                                  	;push	ax
 31223                                  
 31224                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.OWNER]	; Check the owner...
 31225                                  	;cmp	ax,SystemPSPOwner	; 8 (for US OR Japan) is valid
 31226 00002F43 26833E010008            	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner
 31227 00002F49 7522                    	jne	short ifmX
 31228                                  
 31229                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+0]
 31230                                  	;cmp	ax,'FR' ; 5246h
 31231 00002F4B 26813E08004652          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'FR'
 31232 00002F52 7519                    	jne	short ifmX
 31233                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+2]
 31234                                  	;cmp	ax,'OZ' ; 5A4Fh
 31235 00002F54 26813E0A004F5A          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'OZ'
 31236 00002F5B 7510                    	jne	short ifmX
 31237                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+4]
 31238                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h
 31239 00002F5D 26813E0C00454E          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 31240 00002F64 7507                    	jne	short ifmX
 31241                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+6]
 31242                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 31243 00002F66 26813E0E002020          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 31244                                  ifmX:

 31246 00002F6D C3                      	retn

 31248                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31249                                  ;*** frezMCB - marks as 8+FROZEN the MCB at ES:0
 31250                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 31252                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB frozen
 31253                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31254                                  ; USES:     None

 31264                                  
 31265                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31266                                  ;*** FreezeUM - Marks FROZEN all UM elements now FREE, save those in load UMB
 31267                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31268                                  ; Entry:  None
 31269                                  ; Exit:   None; all free elements not in load UMB marked as 8+FROZEN
 31270                                  ; Error:  None
 31271                                  ; Uses:   Flags

 31287                                  
 31288 00002F96 30E4                    	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 31289 00002F98 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax		; Store the load UMB in DX, so we can skip it
 31290                                  
 31291 00002F9A E83AFD                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 31292 00002F9D 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 31293 00002F9F 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 31294                                  
 31295                                  ; -----------------------------------------
 31296                                  ; FUM10--ES - Current MCB address
 31297                                  ;        CX - Current UMB number
 31298                                  ;        DX - UMB number to skip (load UMB)
 31299                                  ; -----------------------------------------
 31300

 31302 00002FA4 7501                    	jnz	short fum20
 31303                                  
 31304 00002FA6 41                      	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 31305                                  fum20:	
 31306 00002FA7 39D1                    	cmp	cx,dx		; If this is the load UMB, we don't want to
 31307 00002FA9 740B                    	je	short fum30	; freeze anything... so skip that section.
 31308                                  
 31309                                  	;call	isFreeMCB	; Oh. If it's not free, we can't freeze it
 31310 00002FAB 26830E010000            	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 31311 00002FB1 7503                    	jnz	short fum30	; either.
 31312                                  
 31313 00002FB3 E8B8FF                  	call	frezMCB
 31314                                  fum30:	
 31315 00002FB6 26A00000                	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31316 00002FBA 3C5A                    	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 31317 00002FBC 740C                    	je	short fumX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 31318                                  
 31319                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 31320 00002FBE 8CC0                    	mov     ax,es
 31321                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 31322 00002FC0 2603060300              	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31323 00002FC5 40                      	inc     ax
 31324 00002FC6 8EC0                    	mov     es,ax
 31325                                  	
 31326 00002FC8 EBD7                    	jmp	short fum10
 31327                                  
 31328 00002FCA 07                      fumX:	pop	es
 31329                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31330                                  	;pop	dx
 31331                                  	;pop	cx
 31332                                  	;pop	ax
 31333 00002FCB C3                      	retn
 31334                                  
 31335                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31336                                  ;*** UmbTest - returns with carry set if UMBs are not available, else CF==false
 31337                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31338                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 31339                                  ; EXIT:     Carry is clear if UMBs are available, or set if they are not
 31340                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31341                                  ; USES:     CF (AX,BX,DS,ES pushed 'cause they're used by others)

 31370                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31371                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 31372                                  ; EXIT:     Carry SET if MCB chain stops before 9FFF, CLEAR if stops >= 9FFF.
 31373                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31374                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31375                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31376                                  
 31377                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)

 31381                                  	;push	ax ; ?
 31382                                  	;push	bx ; ?
 31383                                  	;;push	ds ; ? ; 01/01/2023 (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS, SYSINIT:352Fh)
 31384                                  	;push	es ; ? no need to save contents of these registers ?
 31385

 31387 00002FDE CD21                    	int	21h
 31388                                  
 31389 00002FE0 268B47FE                	mov	ax,[es:bx-2]
 31390 00002FE4 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 31391                                  
 31392                                  ; ------------------------------
 31393                                  ; UM10: ES = Current MCB pointer
 31394                                  ; ------------------------------
 31395                                  
 31396 00002FE6 26A00000                um10:	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31397 00002FEA 3C5A                    	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 31398 00002FEC 740C                    	je	short um20		; If signature == 'Z', hay no more.
 31399                                  
 31400                                  	;NextMCB es,bx			; Move to the next MCB
 31401

 31403                                  	;add	bx,[es:3]

 31405 00002FF5 43                      	inc     bx
 31406 00002FF6 8EC3                    	mov     es,bx
 31407

 31409                                  um20:

 31411                                  
 31412 00002FFC 3DFF9F                  	cmp	ax,9FFFh		; This sets CF iff ax < 9FFF.
 31413                                  
 31414                                  	;pop	es ; ?
 31415                                  	;;pop	ds ; ? ; 01/01/2023 (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS, SYSINIT:353Dh)
 31416                                  	;pop	bx ; ?
 31417                                  	;pop	ax ; ?
 31418                                  	
 31419 00002FFF C3                      	retn

 31589 0000303B 7503                    	jnz	short fus20

 31625 00003066 7519                    	jne	short ihm_x

 31628 00003068 26813E0A004444          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'DD'

 31700                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31701                                  ;*** linkumb - links UMBs not already linked in; updates fm_umb as needed

 31727                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 31728                                  ; SYSCONF.ASM (MSDOS 6.0 - 1991) 	
 31729                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 31730                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31731                                  
 31732                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31733                                  ;
 31734                                  ; procedure : InitDevLoad
 31735                                  ;
 31736                                  ;	Input : DeviceHi = 0 indicates load DD in low memory
 31737                                  ;			 = 1 indicates load in UMB:
 31738                                  ;		           ConvLoad = 0 indicates a new-style load (see below)
 31739                                  ;		                    = 1 indicates a DOS 5-style load
 31740                                  ;		DevSize  = Size of the device driver file in paras
 31741                                  ;
 31742                                  ;	Output : none
 31743                                  ;
 31744                                  ;	Initializes DevLoadAddr, DevLoadEnd & DevEntry.
 31745                                  ;	Also sets up a header for the Device driver entry for mem utility
 31746                                  ;
 31747                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31748                                  ; For a "new-style load", we break off the current DevEntry and link the umbs
 31749                                  ; as we see fit, using HideUMBs (and UnHideUMBs at exit, though _it_ decides
 31750                                  ; whether it's entitled to do anything). HideUMBs uses the chart built by
 31751                                  ; ParseVar to determine which UMBs to leave FREE, and which not.
 31752                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31753                                  
 31754                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31755                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 31756                                  	; (SYSINIT:364Ah)
 31757                                  InitDevLoad:
 31758                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31759                                  	;push	es ; *
 31760                                  
 31761                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31762                                  	; ds = cs
 31763 000030BC 803E[0B20]00            	cmp	byte [DeviceHi],0
 31764                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; Are we loading in UMB ?
 31765                                  	;je	short InitForLo		; no, init for lo mem
 31766 000030C1 743B                    	je	short initforlo_x ; 09/04/2019
 31767                                  
 31768                                  ; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 31769                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31770                                  ; %if 0
 31771                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31772 000030C3 803E[FB1F]01            	cmp	byte [ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 31773                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 31774 000030C8 7415                    	je	short InitForConv
 31775                                  
 31776                                  ; There are two stages to preparing upper-memory; first, we mark as 8+HIDDEN
 31777                                  ; any areas not specified on the /L:... chain. Second, we mark as 8+FROZEN
 31778                                  ; any areas left in upper-memory, except for elements in the load UMB...
 31779                                  ; we then malloc space as per Dos-5 style, and mark as free any spaces which
 31780                                  ; are 8+FROZEN (but leave 8+HIDDEN still hidden). The load is performed,
 31781                                  ; and UnHideUMBs later on marks all 8+HIDDEN as free.
 31782                                  
 31783 000030CA E87A04                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; Stop using the old device arena
 31784                                  
 31785 000030CD E883FC                  	call	HideUMBs		; Mark up the UM area as we see fit
 31786 000030D0 E8BFFE                  	call	FreezeUM		; Hide everything BUT the load area
 31787 000030D3 E85900                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; And grab that load area as needed
 31788 000030D6 9C                      	pushf
 31789 000030D7 E843FE                  	call	UnFreeze		; Then unhide everything frozen
 31790 000030DA 9D                      	popf
 31791                                  
 31792 000030DB 721C                    	jc	short InitForLo		; (if carry, it's loading low)
 31793                                  
 31794 000030DD EB0D                    	jmp	short InitForHi
 31795                                  
 31796                                  ;%endif ; 01/11/2022
 31797                                  
 31798                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31799                                  	; (SYSINIT:2B67h)
 31800                                  InitForConv:
 31801                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31802                                  	; ds = cs
 31803 000030DF E83700                  	call	SpaceInUMB		; Do we have space left in the
 31804                                  					;  current UMB ?
 31805 000030E2 7308                    	jnc	short InitForHi		; yes, we have
 31806 000030E4 E86004                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; shrink the current UMB in use
 31807 000030E7 E84500                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; else try to allocate new UMB
 31808 000030EA 720D                    	jc	short InitForLo		; we didn't succeed, so load
 31809                                  					;  in low memory
 31810                                  InitForHi:
 31811                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31812                                  	; ds = cs
 31813                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; get Para addr of free mem
 31814                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; UMB start addr
 31815                                  	;add	dx,[cs:DevUMBSize]	; DX = UMB End addr
 31816 000030EC A1[0120]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBFree]
 31817 000030EF 8B16[FD1F]              	mov	dx,[DevUMBAddr]
 31818 000030F3 0316[FF1F]              	add	dx,[DevUMBSize]
 31819 000030F7 EB0C                    	jmp	short idl1
 31820                                  
 31821                                  InitForLo:
 31822                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31823                                  	; ds = cs
 31824                                  	;mov	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; in case we failed to load
 31825 000030F9 C606[0B20]00            	mov	byte [DeviceHi],0
 31826                                  initforlo_x:
 31827                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31828                                  	; ds = cs
 31829                                  					;  into UMB indicate that
 31830                                  					;  we are loading low
 31831                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; AX = start of Low memory
 31832                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; DX = End of Low memory
 31833 000030FE A1[6203]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 31834 00003101 8B16[A302]              	mov	dx,[ALLOCLIM]
 31835                                  idl1:
 31836 00003105 E86C00                  	call	DevSetMark		; setup a sub-arena for DD
 31837                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31838                                  	; ds = cs
 31839                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadAddr],ax	; init the Device load address
 31840                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadEnd],dx	; init the limit of the block
 31841                                  	;mov	word [cs:DevEntry],0	; init Entry point to DD
 31842                                  	;mov	[cs:DevEntry+2],ax
 31843 00003108 A3[EF1F]                	mov	[DevLoadAddr],ax
 31844 0000310B 8916[F11F]              	mov	[DevLoadEnd],dx
 31845 0000310F C706[F31F]0000          	mov	word [DevEntry],0
 31846 00003115 A3[F51F]                	mov	[DevEntry+2],ax
 31847                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31848                                  	;pop	es ; *
 31849 00003118 C3                      	retn
 31850                                  
 31851                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31852                                  ;
 31853                                  ; procedure : SpaceInUMB?
 31854                                  ;
 31855                                  ;	Input : DevUMBAddr, DevUMBSize, DevUMBFree & DevSize
 31856                                  ;	Output : Carry set if no space in UMB
 31857                                  ;		 Carry clear if Space is available for the device in
 31858                                  ;		   current UMB
 31859                                  ;
 31860                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31861                                  
 31862                                  SpaceInUMB:
 31863                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31864                                  	; ds = cs
 31865                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBSize]
 31866                                  	;add	ax,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; End of UMB
 31867                                  	;sub	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; - Free = Remaining space
 31868 00003119 A1[FF1F]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBSize]
 31869 0000311C 0306[FD1F]              	add	ax,[DevUMBAddr]		; End of UMB
 31870 00003120 2B06[0120]              	sub	ax,[DevUMBFree]		; - Free = Remaining space
 31871                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31872                                  	;or	ax,ax			; Nospace ?
 31873                                  	;jnz	short spcinumb1
 31874                                  	;stc
 31875                                  	;retn
 31876                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31877 00003124 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1
 31878 00003127 7205                    	jb	short spcinumb2	; cf=1
 31879                                  spcinumb1:
 31880 00003129 48                      	dec	ax			; space for sub-arena
 31881                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31882                                  	; ds = cs
 31883 0000312A 3B06[ED1F]              	cmp	ax,[DevSize]
 31884                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:DevSize]		; do we have space ?
 31885                                  spcinumb2:
 31886 0000312E C3                      	retn
 31887                                  
 31888                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31889                                  ;
 31890                                  ; procedure : PrepareMark
 31891                                  ;
 31892                                  ;	Input : AX==Address of MCB (not addr of free space), BX==Size
 31893                                  ;	Output : None; MCB marked appropriately and DevUMB* set as needed.
 31894                                  ;
 31895                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31896                                  
 31897                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31898                                  ;
 31899                                  ;PrepareMark:
 31900                                  ;	push	ds
 31901                                  ;	mov	ds,ax
 31902                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 31903                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 31904                                  ;	pop	ds
 31905                                  ;
 31906                                  ;	inc	ax
 31907                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 31908                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 31909                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 31910                                  ;	retn
 31911                                  
 31912                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31913                                  ;
 31914                                  ; procedure : GetUMBForDev
 31915                                  ;
 31916                                  ;	Input : DevSize
 31917                                  ;	Output : Carry set if couldn't allocate a UMB to fit the
 31918                                  ;		 the device.
 31919                                  ;		 If success carry clear
 31920                                  ;
 31921                                  ;	Allocates the biggest UMB for loading devices and updates
 31922                                  ;	DevUMBSize, DevUMBAddr & DevUMBFree if it succeeded in allocating
 31923                                  ;	UMB.
 31924                                  ;
 31925                                  ;	This routine relies on the fact that all of the low memory
 31926                                  ;	is allocated, and any DOS alloc calls should return memory
 31927                                  ;	from the UMB pool.
 31928                                  ;
 31929                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31930                                  
 31931                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31932                                  	; (SYSINIT:2BC6h)
 31933                                  
 31934                                  GetUMBForDev:
 31935                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31936                                  	; ds = cs
 31937 0000312F BBFFFF                  	mov	bx,0FFFFh
 31938 00003132 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 31939 00003135 CD21                    	int	21h
 31940                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ALLOCATE MEMORY
 31941                                  		; BX = number of 16-byte paragraphs desired
 31942                                  
 31943 00003137 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 31944 00003139 742C                    	jz	short gufd_err
 31945                                  
 31946 0000313B 4B                      	dec	bx
 31947                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31948                                  	; ds = cs
 31949 0000313C 391E[ED1F]              	cmp	[DevSize],bx
 31950                                  	;cmp	[cs:DevSize],bx
 31951 00003140 7725                    	ja	short gufd_err
 31952 00003142 43                      	inc	bx
 31953                                  
 31954 00003143 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 31955 00003146 CD21                    	int	21h
 31956 00003148 721D                    	jc	short gufd_err
 31957                                  
 31958                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31959                                  	;dec	ax
 31960                                  	;call	PrepareMark
 31961                                  	;
 31962                                  PrepareMark:
 31963 0000314A 1E                      	push	ds
 31964 0000314B 48                      	dec	ax
 31965 0000314C 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 31966 0000314E C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 31967 00003154 C70608005344            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 31968 0000315A 40                      	inc	ax
 31969 0000315B 1F                      	pop	ds
 31970                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31971                                  	; ds = cs
 31972                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 31973                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 31974                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 31975 0000315C 891E[FF1F]              	mov	[DevUMBSize],bx		; update the UMB Variables
 31976 00003160 A3[FD1F]                	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 31977 00003163 A3[0120]                	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 31978                                  	;
 31979                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31980                                  	; cf=0
 31981                                  	;clc				; mark no error
 31982 00003166 C3                      	retn
 31983                                  gufd_err:
 31984 00003167 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 31985                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31986                                  	; ds = cs
 31987                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],ax	; erase the previous values
 31988                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 31989                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 31990 00003169 A3[FF1F]                	mov	[DevUMBSize],ax		; erase the previous values
 31991 0000316C A3[FD1F]                	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 31992 0000316F A3[0120]                	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 31993 00003172 F9                      	stc
 31994 00003173 C3                      	retn

 31997                                  ;
 31998                                  ; procedure : DevSetMark
 31999                                  ;
 32000                                  ;	Input : AX - Free segment were device is going to be loaded
 32001                                  ;	Output : AX - Segment at which device can be loaded (AX=AX+1)
 32002                                  ;
 32003                                  ;	Creates a sub-arena for the device driver
 32004                                  ;	puts 'D' marker in the sub-arena
 32005                                  ;	Put the owner of the sub-arena as (AX+1)
 32006                                  ;	Copies the file name into sub-arena name field
 32007                                  ;
 32008                                  ;	Size field of the sub-arena will be set only at succesful
 32009                                  ;	completion of Device load.
 32010                                  ;
 32011                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32012                                  
 32013                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32014                                  	; (SYSINIT:2C13h)
 32015                                  
 32016                                  DevSetMark:
 32017 00003174 06                      	push	es
 32018                                  	; 03/01/2023
 32019                                  	;push	di
 32020 00003175 1E                      	push	ds
 32021 00003176 56                      	push	si
 32022 00003177 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32023 00003179 26C606000044            	mov	byte [es:devmark.id],devmark_device ; 'D'
 32024 0000317F 40                      	inc	ax
 32025 00003180 26A30100                	mov	[es:devmark.seg],ax
 32026                                  
 32027                                  ;-------------- Copy file name
 32028                                  
 32029 00003184 50                      	push	ax			; save load addr
 32030 00003185 2EC536[7A03]            	lds	si,[cs:bpb_addr]	; command line is still there
 32031                                  
 32032 0000318A 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 32033 0000318C FC                      	cld
 32034                                  dsm_again:
 32035 0000318D AC                      	lodsb
 32036 0000318E 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 32037 00003190 7504                    	jne	short isit_slash
 32038 00003192 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 32039 00003194 EBF7                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 32040                                  isit_slash:
 32041 00003196 3C5C                    	cmp	al, '\'
 32042 00003198 7504                    	jne	short isit_null
 32043 0000319A 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 32044 0000319C EBEF                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 32045                                  isit_null:
 32046 0000319E 08C0                    	or	al,al
 32047 000031A0 75EB                    	jnz	short dsm_again
 32048 000031A2 89FE                    	mov	si,di
 32049                                  
 32050 000031A4 BF0800                  	mov	di,devmark.filename ; 8
 32051 000031A7 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			; maximum 8 characters
 32052                                  dsm_next_char:
 32053 000031AA AC                      	lodsb
 32054 000031AB 08C0                    	or	al, al
 32055 000031AD 7407                    	jz	short blankout
 32056 000031AF 3C2E                    	cmp	al, '.'
 32057 000031B1 7403                    	je	short blankout
 32058 000031B3 AA                      	stosb
 32059 000031B4 E2F4                    	loop	dsm_next_char
 32060                                  blankout:
 32061 000031B6 E304                    	jcxz	dsm_exit
 32062 000031B8 B020                    	mov	al, ' '
 32063 000031BA F3AA                    	rep	stosb			; blank out the rest
 32064                                  dsm_exit:
 32065 000031BC 58                      	pop	ax			; restore load addr
 32066 000031BD 5E                      	pop	si
 32067 000031BE 1F                      	pop	ds
 32068                                  	; 03/01/2023
 32069                                  	;pop	di
 32070 000031BF 07                      	pop	es
 32071 000031C0 C3                      	retn
 32072                                  
 32073                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32074                                  ;
 32075                                  ; procedure : SizeDevice
 32076                                  ;
 32077                                  ;	Input : ES:SI - points to device file to be sized
 32078                                  ;
 32079                                  ;	Output : Carry set if file cannot be opened or if it is an OS2EXE file
 32080                                  ;
 32081                                  ;	Calculates the size of the device file in paras and stores it
 32082                                  ;	in DevSize
 32083                                  ;
 32084                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32085                                  
 32086                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32087                                  SizeDevice:
 32088                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32089                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *
 32090 000031C1 1E                      	push	ds ; *
 32091 000031C2 06                      	push	es
 32092 000031C3 1F                      	pop	ds
 32093 000031C4 89F2                    	mov	dx,si			; ds:dx -> file name
 32094 000031C6 B8003D                  	mov	ax,3D00h		; open
 32095 000031C9 CD21                    	int	21h
 32096 000031CB 7243                    	jc	short sd_err		; open failed
 32097                                  
 32098 000031CD 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; BX - file handle
 32099 000031CF B80242                  	mov	ax,4202h		; seek
 32100 000031D2 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 32101 000031D4 89CA                    	mov	dx,cx			; to end of file
 32102 000031D6 CD21                    	int	21h
 32103 000031D8 722F                    	jc	short sd_close		; did seek fail (impossible)
 32104 000031DA 83C00F                  	add	ax,15			; para convert
 32105 000031DD 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 32106 000031E0 F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h		; size > 0ffff paras ?
 32107 000031E4 7409                    	jz	short szdev1		; no
 32108 000031E6 2EC706[ED1F]FFFF        	mov	word [cs:DevSize],0FFFFh ; invalid device size
 32109                                  					; assuming that we fail later
 32110 000031ED EB1A                    	jmp	short sd_close
 32111                                  szdev1:
 32112 000031EF B104                    	mov	cl,4			; convert it to paras
 32113 000031F1 D3E8                    	shr	ax,cl
 32114 000031F3 B10C                    	mov	cl,12
 32115 000031F5 D3E2                    	shl	dx,cl
 32116 000031F7 09D0                    	or	ax,dx
 32117                                  	;
 32118                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32119 000031F9 2E3B06[0C20]            	cmp     ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 32120 000031FE 7705                    	ja      short szdev2
 32121 00003200 2EA1[0C20]              	mov     ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 32122                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32123 00003204 F8                      	clc
 32124                                  szdev2:
 32125 00003205 2EA3[ED1F]              	mov	[cs:DevSize],ax		; save file size
 32126                                  
 32127                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32128                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32129                                  	; cf=0
 32130                                  	;clc
 32131                                  sd_close:
 32132 00003209 9C                      	pushf				; let close not spoil our
 32133                                  					;  carry flag
 32134 0000320A B8003E                  	mov	ax,3E00h		; close
 32135 0000320D CD21                    	int	21h			; we are not checking for err
 32136 0000320F 9D                      	popf
 32137                                  sd_err:
 32138                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32139                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *
 32140 00003210 1F                      	pop     ds ; *
 32141 00003211 C3                      	retn
 32142                                  
 32143                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32144                                  ;
 32145                                  ; procedure : ExecDev
 32146                                  ;
 32147                                  ;	Input : ds:dx -> device to be executed
 32148                                  ;		DevLoadAddr - contains where device has to be loaded
 32149                                  ;
 32150                                  ;	Output : Carry if error
 32151                                  ;		 Carry clear if no error
 32152                                  ;
 32153                                  ;	Loads a device driver using the 4b03h function call
 32154                                  ;
 32155                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32156                                  
 32157                                  	; 01/11/2022
 32158                                  ExecDev:
 32159 00003212 2E8B1E[EF1F]            	mov	bx,[cs:DevLoadAddr]

 32161                                  					;  block for exec with
 32162                                  					;  Load address
 32163 0000321C 2E891E[0920]            	mov	[cs:DevExecReloc],bx

 32167 00003228 B003                    	mov	al,3	; (load program only)

 32171                                  		; DS:DX -> ASCIZ filename
 32172                                  		; ES:BX -> parameter block
 32173                                  		; AL = subfunction

 32214                                  ; procedure : RemoveNull
 32215                                  ;
 32216                                  ;	Input : ES:SI points to a null terminated string
 32217                                  ;
 32218                                  ;	Output : none
 32219                                  ;
 32220                                  ;	Replaces the null at the end of a string with blank
 32221                                  ;

 32240                                  	; 02/11/2022

 32246                                  ;
 32247                                  ; procedure : RoundBreakAddr
 32248                                  ;
 32249                                  ;	Input : DevBrkAddr
 32250                                  ;	Output : DevBrkAddr
 32251                                  ;

 32462                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32463                                  ;
 32464                                  ; procedure : GetHexNum
 32465                                  ;
 32466                                  ;	Converts an ascii string terminated by a delimiter into binary.
 32467                                  ;	Assumes that the ES:SI points to a Hexadecimal string
 32468                                  ;
 32469                                  ;	Returns in AX the number number of paras equivalent to the
 32470                                  ;	hex number of bytes specified by the hexadecimal string.
 32471                                  ;
 32472                                  ;	Returns carry in case it encountered a non-hex character or
 32473                                  ;	if it encountered crlf
 32474                                  ;
 32475                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32476                                  
 32477                                  ; 13/05/2019
 32478                                  
 32479                                  	; 036/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 32480                                  	; (SYSINIT:38C5h)
 32481                                  
 32482                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32483                                  	; (SYSINIT:2DA5h)
 32484                                  GetHexNum:
 32485 00003308 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 32486 0000330A 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 32487                                  ghn_next:
 32488 0000330C 268A1C                  	mov	bl,[es:si]
 32489 0000330F 80FB0D                  	cmp	bl,cr  ; 0Dh
 32490 00003312 7436                    	je	short ghn_err
 32491 00003314 80FB0A                  	cmp	bl,lf  ; 0Ah
 32492 00003317 7431                    	je	short ghn_err
 32493 00003319 50                      	push	ax
 32494 0000331A 88D8                    	mov	al,bl
 32495 0000331C E8FA0F                  	call	delim
 32496 0000331F 58                      	pop	ax
 32497                                  	; 03/01/2023
 32498 00003320 B90400                  	mov	cx, 4
 32499 00003323 7410                    	jz	short ghn_into_paras
 32500 00003325 E82400                  	call	GetNibble
 32501                                  	;jc	short ghn_err
 32502                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32503 00003328 7221                    	jc	short ghn_ret ; cf=1
 32504                                  	; 03/01/2023
 32505                                  	;mov	cx,4
 32506                                  ghn_shift1:
 32507 0000332A D1E0                    	shl	ax,1
 32508 0000332C D1D2                    	rcl	dx,1
 32509 0000332E E2FA                    	loop	ghn_shift1
 32510 00003330 08D8                    	or	al,bl
 32511 00003332 46                      	inc	si
 32512 00003333 EBD7                    	jmp	short ghn_next
 32513                                  ghn_into_paras:
 32514 00003335 83C00F                  	add	ax,15
 32515 00003338 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 32516 0000333B F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h
 32517 0000333F 7509                    	jnz	short ghn_err
 32518                                  	; 03/01/2023
 32519                                  	;mov	cx,4
 32520                                  ghn_shift2:
 32521 00003341 F8                      	clc
 32522 00003342 D1DA                    	rcr	dx,1
 32523 00003344 D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 32524 00003346 E2F9                    	loop	ghn_shift2
 32525 00003348 F8                      	clc
 32526 00003349 C3                      	retn
 32527                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32528                                  ghn_err:
 32529                                  gnib_err:
 32530 0000334A F9                      	stc
 32531                                  ghn_ret:
 32532                                  gnib_ret:
 32533 0000334B C3                      	retn

 32536                                  ;
 32537                                  ; procedure : GetNibble
 32538                                  ;
 32539                                  ;	Convert one nibble (hex digit) in BL into binary
 32540                                  ;
 32541                                  ;	Returns binary value in BL
 32542                                  ;
 32543                                  ;	Returns carry if BL contains non-hex digit
 32544                                  ;
 32545                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32546                                  
 32547                                  GetNibble:
 32548 0000334C 80FB30                  	cmp	bl,'0'
 32549                                  	;jb	short gnib_err
 32550                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32551 0000334F 72FA                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 32552 00003351 80FB39                  	cmp	bl,'9'
 32553 00003354 7704                    	ja	short is_it_hex
 32554 00003356 80EB30                  	sub	bl,'0'		; clc
 32555 00003359 C3                      	retn
 32556                                  is_it_hex:
 32557 0000335A 80FB41                  	cmp	bl,'A'
 32558                                  	;jb	short gnib_err
 32559                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32560 0000335D 72EC                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 32561 0000335F 80FB46                  	cmp	bl,'F'
 32562 00003362 77E6                    	ja	short gnib_err ; 11/12/2022
 32563 00003364 80EB37                  	sub	bl,'A'- 10	; clc
 32564 00003367 C3                      	retn
 32565                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32566                                  ;gnib_err:
 32567                                  ;	stc
 32568                                  ;gnib_ret:
 32569                                  ;	retn

 32654                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32655                                  ;
 32656                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_allocate
 32657                                  ;
 32658                                  ; Inputs		: DS = data
 32659                                  ;
 32660                                  ; Outputs		: if UMB available
 32661                                  ;				Allocates the largest available UMB and 
 32662                                  ;			  	BX = segment of allocated block
 32663                                  ;				DX = size of allocated block
 32664                                  ;				NC
 32665                                  ;			  else 
 32666                                  ;				CY
 32667                                  ;
 32668                                  ; Uses			: BX, DX
 32669                                  ;
 32670                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32671                                  
 32672                                  umb_allocate:
 32673                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32674                                  	; ds = cs
 32675 000033A9 50                      	push	ax
 32676 000033AA B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 32677 000033AC BAFFFF                  	mov	dx,0FFFFh		; try to allocate largest
 32678                                  					;   possible
 32679                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32680 000033AF FF1E[0320]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 32681                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 32682                                  					; dx now contains the size of
 32683                                  					; the largest UMB
 32684 000033B3 09D2                    	or	dx,dx
 32685 000033B5 740D                    	jz	short ua_err
 32686                                  	
 32687 000033B7 B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 32688                                  
 32689                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32690 000033B9 FF1E[0320]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 32691                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 32692                                  
 32693 000033BD 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1			; Q: was the reqst successful
 32694 000033C0 7502                    	jne	short ua_err		; N: error
 32695                                  	;clc
 32696                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32697                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32698                                  	; cf=0
 32699                                  	;clc 
 32700                                  ua_done:
 32701 000033C2 58                      	pop	ax
 32702 000033C3 C3                      	retn
 32703                                  ua_err:
 32704 000033C4 F9                      	stc
 32705 000033C5 EBFB                    	jmp	short ua_done
