 32707                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32708                                  ;
 32709                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_insert
 32710                                  ;
 32711                                  ; Inputs		: DOSDATA:UMB_HEAD = start of umb chain
 32712                                  ;			: BX = seg address of UMB to be linked in
 32713                                  ;			: DX = size of UMB to be linked in paras
 32714                                  ;			; DS = data
 32715                                  ;
 32716                                  ; Outputs		: links the UMB into the arena chain
 32717                                  ;
 32718                                  ; Uses			: AX, CX, ES, DX, BX
 32719                                  ;
 32720                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32721                                  
 32722                                  umb_insert:
 32723 000033C7 1E                      	push	ds
 32724                                  
 32725                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32726                                  	; ds = cs
 32727                                  
 32728                                  	;mov	ds,[cs:DevDOSData]
 32729 000033C8 8E1E[1A20]              	mov	ds,[DevDOSData] ; 31/12/2022 
 32730                                  	;mov	ds,[8Ch]
 32731 000033CC 8E1E8C00                	mov	ds,[UMB_ARENA]		; es = UMB_HEAD
 32732 000033D0 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 32733 000033D2 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32734                                  ui_next:
 32735 000033D4 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx			; Q: is current block above
 32736                                  					;    new block
 32737 000033D6 770F                    	ja	short ui_insert		; Y: insert it
 32738                                  					; Q: is current block the
 32739                                  					;    last
 32740 000033D8 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32741 000033DE 745C                    	je	short ui_append		; Y: append new block to chain
 32742                                  					; N: get next block
 32743 000033E0 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; M005
 32744                                  	;call	get_next		; ax = es = next block
 32745 000033E2 E8E200                  	call	_get_next_ ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32746 000033E5 EBED                    	jmp	short ui_next
 32747                                  
 32748                                  ui_insert:
 32749 000033E7 8CD9                    	mov	cx,ds			; ds = previous arena
 32750 000033E9 41                      	inc	cx			; top of previous block
 32751                                  
 32752 000033EA 29D9                    	sub	cx,bx
 32753 000033EC F7D9                    	neg	cx			; cx = size of used block
 32754                                  	;mov	byte [0],'M'
 32755 000033EE C60600004D              	mov	byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32756                                  	;mov	word [1],8
 32757 000033F3 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32758                                  	;mov	[3],cx
 32759 000033F9 890E0300                	mov	[ARENA.SIZE],cx	
 32760                                  	;mov	word [8],4353h ; 'SC'
 32761 000033FD C70608005343            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 32762                                  
 32763                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 32764                                  
 32765 00003403 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 32766 00003405 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32767 0000340B 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0
 32768                                  					; mark as free
 32769 00003412 83EA02                  	sub	dx,2			; make room for arena at
 32770                                  					; start & end of new block
 32771 00003415 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx
 32772                                  
 32773                                  ; prepare arena at end of new block
 32774                                  	
 32775 0000341A 01D3                    	add	bx,dx
 32776 0000341C 43                      	inc	bx
 32777 0000341D 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es=arena at top of new block
 32778 0000341F 43                      	inc	bx			; bx=top of new block
 32779                                  
 32780                                  					; ax contains arena just above
 32781                                  					; this block
 32782 00003420 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = size of used block
 32783                                  	
 32784 00003422 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 32785 00003428 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32786 0000342F 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 32787 00003433 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 32788                                  
 32789 0000343A EB47                    	jmp	short ui_done
 32790                                  
 32791                                  ui_append:
 32792                                  					; es = arena of last block	
 32793 0000343C 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; ax=top of last block-1 para
 32794 00003441 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1	; reflect the space we are
 32795                                  					; going to rsrv on top of this 
 32796                                  					; block for the next arena.
 32797                                  	; 13/05/2019
 32798 00003447 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 32799                                  
 32800 0000344D 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx=top of prev block-1
 32801 0000344F 40                      	inc	ax
 32802 00003450 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax=top of prev block - 
 32803                                  					;    seg. address of new block
 32804 00003452 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 32805                                  
 32806 00003454 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; ds = arena of unused block
 32807                                  
 32808 00003456 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 32809 0000345C 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32810 00003463 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 32811 00003467 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 32812                                  
 32813                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 32814 0000346E 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 32815 00003470 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 32816 00003476 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system
 32817                                  					; mark as free
 32818 0000347D 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 32819 0000347E 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 32820                                  ui_done:
 32821                                  uc_done: ; 31/12/2022 ; *!
 32822 00003483 1F                      	pop	ds
 32823                                  	; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 32824                                  ;uc_done:	; 18/12/2022
 32825 00003484 C3                      	retn
 32826                                  
 32827                                  ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32828                                  
 32829                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32830                                  ;
 32831                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 32832                                  ;
 32833                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 32834                                  ;	iff it's free.  Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 32835                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 32836                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 32837                                  ;
 32838                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 32839                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 32840                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IFF not at end
 32841                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 32842                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 32843                                  ;
 32844                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32845                                  
 32846                                  umb_coalesce:
 32847                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32848                                  	; ds = cs
 32849 00003485 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 32850                                  
 32851 00003486 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 32852                                  
 32853                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 32854                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32855 00003488 8E06[1A20]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 32856 0000348C 268E068C00              	mov	es,[es:UMB_ARENA]	; es = UMB_HEAD
 32857                                  uc_nextfree:
 32858 00003491 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32859 00003493 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 32860                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 32861 00003495 26393E0100              	cmp	[es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is current arena free
 32862 0000349A 7407                    	je	short uc_again		; Y: try to coalesce with next block
 32863                                  					; N: get next arena
 32864 0000349C E82100                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 32865 0000349F 72E2                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 32866 000034A1 EBEE                    	jmp	short uc_nextfree
 32867                                  uc_again:
 32868 000034A3 E81A00                  	call	get_next		; ES, AX <- next block
 32869 000034A6 72DB                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 32870                                  uc_check:
 32871 000034A8 26393E0100              	cmp     [es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is arena free
 32872 000034AD 75E2                    	jne	short uc_nextfree	; N: get next free arena
 32873                                  					; Y: coalesce
 32874 000034AF 268B0E0300              	mov     cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]      ; cx <- next block size
 32875 000034B4 41                      	inc     cx                      ; cx <- cx + 1 (for header size)
 32876                                  	;add	[3],cx
 32877 000034B5 010E0300                	add     [ARENA.SIZE],cx		; current size <- current size + cx
 32878 000034B9 268A0D                  	mov     cl,[es:di]              ; move up signature
 32879 000034BC 880D                    	mov     [di],cl
 32880 000034BE EBE3                    	jmp     short uc_again		; try again
 32881                                  
 32882                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32883                                  ;uc_done:
 32884                                  	;retn
 32885                                  
 32886                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32887                                  ;
 32888                                  ;**	get_next - Find Next item in Arena
 32889                                  ;
 32890                                  ;	ENTRY	dS - pointer to block head
 32891                                  ;	EXIT	AX,ES - pointers to next head
 32892                                  ;		'C' set if arena damaged
 32893                                  ;
 32894                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32895                                  
 32896                                  	; 01/11/2022
 32897                                  get_next:
 32898 000034C0 803E00005A              	cmp	byte [0],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32899 000034C5 740A                    	je	short gn_err
 32900                                  _get_next_:
 32901 000034C7 8CD8                    	mov     ax,ds                   ; ax=current block
 32902 000034C9 03060300                	add     ax,[ARENA.SIZE]		; ax=ax + current block length
 32903 000034CD 40                      	inc     ax                      ; remember that header!
 32904 000034CE 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32905                                  	;clc
 32906                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32907                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32908                                  	; cf=0
 32909                                  	;clc
 32910 000034D0 C3                      	retn
 32911                                  gn_err:
 32912 000034D1 F9                      	stc
 32913                                  	; 11/12/2022	
 32914                                  lfu_err:	 ; cf=1
 32915 000034D2 C3                      	retn
 32916                                  
 32917                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32918                                  ;
 32919                                  ; procedure : LinkFirstUMB
 32920                                  ;
 32921                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32922                                  
 32923                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32924                                  	; (SYSINIT:2F81h)
 32925                                  LinkFirstUMB:
 32926                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32927                                  	; ds = cs
 32928 000034D3 E8D3FE                  	call	umb_allocate
 32929 000034D6 72FA                    	jc	short lfu_err  ; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 32930                                  
 32931                                  ; bx = segment of allocated UMB
 32932                                  ; dx = size of UMB
 32933                                  
 32934                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32935                                  	; ds = cs
 32936                                  
 32937 000034D8 CD12                    	int	12h			; ax = size of memory
 32938 000034DA B106                    	mov	cl,6
 32939 000034DC D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; ax = size in paragraphs
 32940                                  
 32941 000034DE 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx = size in paras
 32942 000034E0 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = - size of unused block
 32943                                  
 32944 000034E2 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 32945                                  
 32946 000034E4 83E901                  	sub	cx,1			; cx = first umb_arena
 32947 000034E7 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; es = first umb_arena
 32948                                  	
 32949 000034E9 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32950 000034EF 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32951                                  					
 32952 000034F6 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 32953 000034FA 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 32954                                  
 32955                                  ; put in the arena for the first UMB
 32956                                  
 32957 00003501 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es has first free umb seg
 32958 00003503 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32959 00003509 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0	
 32960                                  					; mark as free 
 32961 00003510 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 32962 00003511 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 32963                                  
 32964                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 32965                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32966 00003516 8E06[1A20]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData] ; ds = cs
 32967 0000351A BF8C00                  	mov	di,UMB_ARENA ; 8Ch
 32968 0000351D 26890D                  	mov	[es:di],cx		; initialize umb_head in DOS
 32969                                  					;  data segment with the arena
 32970                                  					;  just below Top of Mem
 32971                                  
 32972                                  ; we must now scan the arena chain and update the size of the last arena
 32973                                  
 32974 00003520 BF2400                  	mov	di,DOS_ARENA ; 24h
 32975 00003523 268E05                  	mov	es,[es:di]		; es = start arena
 32976 00003526 31FF                    	xor	di,di
 32977                                  ;scan_next
 32978                                  ; 09/12/2022
 32979                                  scannext:
 32980 00003528 26803D5A                	cmp	byte [es:di],arena_signature_end  ; 'Z'
 32981 0000352C 740C                    	je	short got_last
 32982                                  	
 32983 0000352E 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32984 00003530 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32985 00003535 40                      	inc	ax
 32986 00003536 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32987                                  	;jmp	short scan_next
 32988                                  	; 09/12/2022
 32989 00003538 EBEE                    	jmp	short scannext
 32990                                  got_last:
 32991 0000353A 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1
 32992 00003540 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32993                                  	;clc
 32994                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32995                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32996                                  	; cf=0
 32997                                  	;clc
 32998 00003546 C3                      	retn
 32999                                  
 33000                                  ; 11/12/2022
 33001                                  ;;lfu_err:
 33002                                  ;	;stc
 33003                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33004                                  ;	; 11/12/2022
 33005                                  ;	; cf=1
 33006                                  ;	;stc
 33007                                  ;	retn
 33008                                  
 33009                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33010                                  ;
 33011                                  ; procedure : ShrinkUMB
 33012                                  ;
 33013                                  ;	Shrinks the current UMB in use, so that the unused portions
 33014                                  ;	of the UMB is given back to the DOS free mem pool
 33015                                  ;
 33016                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33017                                  
 33018                                  ShrinkUMB:
 33019                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33020                                  	; ds = cs
 33021 00003547 833E[FD1F]00            	cmp	word [DevUMBAddr],0
 33022                                  	;cmp	word [cs:DevUMBAddr],0
 33023 0000354C 741F                    	je	short su_exit
 33024 0000354E 06                      	push	es
 33025                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33026                                  	;push	bx
 33027                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33028                                  	;mov	bx,[cs:DevUMBFree]
 33029                                  	;sub	bx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 33030                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 33031 0000354F 8B1E[0120]              	mov	bx,[DevUMBFree]
 33032 00003553 2B1E[FD1F]              	sub	bx,[DevUMBAddr]
 33033 00003557 8E06[FD1F]              	mov	es,[DevUMBAddr]
 33034                                  	
 33035 0000355B B8004A                  	mov	ax,4A00h
 33036 0000355E CD21                    	int	21h
 33037                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ADJUST MEMORY BLOCK SIZE (SETBLOCK)
 33038                                  		; ES = segment address of block to change
 33039                                  		; BX = new size in paragraphs
 33040 00003560 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 33041 00003562 48                      	dec	ax
 33042 00003563 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 33043 00003565 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8
 33044                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33045                                  	;pop	bx
 33046 0000356C 07                      	pop	es
 33047                                  su_exit:
 33048 0000356D C3                      	retn

 33052                                  ; procedure : UnlinkUMB
 33053                                  ;
 33054                                  ;	Unlinks the UMBs from the DOS arena chain
 33055                                  ;
 33056                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33057                                  
 33058                                  UnlinkUMB:
 33059                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33060                                  	; ds = cs
 33061 0000356E 1E                      	push	ds
 33062 0000356F 06                      	push	es
 33063                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33064 00003570 803E[1920]00            	cmp	byte [FirstUMBLinked],0
 33065                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0
 33066 00003575 7420                    	je	short ulu_x		; nothing to unlink
 33067                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33068 00003577 8E06[1A20]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 33069                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]	; get DOS data seg
 33070 0000357B 268E1E2400              	mov	ds,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 33071 00003580 268B3E8C00              	mov	di,[es:UMB_ARENA]
 33072                                  ulu_next:
 33073 00003585 E838FF                  	call	get_next
 33074 00003588 720D                    	jc	short ulu_x
 33075 0000358A 39C7                    	cmp	di,ax			; is the next one UMB ?
 33076 0000358C 7404                    	je	short ulu_found
 33077 0000358E 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 33078 00003590 EBF3                    	jmp	short ulu_next
 33079                                  ulu_found:
 33080                                  	;mov	byte [0],'Z'
 33081 00003592 C60600005A              	mov     byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 33082                                  ulu_x:
 33083 00003597 07                      	pop	es
 33084 00003598 1F                      	pop	ds
 33085 00003599 C3                      	retn

 33087                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 33088                                  ; SYSINIT2.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 33089                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 33090                                  ; 14/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33091                                  
 33092                                  ; Multiple configuration block support  Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 33093                                  ;
 33094                                  ; Summary:
 33095                                  ;
 33096                                  ;   The procedure "organize" crunches the in-memory copy of config.sys
 33097                                  ;   into lines delimited by CR/LF (sometimes no CR, but *always* an LF)
 33098                                  ;   with the leading "keyword=" replaced by single character codes (eg, B
 33099                                  ;   for BUFFERS, D for DEVICE, Z for any unrecognized keyword); see comtab
 33100                                  ;   and/or config.inc for the full list.
 33101                                  ;
 33102                                  ;   [blockname] and INCLUDE are the major syntactical additions for multi-
 33103                                  ;   configuration support. blockname is either MENU, which contains one
 33104                                  ;   or more MENUITEM lines, an optional MENUDEFAULT (which includes optional
 33105                                  ;   time-out), or any user-defined keyword, such as NETWORK, CD-ROM, etc.
 33106                                  ;   INCLUDE allows the current block to name another block for inclusion
 33107                                  ;   during the processing phase of CONFIG.SYS. An INCLUDE is only honored
 33108                                  ;   once, precluding nasty infinite-loop scenarios. If blocks are present
 33109                                  ;   without a MENU block, then only lines inside COMMON blocks are processed.
 33110                                  ;
 33111                                  ; Example:
 33112                                  ;
 33113                                  ;   [menu]
 33114                                  ;   menuitem=misc,Miscellaneous
 33115                                  ;   menuitem=network,Network Configuration
 33116                                  ;   menudefault=network,15
 33117                                  ;
 33118                                  ;   [network]
 33119                                  ;   include misc
 33120                                  ;   device=foo
 33121                                  ;
 33122                                  ;   [misc]
 33123                                  ;   device=bar
 33124                                  ;   include alternate
 33125                                  ;
 33126                                  ;   [alternate]
 33127                                  ;   device=tar
 33128                                  ;
 33129                                  ;
 33130                                  ;   When the menu is displayed
 33131                                  ;
 33132                                  ;    1. Miscellaneous
 33133                                  ;    2. Network Configuration
 33134                                  ;
 33135                                  ;   #2 is highlighted as the default option, and will be automatically
 33136                                  ;   selected after 15 seconds. It will invoke the following lines in the
 33137                                  ;   following order:
 33138                                  ;
 33139                                  ;       DEVICE=BAR
 33140                                  ;       DEVICE=TAR
 33141                                  ;       DEVICE=FOO
 33142                                  ;
 33143                                  
 33144                                  ;MULTI_CONFIG equ 1
 33145                                  
 33146                                  ; the following depend on the positions of the various letters in switchlist
 33147                                  
 33148                                  switchnum	equ 11111000b ; 0F8h	; which switches require number
 33149                                  
 33150                                  flagec35	equ 00000100b ; 4	; electrically compatible 3.5 inch disk drive
 33151                                  flagdrive	equ 00001000b ; 8 
 33152                                  flagcyln	equ 00010000b ; 16
 33153                                  flagseclim	equ 00100000b ; 32
 33154                                  flagheads	equ 01000000b ; 64
 33155                                  flagff		equ 10000000b ; 128
 33156                                  
 33157                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33158                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33159                                  
 33160                                  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3E78h
 33161                                  
 33162                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33163                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3054h
 33164                                  
 33165 0000359A 00                      insert_blank:	db 	0
 33166

 33168                                  ;
 33169                                  ; procedure : setparms
 33170                                  ;
 33171                                  ; the following set of routines is used to parse the drivparm = command in
 33172                                  ; the config.sys file to change the default drive parameters.
 33173                                  ;
 33174                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33175                                  
 33176                                  setparms:
 33177 0000359B 1E                      	push	ds
 33178 0000359C 50                      	push	ax
 33179 0000359D 53                      	push	bx
 33180 0000359E 51                      	push	cx
 33181 0000359F 52                      	push	dx
 33182                                  
 33183 000035A0 0E                      	push	cs
 33184 000035A1 1F                      	pop	ds
 33185                                  
 33186 000035A2 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 33187 000035A4 8A1E[B34A]              	mov	bl,[drive]
 33188                                  	; 18/12/2022
 33189 000035A8 43                      	inc	bx
 33190                                  	;inc	bl			; get it correct for ioctl call
 33191                                  					; (1=a,2=b...)
 33192 000035A9 BA[8B49]                	mov	dx,deviceparameters
 33193 000035AC B444                    	mov	ah,IOCTL ; 44h
 33194 000035AE B00D                    	mov	al,GENERIC_IOCTL ; 0Dh
 33195 000035B0 B508                    	mov	ch,RAWIO ; 8
 33196 000035B2 B140                    	mov	cl,SET_DEVICE_PARAMETERS ; 40h
 33197 000035B4 CD21                    	int	21h
 33198                                  
 33199                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33200                                  ;
 33201                                  ;	;;mov	ax,Bios_Data		; get Bios_Data segment
 33202                                  ;	;mov	ax,KERNEL_SEGMENT ; 70h
 33203                                  ;	; 21/10/2022
 33204                                  ;	mov	ax,DOSBIODATASEG ; 0070h	
 33205                                  ;	mov	ds,ax			; set Bios_Data segment
 33206                                  ;
 33207                                  ;	test	word [cs:switches],flagec35 ; 4
 33208                                  ;	jz	short not_ec35
 33209                                  
 33210                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33211                                  	;test	word [switches],flagec35 ; 4
 33212                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33213 000035B6 F606[B44A]04            	test	byte [switches],flagec35 ; 4
 33214 000035BB 7411                    	jz	short eot_ok
 33215                                  
 33216                                  	;mov	cl,[cs:drive]		; which drive was this for?
 33217                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33218 000035BD 8A0E[B34A]              	mov	cl,[drive]
 33219 000035C1 B87000                  	mov	ax,DOSBIODATASEG ; 0070h	
 33220 000035C4 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax	
 33221                                  
 33222 000035C6 B001                    	mov	al,1			; assume drive 0
 33223 000035C8 D2E0                    	shl	al,cl			; set proper bit depending on drive
 33224                                  	;or	[531h],al ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS Offset SYINIT:3EACh)
 33225 000035CA 0806[3105]              	or	[ec35_flag],al		; set the bit in the permanent flags
 33226                                  
 33227                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33228                                  ;
 33229                                  ;not_ec35:
 33230                                  ;;	Now adjust the BIOS's EOT variable if our new drive has more
 33231                                  ;;	sectors per track than any old ones.
 33232                                  ;
 33233                                  ;	;mov	al,[cs:deviceparameters+20]
 33234                                  ;	mov	al,[cs:deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK]
 33235                                  ;	;cmp	al,[12Ch] ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS Offset SYINIT:3EB4h)
 33236                                  ;	cmp	al,[EOT]
 33237                                  ;	jbe	short eot_ok
 33238                                  ;	mov	[EOT],al
 33239                                  
 33240                                  eot_ok:
 33241 000035CE 5A                      	pop	dx			; fix up all the registers
 33242 000035CF 59                      	pop	cx
 33243 000035D0 5B                      	pop	bx
 33244 000035D1 58                      	pop	ax
 33245 000035D2 1F                      	pop	ds ; 13/05/2019
 33246 000035D3 C3                      	retn
 33247

 33255                                  
 33256                                  diddleback:
 33257 000035D4 1E                      	push	ds
 33258 000035D5 0E                      	push	cs
 33259 000035D6 1F                      	pop	ds
 33260                                  	;mov	word [deviceparameters+4],80
 33261 000035D7 C706[8F49]5000          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],80
 33262                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+1],2
 33263 000035DD C606[8C49]02            	mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],DEV_3INCH720KB ; 2
 33264                                  	;mov	word [deviceparameters+2],0
 33265 000035E2 C706[8D49]0000          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES],0

 33366                                  ; procedure : check_switch
 33367                                  ;
 33368                                  ; processes a switch in the input. it ensures that the switch is valid, and
 33369                                  ; gets the number, if any required, following the switch. the switch and the
 33370                                  ; number *must* be separated by a colon. carry is set if there is any kind of
 33371                                  ; error.

 33401 00003615 8B1E[B44A]              	mov	bx,[switches]		; get switches so far

 33629                                  ; procedure : setdeviceparameters
 33630                                  ;
 33631                                  ; setdeviceparameters sets up the recommended bpb in each bds in the
 33632                                  ; system based on the form factor. it is assumed that the bpbs for the
 33633                                  ; various form factors are present in the bpbtable. for hard files,
 33634                                  ; the recommended bpb is the same as the bpb on the drive.
 33635                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers since we are going to jump to
 33636                                  ; sysinit straight after this routine.
 33637                                  ;
 33638                                  ;	if we return carry, the DRIVPARM will be aborted, but presently
 33639                                  ;	  we always return no carry
 33640                                  ;
 33641                                  ;	note:  there is a routine by the same name in msdioctl.asm
 33642                                  ;
 33643                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33644                                  
 33645                                  ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33646                                  
 33647                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33648                                  
 33649                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33650                                  	; (SYSINIT:3FC4h)
 33651                                  
 33652                                  setdeviceparameters:
 33653                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33654                                  	; ds = cs
 33655

 33657

 33659 000036BA 07                      	pop	es

 33713

 33727

 33729

 33731

 33733                                  
 33734                                  ;	two sided drives have two special cases to look for. One is
 33735                                  ;	   a 320K diskette (40 tracks, 8 secs per track). It uses
 33736                                  ;	   a mediaid of 0fch. The other is 1.44M, which uses only
 33737                                  ;	   one sector/cluster.
 33738                                  
 33739                                  ;	any drive with 18secs/trk, 2 heads, 80 tracks, will be assumed
 33740                                  ;	   to be a 1.44M and use only 1 sector per cluster. Any other
 33741                                  ;	   type of 2 headed drive is all set.

 33746 00003718 7502                    	jne	short not_144m
 33747

 33749

 33757 00003723 833E[9F49]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 33758 00003728 751A                    	jne	short got_correct_mediad

 33761 0000372C EB16                    	jmp	short got_correct_mediad
 33762                                  
 33763                                  only_one_head:

 33765                                  ;	if we don't have a 360K drive, then just go use 0f0h as media descr.
 33766                                  
 33767 0000372E 803E[8C49]00            	cmp	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],DEV_5INCH ; 0
 33768 00003733 740B                    	je	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 33769                                  
 33770                                  ;	single sided 360K drive uses either 0fch or 0feh, depending on
 33771                                  ;	  whether sectorspertrack is 8 or 9. For our purposes, anything
 33772                                  ;	  besides 8 will be considered 0fch
 33773

 33778

 33780                                  
 33781                                  ;	we've either got a one sided drive, or a 1.44M drive
 33782                                  ;	  either case we'll use 1 sector per cluster instead of 2
 33783

 33790                                  
 33791                                  got_correct_mediad:

 34214 0000391B 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line feed?
 34215 0000391D 740F                    	je	short org1_brdg		; handles the next command line.
 34216 0000391F EBCE                    	jmp	short org5		; handles next char in this line.
 34217                                  
 34218                                  org_dhlf:				; M051 - Start
 34219                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34220                                  	; ds = cs
 34221 00003921 803E[9A35]01            	cmp	byte [insert_blank],1
 34222                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:insert_blank],1 ; Q:has a blank already been inserted
 34223 00003926 7406                    	je	short org1_brdg		; Y:
 34224 00003928 26C645FF20              	mov	byte [es:di-1],' '	; overwrite lf with blank
 34225 0000392D AA                      	stosb				; put lf after blank
 34226                                  					; M051 - End
 34227                                  org1_brdg:
 34228 0000392E C606[9A35]00            	mov	byte [insert_blank],0 
 34229                                  	;mov	byte [cs:insert_blank],0 ; M051: clear blank indicator for 
 34230                                  					; M051: devicehigh
 34231 00003933 E931FE                  	jmp	org1
 34232                                  
 34233                                  at_quote:
 34234 00003936 803E[4E03]00            	cmp	byte [com_level],0
 34235                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:com_level],0
 34236 0000393B 7407                    	je	short up_level
 34237                                  	;mov	byte [cs:com_level],0	; reset it.
 34238 0000393D C606[4E03]00            	mov	byte [com_level],0
 34239 00003942 EBAB                    	jmp	short org5
 34240                                  
 34241                                  up_level:
 34242                                  	;inc	byte [cs:com_level]	; set it.
 34243 00003944 FE06[4E03]              	inc	byte [com_level]
 34244 00003948 EBA5                    	jmp	short org5
 34245                                  
 34246                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34247                                  ;
 34248                                  ; procedure : get2
 34249                                  ;
 34250                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34251                                  
 34252                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34253                                  	; (SYSINIT:33FAh)
 34254                                  
 34255                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 34256                                  	; (SYSINIT:4270h)
 34257                                  get2:
 34258 0000394A E304                    	jcxz	noget
 34259                                  	;
 34260                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34261                                  	;;lods	byte ptr es:[si]
 34262                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34263 0000394C 26                      	es	
 34264 0000394D AC                      	lodsb
 34265                                  	;mov	al, [es:si]
 34266                                  	;inc	si
 34267                                  	;
 34268 0000394E 49                      	dec	cx
 34269 0000394F C3                      	retn
 34270                                  noget:
 34271 00003950 59                      	pop	cx
 34272                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34273                                  	; ds = cs
 34274                                  	;mov	[cs:count],di ; 13/05/2019
 34275                                  	;mov	[cs:org_count],di
 34276 00003951 893E[5403]              	mov	[count],di
 34277 00003955 893E[5603]              	mov	[org_count],di
 34278 00003959 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 34279                                  	;mov	[cs:chrptr],si
 34280 0000395B 8936[5803]              	mov	[chrptr],si
 34281                                  
 34282                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34283                                  
 34284                                  ; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 34285                                  
 34286                                  ;ifndef MULTI_CONFIG
 34287                                  ;	retn
 34288                                  ;else
 34289                                  
 34290                                  ;   This was the rather kludgy way out of procedure "organize", but instead
 34291                                  ;   of returning to doconf, we now want to check config.sys BEGIN/END blocks
 34292                                  ;   and the new boot menu stuff...
 34293                                  
 34294 0000395F 89F9                    	mov     cx,di
 34295 00003961 E9E300                  	jmp     menu_check
 34296                                  
 34297                                  ;endif
 34298                                  	; 02/11/2022
 34299                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 34300                                  	;retn
 34301                                  
 34302                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34303                                  ;
 34304                                  ; procedure : skip_comment
 34305                                  ;
 34306                                  ;skip the commented string until lf, if current es:si-> a comment string.
 34307                                  ;in) es:si-> string
 34308                                  ;	 cx -> length.
 34309                                  ;out) zero flag not set if not found a comment string.
 34310                                  ;	  zero flag set if found a comment string and skipped it. al will contain
 34311                                  ;	  the line feed character at this moment when return.
 34312                                  ;	  ax register destroyed.
 34313                                  ;	  if found, si, cx register adjusted accordingly.
 34314                                  ;
 34315                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34316                                  
 34317                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 34318                                  	; (SYSINIT:428Dh)
 34319                                  
 34320                                  skip_comment:
 34321 00003964 E3EA                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of the organize routine.
 34322                                  
 34323                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34324                                  	; ds = cs	
 34325                                  
 34326 00003966 803E[4E03]00            	cmp	byte [com_level],0
 34327                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:com_level],0 ; only check it if parameter level is 0.
 34328 0000396B 752C                    	jne	short no_commt	 ; (not inside quotations)
 34329                                  
 34330 0000396D 803E[4F03]01            	cmp	byte [cmmt],1
 34331                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],1
 34332 00003972 7225                    	jb	short no_commt
 34333                                  
 34334 00003974 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 34335                                  	
 34336 00003977 3806[5003]              	cmp	[cmmt1],al
 34337                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt1],al
 34338 0000397B 751C                    	jne	short no_commt
 34339                                  
 34340 0000397D 803E[4F03]02            	cmp	byte [cmmt],2
 34341                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],2
 34342 00003982 750A                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 34343                                  
 34344 00003984 268A4401                	mov	al,[es:si+1]
 34345                                  	
 34346 00003988 3806[5103]              	cmp	[cmmt2],al
 34347                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt2],al
 34348 0000398C 750B                    	jne	short no_commt
 34349                                  skip_cmmt:
 34350 0000398E E3C0                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of organize routine.
 34351 00003990 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 34352 00003993 46                      	inc	si
 34353 00003994 49                      	dec	cx
 34354 00003995 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf		; line feed?
 34355 00003997 75F5                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 34356                                  no_commt:
 34357 00003999 C3                      	retn

 34359                                  ; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 34360                                  ; (SYSINIT:42C8h)
 34361                                  
 34362                                  ; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34363                                  ;%if 0
 34364                                  
 34365                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 34366                                  
 34367                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34368                                  ;
 34369                                  ;   kbd_read: wait for keystroke
 34370                                  ;
 34371                                  ;   INPUT
 34372                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 34373                                  ;
 34374                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34375                                  ;       Carry SET to clean boot, CLEAR otherwise
 34376                                  ;
 34377                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34378                                  ;       All
 34379                                  ;
 34380                                  ;   HISTORY
 34381                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 34382                                  ;
 34383                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34384                                  
 34385                                  kbd_read:
 34386 0000399A F606[5748]02                    test    byte [bDisableUI],2
 34387 0000399F 7520                            jnz     short kbd_nodelay
 34388                                  
 34389 000039A1 1E                              push    ds              ; the bios timer tick count is incremented
 34390 000039A2 29C0                            sub     ax,ax           ; 18.2 times per second;
 34391 000039A4 8ED8                            mov     ds,ax           ; watch the timer tick count for 37 transitions
 34392                                  	;mov	dx,[046Ch]	; get initial value
 34393                                  kbd_loop:
 34394 000039A6 B401                            mov     ah,1            ;
 34395 000039A8 CD16                            int     16h             ; peek the keyboard
 34396 000039AA 7514                            jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; something's there, get out
 34397 000039AC B402                            mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 34398 000039AE CD16                            int     16h             ;
 34399 000039B0 A803                            test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 34400 000039B2 750C                            jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; yes
 34401 000039B4 A16C04                          mov     ax,[046Ch]	;
 34402                                  	;sub	ax,dx           ; get difference
 34403                                  	; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34404 000039B7 2E2B06[8403]            	sub	ax,[cs:_timer_lw_] ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:42E5h        
 34405                                  
 34406 000039BC 3C25                    	cmp     al,37           ; reached limit?  ; (2 seconds)
 34407 000039BE 72E6                            jb	short kbd_loop	; not yet
 34408                                  kbd_loopdone:
 34409 000039C0 1F                              pop     ds              ; delay complete!
 34410                                  kbd_nodelay:
 34411 000039C1 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; assume clean boot
 34412 000039C3 B402                            mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 34413 000039C5 CD16                            int     16h             ;
 34414 000039C7 A803                            test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 34415 000039C9 7407                            jz      short kbd_notshift ; no
 34416 000039CB 43                              inc     bx              ; yes
 34417 000039CC 43                              inc     bx
 34418                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4301h
 34419 000039CD 800E[5B48]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 34420                                  kbd_notshift:                   ;
 34421 000039D2 B401                            mov     ah,1            ; peek the keyboard
 34422 000039D4 CD16                            int     16h             ;
 34423 000039D6 743E                            jz	short kbd_test	; no key present
 34424 000039D8 08C0                            or      al,al           ; is it a function key?
 34425 000039DA 753A                            jnz	short kbd_test	; no
 34426                                  
 34427                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:430Bh
 34428 000039DC 80FC62                          cmp     ah,62h          ; CTRL F5
 34429 000039DF 7405                            je	short kbd_cfg_bypass
 34430                                  	
 34431 000039E1 80FC3F                          cmp     ah,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 34432 000039E4 750D                            jne	short kbd_notf5	; no
 34433                                  kbd_cfg_bypass:
 34434 000039E6 BA[EF4C]                        mov     dx,_$CleanMsg
 34435 000039E9 E83D0C                          call    print
 34436                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:431Bh
 34437 000039EC 800E[5B48]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4 
 34438 000039F1 EB16                            jmp     short kbd_eat   ; yes, clean boot selected
 34439                                  kbd_notf5:
 34440                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4322h
 34441 000039F3 80FC65                          cmp     ah,65h          ; CTRL F8
 34442 000039F6 7405                            je	short kbd_cfg_confirm
 34443                                  
 34444 000039F8 80FC42                          cmp     ah,42h          ; F8 function key?
 34445 000039FB 7523                            jne	short kbd_exit	; no
 34446                                  kbd_cfg_confirm:
 34447 000039FD BA[2D4D]                        mov     dx,_$InterMsg
 34448 00003A00 E8260C                          call    print           ;
 34449 00003A03 B301                            mov     bl,1            ; yes, interactive-boot option enabled
 34450 00003A05 881E[5B48]                      mov     [bQueryOpt],bl  ; change default setting
 34451                                  kbd_eat:                        ;
 34452 00003A09 B400                            mov     ah,0            ;
 34453 00003A0B CD16                            int     16h             ; eat the key we assumed was a signal
 34454 00003A0D C606[6148]FF                    mov	byte [secElapsed],-1
 34455 00003A12 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ;
 34456 00003A14 7405                            jz	short kbd_clean	;
 34457                                  kbd_test:                       ;
 34458 00003A16 80FB02                          cmp     bl,2            ;
 34459 00003A19 7205                            jb	short kbd_exit	;
 34460                                  kbd_clean:                      ;
 34461 00003A1B E88808                          call    disable_autoexec; yes, tell COMMAND to skip autoexec.bat
 34462 00003A1E F9                              stc                     ; set carry to indicate abort
 34463 00003A1F C3                              retn			;
 34464                                  kbd_exit:                       ;
 34465 00003A20 F8                              clc                     ; clear carry to indicate success
 34466 00003A21 C3                              retn			;
 34467                                  
 34468                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34469                                  ;
 34470                                  ;   set_numlock: set numlock LED
 34471                                  ;
 34472                                  ;   INPUT
 34473                                  ;       ES:SI -> numlock setting (ie, "ON" or "OFF")
 34474                                  ;
 34475                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34476                                  ;       None
 34477                                  ;
 34478                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34479                                  ;       None
 34480                                  ;
 34481                                  ;   HISTORY
 34482                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 34483                                  ;
 34484                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34485                                  
 34486                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 34487                                  
 34488                                  set_numlock:
 34489                                          ; 04/01/2023
 34490                                  	;push	ax
 34491 00003A22 1E                              push    ds
 34492 00003A23 29C0                            sub     ax,ax
 34493 00003A25 8ED8                            mov     ds,ax
 34494 00003A27 268B04                          mov     ax,[es:si]      ; get 1st 2 bytes of value (ON or OF)
 34495 00003A2A 2E3B06[CA4C]                    cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff+2]	; should we turn it off?
 34496 00003A2F 7507                            jne	short not_off	; no
 34497 00003A31 80261704DF                      and     byte [0417h],~20h ; 0DFh
 34498 00003A36 EB0D                            jmp     short set_done
 34499                                  not_off:
 34500 00003A38 2E3B06[C84C]                    cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff]	; should we turn it on?
 34501 00003A3D F9                              stc
 34502 00003A3E 7505                            jne	short set_done	; no
 34503 00003A40 800E170420                      or      byte [0417h],20h
 34504                                  set_done:
 34505 00003A45 1F                              pop     ds
 34506                                  	; 04/01/2023
 34507                                  	;pop	ax
 34508 00003A46 C3                              retn
 34509                                  
 34510                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34511                                  
 34512                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34513                                  ;
 34514                                  ;   menu_check:  check for presence of menu (and other) configuration blocks
 34515                                  ;
 34516                                  ;   INPUT
 34517                                  ;       CX == "organized" config.sys memory image length
 34518                                  ;    ES:SI -> "organized" config.sys memory image
 34519                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 34520                                  ;
 34521                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34522                                  ;       Same as above; the idea is that menu_check simply transforms
 34523                                  ;       a block-structured config.sys image into a conventional image,
 34524                                  ;       based on the user's block selection and any other boot-time options
 34525                                  ;       the user may have employed...
 34526                                  ;
 34527                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34528                                  ;       All
 34529                                  ;
 34530                                  ;   NOTES
 34531                                  ;       [count] and [org_count] are set to the new config.sys image length
 34532                                  ;
 34533                                  ;   HISTORY
 34534                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34535                                  ;
 34536                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34537                                  
 34538                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 34539                                  	; (SYSINIT:4378h)
 34540                                  
 34541                                  menu_check:
 34542                                  
 34543                                  ;   Search for SWITCHES, determine if /N or /F are present; if so, then
 34544                                  ;   disable clean/interactive boot options
 34545                                  
 34546 00003A47 51                              push    cx              ;
 34547 00003A48 56                              push    si              ;
 34548 00003A49 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; remains ZERO until first block
 34549                                  swchk_loop:                     ;
 34550 00003A4B E84E07                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 34551 00003A4E 724C                            jc	short swchk_end	; hit eof
 34552 00003A50 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; '['
 34553 00003A52 7503                            jne	short swchk_next1 ;
 34554 00003A54 43                              inc     bx              ; remember that we've seen a block
 34555 00003A55 EB40                            jmp     short swchk_nextline
 34556                                  swchk_next1:                    ;
 34557 00003A57 3C4E                            cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 34558 00003A59 750E                            jne	short swchk_next2 ;
 34559 00003A5B 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ; only do NUMLOCK commands that exist
 34560 00003A5D 7538                            jnz	short swchk_nextline ; before the first block
 34561 00003A5F E8C0FF                          call    set_numlock     ; REM it out so we don't act on it later, too
 34562 00003A62 26C644FF30                      mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM
 34563 00003A67 EB2E                            jmp     short swchk_nextline
 34564                                  swchk_next2:                    ;
 34565 00003A69 3C31                            cmp     al,CONFIG_SWITCHES
 34566 00003A6B 752A                            jne	short swchk_nextline ; this line ain't it
 34567                                  swchk_scan:                     ;
 34568 00003A6D E82C07                          call    get_char        ; look for /N or /F
 34569                                  swchk_scan1:                    ;
 34570 00003A70 3C0A                            cmp     al,LF           ; end of line?
 34571 00003A72 7423                            je	short swchk_nextline ; yes
 34572 00003A74 3C2F                            cmp     al,'/'          ; switch-char?
 34573 00003A76 75F5                            jne	short swchk_scan ; no
 34574 00003A78 E82107                          call    get_char        ;
 34575 00003A7B 24DF                            and     al,~20h ; 0DFh	; convert to upper case
 34576 00003A7D 3A06[491F]                      cmp     al,[swit_n+1]
 34577 00003A81 7507                            jne	short swchk_scan2 ; no
 34578 00003A83 800E[5748]01                    or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 34579 00003A88 EBE3                            jmp	short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 34580                                  swchk_scan2:                    ;
 34581 00003A8A 3A06[551F]                      cmp     al,[swit_f+1]
 34582 00003A8E 75E0                            jne	short swchk_scan1 ; no
 34583 00003A90 800E[5748]02                    or      byte [bDisableUI],2
 34584 00003A95 EBD6                            jmp     short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 34585                                  swchk_nextline:                 ;
 34586 00003A97 E8D306                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 34587 00003A9A EBAF                            jmp     short swchk_loop ;
 34588                                  swchk_end:                      ;
 34589 00003A9C 5E                              pop     si              ;
 34590 00003A9D 59                              pop     cx              ;
 34591                                  
 34592                                  ;   Do the keyboard tests for clean/interactive boot now, but only if
 34593                                  ;   the DisableUI flag is still clear
 34594                                  
 34595 00003A9E F606[5748]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 34596 00003AA3 7508                            jnz	short menu_search
 34597                                  ;
 34598                                  ;   Wait for 2 seconds first, UNLESS the /F bit was set in bDisableUI, or
 34599                                  ;   there is anything at all in the keyboard buffer
 34600                                  ;
 34601 00003AA5 E8F2FE                          call    kbd_read
 34602 00003AA8 7303                            jnc	short menu_search
 34603 00003AAA E9F901                          jmp	menu_abort
 34604                                  
 34605                                  ;   Search for MENU block; it is allowed to be anywhere in config.sys
 34606                                  
 34607                                  menu_search:
 34608 00003AAD 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; if no MENU, default to zero for no_selection
 34609 00003AAF BF[9C48]                        mov     di,szMenu	;
 34610 00003AB2 E81B04                          call    find_block      ; find the MENU block
 34611 00003AB5 7340                            jnc	short menu_found ;
 34612 00003AB7 C606[9448]00                    mov     byte [szBoot],0
 34613 00003ABC E91702                          jmp	no_selection ; not found
 34614                                  
 34615                                  ;   Process the requested menu color(s)
 34616                                  
 34617                                  menu_color:
 34618 00003ABF 51                              push    cx              ;
 34619 00003AC0 52                              push    dx              ;
 34620 00003AC1 BA0700                          mov     dx,0007h        ; default color setting
 34621 00003AC4 E8B406                          call    get_number	; get first number
 34622 00003AC7 80E30F                          and     bl,0Fh		; first # is foreground color (for low nibble)
 34623 00003ACA 88DD                            mov     ch,bl           ; save it in CH
 34624 00003ACC 80E2F0                          and     dl,0F0h         ;
 34625 00003ACF 08DA                            or      dl,bl           ;
 34626 00003AD1 E84508                          call    delim           ; did we hit a delimiter
 34627 00003AD4 7511                            jne	short check_color ; no, all done
 34628 00003AD6 E8A206                          call    get_number	; get next number
 34629 00003AD9 80E30F                          and     bl,0Fh		; second # is background color (for high nibble)
 34630 00003ADC 88DE                            mov     dh,bl           ; save it in DH
 34631 00003ADE 80E20F                          and     dl,0Fh		;
 34632 00003AE1 B104                            mov     cl,4            ;
 34633 00003AE3 D2E3                            shl     bl,cl           ;
 34634 00003AE5 08DA                            or      dl,bl           ;
 34635                                  check_color:                    ;
 34636 00003AE7 38F5                            cmp     ch,dh           ; are foreground/background the same?
 34637 00003AE9 7503                            jne	short set_color	; no
 34638 00003AEB 80F208                          xor     dl,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 34639                                  set_color:
 34640 00003AEE 8816[5248]                      mov     [bMenuColor],dl ;
 34641 00003AF2 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 34642 00003AF3 59                              pop     cx              ;
 34643 00003AF4 E9AB00                          jmp	menu_nextitem
 34644                                  
 34645                                  ;   Back to our regularly scheduled program (the COLOR and other goop
 34646                                  ;   above is there simply to alleviate short jump problems)
 34647                                  
 34648                                  menu_found:
 34649 00003AF7 C606[5C48]01                    mov     byte [bDefBlock],1
 34650 00003AFC C706[5E48]0000                  mov     word [offDefBlock],0
 34651 00003B02 C606[6048]FF                    mov     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 34652 00003B07 8026[5B48]FD                    and     byte [bQueryOpt],~2 ; 0FDh
 34653                                  
 34654 00003B0C E85E06                          call    skip_opt_line   ; skip to next line
 34655 00003B0F 29D2                            sub     dx,dx           ; initialize total block count (0 => none yet)
 34656                                  
 34657                                  ;   Process the menu block now
 34658                                  
 34659                                  menu_process:
 34660 00003B11 E88806                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 34661 00003B14 722E                            jc	short to_menu_getdefault ; could happen if menu block at end (rare)
 34662 00003B16 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 34663 00003B18 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; BEGIN implies END
 34664 00003B1A 7428                            je	short to_menu_getdefault
 34665 00003B1C 3C4F                            cmp     al,CONFIG_SUBMENU
 34666 00003B1E 744D                            je	short menu_item	; go process sub-menu
 34667 00003B20 3C45                            cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUITEM
 34668 00003B22 7449                            je	short menu_item	; go process menu item
 34669 00003B24 3C41                            cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUDEFAULT
 34670 00003B26 741E                            je	short menu_default ; go process menu default
 34671 00003B28 3C52                            cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUCOLOR
 34672 00003B2A 7493                            je	short menu_color ; go process menu color
 34673 00003B2C 3C4E                            cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 34674 00003B2E 740F                            je	short menu_numlock ;
 34675 00003B30 3C30                            cmp     al,CONFIG_REM   ; allow remarks in menu block
 34676 00003B32 746E                            je	short menu_nextitem ;
 34677 00003B34 E8D207                          call    any_delim       ; allow blank lines and such
 34678 00003B37 7469                            je	short menu_nextitem ;
 34679 00003B39 F9                              stc                     ;
 34680 00003B3A E83507                          call    print_error     ; non-MENU command!
 34681 00003B3D EB63                            jmp     short menu_nextitem
 34682                                  menu_numlock:
 34683 00003B3F E8E0FE                          call    set_numlock
 34684 00003B42 EB5E                            jmp     short menu_nextitem
 34685                                  to_menu_getdefault:
 34686 00003B44 EB62                            jmp     short menu_getdefault
 34687                                  
 34688                                  ;   Save the offset of the default block name, we'll need it later
 34689                                  
 34690                                  menu_default:
 34691 00003B46 8936[5E48]                      mov     [offDefBlock],si; save address of default block name
 34692 00003B4A 803E[6148]00                    cmp     byte [secElapsed],0
 34693 00003B4F 751A                            jne	short timeout_skip ; secElapsed is only zero for the FIRST menu,
 34694 00003B51 E8F405                          call    skip_token      ; and for subsequent menus IF nothing was typed;
 34695 00003B54 724C                            jc	short menu_nextitem ; secElapsed becomes -1 forever as soon as
 34696 00003B56 E80506                          call    skip_delim      ; something is typed
 34697 00003B59 7247                            jc	short menu_nextitem ;
 34698 00003B5B 89DE                            mov     si,bx           ;
 34699 00003B5D E81B06                          call    get_number      ; get number (of seconds for timeout)
 34700 00003B60 80FB5A                          cmp     bl,90           ; limit it to a reasonable number
 34701 00003B63 7202                            jb	short timeout_ok ; (besides, 99 is the largest # my simple
 34702 00003B65 B35A                            mov     bl,90           ;  display function can handle)
 34703                                  timeout_ok:                     ;
 34704 00003B67 881E[6048]                      mov     [secTimeOut],bl ;
 34705                                  timeout_skip:
 34706 00003B6B EB35                            jmp     short menu_nextitem
 34707                                  
 34708                                  ;   Verify that this is a valid menu item by searching for the named block
 34709                                  
 34710                                  menu_item:
 34711                                  	;cmp	dl,9	; 04/01/2023
 34712 00003B6D 80FA09                          cmp     dl,MAX_MULTI_CONFIG ; have we reached the max # of items yet?
 34713 00003B70 7330                            jae	short menu_nextitem ;
 34714 00003B72 89F7                            mov     di,si           ; DS:DI -> block name to search for
 34715 00003B74 E84003                          call    srch_block      ;
 34716 00003B77 7406                            je	short menu_itemfound ;
 34717 00003B79 F9                              stc                     ;
 34718 00003B7A E8F506                          call    print_error     ; print error and pause
 34719 00003B7D EB23                            jmp     short menu_nextitem ; if not found, ignore this menu item
 34720                                  
 34721                                  ;   srch_block, having succeeded, returns DI -> past the token that it
 34722                                  ;   just matched, which in this case should be a descriptive string; ES:SI
 34723                                  ;   and CX are unmodified
 34724                                  
 34725                                  menu_itemfound:
 34726 00003B7F 42                              inc     dx              ; otherwise, increment total block count
 34727 00003B80 89D3                            mov     bx,dx           ; and use it to index the arrays of offsets
 34728 00003B82 8887[6248]                      mov	[abBlockType+bx],al
 34729 00003B86 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ; of recorded block names and descriptions
 34730                                  
 34731                                  ;   There should be a description immediately following the block name on
 34732                                  ;   MENUITEM line; failing that, we'll just use the block name as the
 34733                                  ;   description...
 34734                                  
 34735 00003B88 89B7[6C48]                      mov     [aoffBlockName+bx],si
 34736 00003B8C 89B7[8048]                      mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],si
 34737 00003B90 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ; skip_delim modifies BX, so stash it in DI
 34738 00003B92 E8B305                          call    skip_token      ;
 34739 00003B95 720B                            jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 34740 00003B97 E8C405                          call    skip_delim      ;
 34741 00003B9A 7206                            jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 34742 00003B9C 87DF                            xchg    bx,di           ;
 34743 00003B9E 89BF[8048]                      mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],di
 34744                                  
 34745                                  menu_nextitem:
 34746 00003BA2 E8C805                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 34747 00003BA5 E969FF                          jmp     menu_process    ; go back for more lines
