 34748                                  
 34749                                  ;   Display menu items now, after determining which one is default
 34750                                  
 34751                                  menu_getdefault:
 34752 00003BA8 08D2                            or      dl,dl           ; where there any valid blocks at all?
 34753 00003BAA 7505                            jnz	short menu_valid ; yes
 34754 00003BAC 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; no, so force autoselect of 0
 34755 00003BAE E9ED00                          jmp     menu_autoselect ; (meaning: process common blocks only)
 34756                                  menu_valid:
 34757 00003BB1 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ;
 34758 00003BB3 8816[5D48]                      mov     [bMaxBlock],dl  ; first, record how many blocks we found
 34759 00003BB7 8B3E[5E48]                      mov     di,[offDefBlock];
 34760 00003BBB 09FF                            or      di,di           ; does a default block exist?
 34761 00003BBD 741C                            jz	short menu_nodefault ; no
 34762 00003BBF 43                              inc     bx              ; yes, walk name table, looking for default
 34763                                  menu_chkdefault:
 34764 00003BC0 53                              push    bx              ;
 34765 00003BC1 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 34766 00003BC3 8BB7[6C48]                      mov     si,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 34767 00003BC7 B98000                          mov     cx,128          ; arbitrary maximum length of a name
 34768 00003BCA 1E                              push    ds              ;
 34769 00003BCB 06                              push    es              ;
 34770 00003BCC 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 34771 00003BCD E82703                          call    comp_names      ; is this block the same as the default?
 34772 00003BD0 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 34773 00003BD1 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 34774 00003BD2 7409                            je	short menu_setdefault ; yes
 34775 00003BD4 43                              inc     bx              ;
 34776 00003BD5 3A1E[5D48]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done searching?
 34777 00003BD9 76E5                            jbe	short menu_chkdefault ; not yet
 34778                                  menu_nodefault:
 34779 00003BDB B301                            mov     bl,1            ; if no default, force default to #1
 34780                                  menu_setdefault:
 34781 00003BDD 881E[5C48]                      mov     [bDefBlock],bl  ; yes, this will be the initial current block
 34782                                  
 34783                                  ;   If the timeout was explicitly set to 0 (or technically, anything that
 34784                                  ;   failed to resolve to a number, like "NONE" or "EAT POTATOES"), then we're
 34785                                  ;   supposed to skip menu display and run with the specified default block;
 34786                                  ;   however, if the user hit Enter prior to boot, thereby requesting fully
 34787                                  ;   INTERACTIVE boot, then we shall display the menu block anyway (though still
 34788                                  ;   with no timeout)
 34789                                  
 34790 00003BE1 803E[6048]00                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],0 ; is timeout zero? (ie, assume default)
 34791 00003BE6 750A                            jne	short menu_display ; no
 34792 00003BE8 F606[5B48]01                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; yes, but was INTERACTIVE requested?
 34793 00003BED 7503                            jnz	short menu_display ; yes, so *don't* assume default after all
 34794 00003BEF E9C700                          jmp     not_topmenu	;
 34795                                  
 34796                                  ;   Reset the mode, so that we know screen is clean and cursor is home
 34797                                  
 34798                                  menu_display:
 34799 00003BF2 B40F                            mov     ah,0Fh          ; get current video mode
 34800 00003BF4 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 34801 00003BF6 B400                            mov     ah,00h          ; just re-select that mode
 34802 00003BF8 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 34803 00003BFA 06                              push    es              ;
 34804 00003BFB B84000                          mov     ax,40h          ; reach down into the ROM BIOS data area
 34805 00003BFE 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ; and save the current (default) video page
 34806 00003C00 26A14E00                        mov     ax,[es:004Eh]   ; start address and page #, in case the
 34807 00003C04 A3[5948]                        mov     [wCRTStart],ax  ; undocumented QUIET option was enabled
 34808 00003C07 26A06200                        mov     al,[es:0062h]   ;
 34809 00003C0B A2[5848]                        mov     [bCRTPage],al   ;
 34810 00003C0E A1[5348]                        mov     ax,[bMenuPage]	; select new page for menu
 34811 00003C11 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 34812 00003C13 B80006                          mov     ax,0600h        ; clear entire screen
 34813 00003C16 8A3E[5248]                      mov     bh,[bMenuColor] ; using this color
 34814 00003C1A 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ; upper left row/col
 34815                                          ;mov	dl,[es:CRT_Cols] 
 34816 00003C1C 268A164A00                      mov	dl,[es:4Ah]
 34817 00003C21 FECA                    	dec     dl              ;
 34818                                          ;mov	dh,[es:CRT_Rows];
 34819 00003C23 268A368400                      mov	dh,[es:84h]
 34820 00003C28 08F6                    	or      dh,dh           ; # of rows valid?
 34821 00003C2A 7504                            jnz	short menu_clear ; hopefully
 34822 00003C2C 8A36[5648]                      mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; no, use a default
 34823                                  menu_clear:
 34824 00003C30 CD10                            int     10h             ; clear the screen using the req. attribute
 34825 00003C32 07                              pop     es              ;
 34826 00003C33 8836[5648]                      mov     [bLastRow],dh   ; save DH
 34827 00003C37 BA[6A4D]                        mov     dx,_$MenuHeader
 34828 00003C3A E8EC09                          call    print           ; cursor now on row 3 (numbered from 0)
 34829                                  
 34830 00003C3D F606[5748]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 34831 00003C42 751F                            jnz     short menu_nostatus
 34832 00003C44 8A3E[5348]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 34833 00003C48 8A36[5648]                      mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; restore DH
 34834 00003C4C B200                            mov     dl,0            ; print the status line on row DH, col 0,
 34835 00003C4E B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; now that we can trash the cursor position
 34836 00003C50 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 34837 00003C52 BA[B64D]                        mov     dx,_$StatusLine
 34838 00003C55 E8D109                          call    print           ;
 34839 00003C58 B403                            mov     ah,3            ; get cursor position
 34840 00003C5A CD10                            int     10h             ;
 34841 00003C5C 80EA02                          sub     dl,2            ;
 34842 00003C5F 8816[5548]                      mov     [bLastCol],dl   ; save column where status char will go
 34843                                  
 34844                                  menu_nostatus:
 34845 00003C63 BB0100                          mov     bx,1            ; now prepare to display all the menu items
 34846                                  menu_disploop:
 34847 00003C66 E8BD02                          call    print_item	; print item #BL
 34848 00003C69 43                              inc     bx              ; why "inc bx"?  because it's a 1-byte opcode
 34849 00003C6A 3A1E[5D48]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done?
 34850 00003C6E 76F6                            jbe	short menu_disploop ; not yet
 34851                                  
 34852                                  ;   Set cursor position to just below the menu items
 34853                                  
 34854 00003C70 B200                            mov     dl,0            ; select column
 34855 00003C72 88DE                            mov     dh,bl           ;
 34856 00003C74 80C604                          add     dh,4            ; select row below menu
 34857 00003C77 8A3E[5348]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 34858 00003C7B B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position beneath the block list
 34859 00003C7D CD10                            int     10h             ;
 34860                                  
 34861 00003C7F BA[A34D]                        mov     dx,_$MenuPrmpt
 34862 00003C82 E8A409                          call    print           ;
 34863 00003C85 E83603                          call    select_item     ; make a selection, return # in BX
 34864 00003C88 BA[764B]                        mov     dx,crlfm	
 34865 00003C8B E89B09                          call    print           ;
 34866 00003C8E FF36[5748]                      push    word [bDisableUI]
 34867 00003C92 800E[5748]01                    or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 34868 00003C97 E86F04                          call    show_status     ; clear the status line now
 34869 00003C9A 8F06[5748]                      pop     word [bDisableUI]
 34870                                  
 34871                                  ;   Now begins the "re-organization" process...
 34872                                  
 34873                                  menu_autoselect:
 34874 00003C9E 83FBFF                          cmp     bx,-1           ; clean boot requested?
 34875 00003CA1 7508                            jne	short normal_boot ; no
 34876 00003CA3 E80006                          call    disable_autoexec; basically, add a /D to the command.com line
 34877                                  menu_abort:
 34878 00003CA6 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ; then immediately exit with 0 config.sys image
 34879 00003CA8 E9EE00                          jmp	menu_exit	;
 34880                                  
 34881                                  normal_boot:
 34882 00003CAB 83FBFE                          cmp     bx,-2           ; back to top-level menu?
 34883 00003CAE 7509                            jne	short not_topmenu ; no
 34884 00003CB0 8B0E[5403]                      mov     cx,[count]      ; yes, start all over
 34885 00003CB4 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 34886 00003CB6 E9F4FD                          jmp     menu_search
 34887                                  
 34888                                  not_topmenu:
 34889 00003CB9 80BF[6248]4F                    cmp     byte [abBlockType+bx],CONFIG_SUBMENU
 34890 00003CBE 7510                            jne	short not_submenu
 34891 00003CC0 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 34892 00003CC2 8BBF[6C48]                      mov     di,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 34893 00003CC6 E8EE01                          call    srch_block      ; THIS CANNOT FAIL!
 34894 00003CC9 89FE                            mov     si,di           ;
 34895 00003CCB 89D9                            mov     cx,bx           ; ES:SI and CX are ready for another round
 34896 00003CCD E927FE                          jmp     menu_found
 34897                                  
 34898                                  not_submenu:
 34899 00003CD0 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ; get BX -> name of selected block
 34900 00003CD2 8B9F[6C48]                      mov     bx,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 34901                                  
 34902                                  ;   BX should now either be ZERO (meaning no block has been selected) or
 34903                                  ;   the offset relative to ES of the block name to be processed (along with
 34904                                  ;   all the "common" lines of course)
 34905                                  
 34906                                  no_selection:
 34907 00003CD6 891E[5E48]                      mov     [offDefBlock],bx; save selection
 34908 00003CDA 8B0E[5403]                      mov     cx,[count]      ; reset ES:SI and CX for reprocessing
 34909 00003CDE 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 34910 00003CE0 1E                              push    ds              ;
 34911 00003CE1 8E1E[DD14]                      mov     ds,[config_wrkseg]; this is where we'll store new config.sys image
 34912 00003CE5 29FF                            sub     di,di           ;
 34913                                  
 34914                                  ;   ES:SI-> config.sys, DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace
 34915                                  ;
 34916                                  ;   Work our way through the config.sys image again, this time copying
 34917                                  ;   all lines that are (A) "common" lines outside any block or (B) lines
 34918                                  ;   within the requested block. Lines inside INCLUDEd blocks are transparently
 34919                                  ;   copied by copy_block in a recursive fashion; the amount of recursion is
 34920                                  ;   limited by the fact INCLUDE statements are REMed by copy_block as they are
 34921                                  ;   processed and by the number of unique INCLUDE stmts in config.sys...
 34922                                  ;
 34923                                  ;   BUGBUG 20-Mar-1992 JeffPar: If we can figure out the lower bound of the
 34924                                  ;   stack we're running on, then we should check it inside copy_block
 34925                                  
 34926                                  copyblock_loop:
 34927 00003CE7 53                              push    bx              ; save selected block name
 34928 00003CE8 E83C01                          call    copy_block      ; process (named or common) block
 34929 00003CEB 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 34930 00003CEC 723C                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 34931                                  
 34932                                  ;   copy_block can only return for two reasons: it hit eof or a new block
 34933                                  
 34934                                  copyblock_begin:
 34935 00003CEE 50                              push    ax              ;
 34936 00003CEF 51                              push    cx              ;
 34937 00003CF0 56                              push    si              ;
 34938 00003CF1 57                              push    di              ; always do "common" blocks
 34939 00003CF2 BF[A148]                        mov     di,szCommon
 34940 00003CF5 1E                              push    ds              ;
 34941 00003CF6 0E                              push    cs              ;
 34942 00003CF7 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 34943 00003CF8 E8FC01                          call    comp_names      ;
 34944 00003CFB 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 34945 00003CFC 5F                              pop     di              ;
 34946 00003CFD 5E                              pop     si              ;
 34947 00003CFE 59                              pop     cx              ;
 34948 00003CFF 58                              pop     ax              ;
 34949 00003D00 740F                            je	short copyblock_check
 34950 00003D02 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ; is there a block name to check?
 34951 00003D04 7414                            jz	short copyblock_skip ; no
 34952 00003D06 57                              push    di              ;
 34953 00003D07 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ; check block against given block name
 34954 00003D09 1E                              push    ds              ;
 34955 00003D0A 06                              push    es              ;
 34956 00003D0B 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 34957 00003D0C E8E801                          call    comp_names      ; is this the block we really want to do?
 34958 00003D0F 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 34959 00003D10 5F                              pop     di              ;
 34960                                  copyblock_check:
 34961 00003D11 7217                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 34962 00003D13 7505                            jne	short copyblock_skip  ;
 34963 00003D15 E85504                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 34964 00003D18 EBCD                            jmp	short copyblock_loop 
 34965                                  
 34966                                  copyblock_skip:                 ;
 34967 00003D1A E85004                          call    skip_opt_line   ; this ain't the block we wanted, so skip it
 34968 00003D1D E87C04                          call    get_char        ;
 34969 00003D20 7208                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 34970 00003D22 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 34971 00003D24 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ;
 34972 00003D26 74C6                            je	short copyblock_begin
 34973 00003D28 EBF0                            jmp     short copyblock_skip ; anything else is just skipped
 34974                                  ;
 34975                                  ;   To create as little risk to the rest of SysInit as little as possible,
 34976                                  ;   and to free the workspace at "config_wrkseg" for creating an environment,
 34977                                  ;   copy the new config.sys image to "confbot"
 34978                                  ;
 34979                                  move_config:
 34980 00003D2A 89F9                            mov     cx,di           ; now copy workspace at DS:DI to "confbot"
 34981 00003D2C 51                              push    cx              ;
 34982                                  ;
 34983                                  ;   But first, copy the CONFIG=<configuration><0> string to the workspace,
 34984                                  ;   since the configuration name only currently exists in the "confbot" area
 34985                                  ;
 34986                                   	;mov	cx,7
 34987 00003D2D B90700                  	mov     cx,szMenu-szBoot-1
 34988 00003D30 BE[9448]                        mov     si,szBoot	; first copy the CONFIG= part
 34989 00003D33 47                              inc     di              ; skip a byte, in case absolutely nothing
 34990                                                                  ; was copied to the workspace, because we always
 34991                                                                  ; zero the first byte of the workspace (below)
 34992                                  copy_boot: 
 34993                                  	;lods    byte ptr cs:[si];
 34994 00003D34 2E                              cs
 34995 00003D35 AC                      	lodsb
 34996 00003D36 8805                    	mov     [di],al         ;
 34997 00003D38 47                              inc     di              ;
 34998 00003D39 E2F9                            loop    copy_boot       ;
 34999                                  
 35000 00003D3B 06                              push    es              ; then copy the configuration name
 35001                                          ;mov	cx,128-7	; put an upper limit on the name, to be safe
 35002                                  	; 04/01/2023
 35003 00003D3C B179                    	mov	cl,128-7
 35004 00003D3E 2E8B36[5E48]            	mov     si,[cs:offDefBlock]; ES:SI -> default block name
 35005 00003D43 09F6                            or      si,si           ; valid?
 35006 00003D45 7505                            jnz	short l1	; yes
 35007 00003D47 0E                              push    cs              ;
 35008 00003D48 07                              pop     es              ;
 35009 00003D49 BE[A148]                        mov     si,szCommon
 35010 00003D4C 268A04                  l1:     mov     al,[es:si]      ;
 35011 00003D4F E8B705                          call    any_delim       ;
 35012 00003D52 7406                            je	short l2	;
 35013 00003D54 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 35014 00003D56 46                              inc     si              ;
 35015 00003D57 47                              inc     di              ;
 35016 00003D58 E2F2                            loop    l1              ;
 35017 00003D5A C6050A                  l2:     mov     byte [di],lf	; terminate the configuration string
 35018 00003D5D 07                              pop     es              ;
 35019                                  
 35020                                  ;   Now we can copy "config_wrkseg" (DS) to "confbot" (ES)
 35021                                  
 35022 00003D5E 29FF                            sub     di,di           ;
 35023 00003D60 2E893E[DB14]                    mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 35024 00003D65 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 35025 00003D67 59                              pop     cx              ; recover the size of "config_wrkseg"
 35026                                  
 35027 00003D68 51                              push    cx              ;
 35028 00003D69 F3A4                            rep     movsb           ; moved!
 35029 00003D6B 59                              pop     cx              ;
 35030 00003D6C 8CD8                            mov     ax,ds           ;
 35031 00003D6E 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 35032                                  
 35033                                  ;   Now that the config_wrkseg is available once again, we shall
 35034                                  ;   use it to create an environment. The first thing to go in will be
 35035                                  ;   the "CONFIG=configuration" thing. It is also important to zero
 35036                                  ;   the first byte of the workspace, so that copy_envvar knows the buffer
 35037                                  ;   is empty.
 35038                                  
 35039 00003D6F 06                              push    es              ;
 35040 00003D70 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ;
 35041 00003D72 46                              inc     si              ; ES:SI -> "CONFIG=configuration"
 35042 00003D73 26C606000000                    mov     byte [es:0],0	;empty the environment block
 35043 00003D79 E82800                          call    copy_envvar     ; copy envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 35044 00003D7C 07                              pop     es
 35045                                  
 35046                                  ;   Before returning, restore the default video page setting but do NOT
 35047                                  ;   do it using INT 10h's Set Active Page function, because if the menu was
 35048                                  ;   displayed on a different page, then it's because we don't want to see
 35049                                  ;   all the device driver/TSR goop (which goes to the default page)
 35050                                  
 35051                                  menu_done:
 35052 00003D7D 803E[5348]00                    cmp     byte [bMenuPage],0
 35053 00003D82 7415                            je	short menu_exit	;
 35054 00003D84 06                              push    es              ;
 35055 00003D85 B84000                          mov     ax,40h          ;
 35056 00003D88 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ;
 35057 00003D8A A1[5948]                        mov     ax,[wCRTStart]  ;
 35058 00003D8D 26A34E00                        mov     [es:004Eh],ax   ;
 35059 00003D91 A0[5848]                        mov     al,[bCRTPage]   ;
 35060 00003D94 26A26200                        mov     [es:0062h],al   ;
 35061 00003D98 07                              pop     es              ;
 35062                                  menu_exit:
 35063 00003D99 890E[5403]                      mov     [count],cx      ; set new counts
 35064 00003D9D 890E[5603]                      mov     [org_count],cx  ;
 35065 00003DA1 29F6                            sub     si,si           ; always return ES:SI pointing to config.sys
 35066 00003DA3 C3                              retn
 35067                                  
 35068                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35069                                  ;
 35070                                  ;   copy_envvar:  copy the envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 35071                                  ;
 35072                                  ;   INPUT
 35073                                  ;    ES:SI -> environment variable (in the form "var=string<cr/lf>")
 35074                                  ;
 35075                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35076                                  ;       config_envlen (ie, where to put next envvar) updated appropriately
 35077                                  ;       carry set if error (eg, missing =); clear otherwise
 35078                                  ;
 35079                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35080                                  ;       None
 35081                                  ;
 35082                                  ;   NOTES
 35083                                  ;       None
 35084                                  ;
 35085                                  ;   HISTORY
 35086                                  ;       Created 29-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35087                                  ;
 35088                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35089                                  
 35090                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 35091                                  	; (SYSINIT:46D4h)
 35092                                  
 35093                                  copy_envvar:
 35094 00003DA4 51                              push    cx              ;
 35095 00003DA5 56                              push    si              ;
 35096 00003DA6 1E                              push    ds              ;
 35097 00003DA7 06                              push    es              ;
 35098 00003DA8 06                              push    es              ;
 35099 00003DA9 8E06[DD14]                      mov     es,[config_wrkseg] ; ES:DI to point to next available byte
 35100 00003DAD 1F                              pop     ds                 ; DS:SI to point to envvar
 35101                                  
 35102                                  ;   Have to calculate the length of the variable name (and if we hit
 35103                                  ;   the end of the line before we hit '=', then it's curtains for this
 35104                                  ;   config.sys line)
 35105                                  ;
 35106                                  ;   The check for NULL is important because copy_envvar is also used to copy
 35107                                  ;   the initial CONFIG= setting, which will have been zapped by a NULL if no
 35108                                  ;   menu block existed (in order to prevent the creation of an environment)
 35109                                  
 35110 00003DAE 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ;
 35111                                  copy_varlen:                    ;
 35112 00003DB0 AC                              lodsb                   ;
 35113 00003DB1 08C0                            or      al,al           ; NULL?
 35114 00003DB3 F9                              stc                     ;
 35115 00003DB4 746C                            jz	short copy_envexit ; yes, abort
 35116 00003DB6 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr          ;
 35117 00003DB8 F9                              stc                     ;
 35118 00003DB9 7467                            je	short copy_envexit
 35119 00003DBB 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf          ;
 35120 00003DBD F9                              stc                     ;
 35121 00003DBE 7462                            je	short copy_envexit
 35122 00003DC0 41                              inc     cx              ;
 35123 00003DC1 3C3D                            cmp     al,'='          ;
 35124 00003DC3 75EB                            jne	short copy_varlen
 35125 00003DC5 B000                            mov     al,0            ;
 35126 00003DC7 8A24                            mov     ah,[si]         ; save char after '='
 35127 00003DC9 29CE                            sub     si,cx           ; back up to given varname
 35128 00003DCB 49                              dec     cx              ; CX == # of bytes in varname
 35129 00003DCC 29FF                            sub     di,di           ; start looking for DS:SI at ES:0
 35130                                  copy_varsrch:
 35131 00003DCE 263805                          cmp     byte [es:di],al
 35132 00003DD1 7425                            je	short copy_envprep ; search failed, just copy var
 35133 00003DD3 89FB                            mov     bx,di           ; ES:BX -> start of this varname
 35134 00003DD5 51                              push    cx              ;
 35135 00003DD6 56                              push    si              ;
 35136 00003DD7 F3A6                            repe    cmpsb           ;
 35137 00003DD9 5E                              pop     si              ;
 35138 00003DDA 59                              pop     cx              ;
 35139 00003DDB 7531                            jne	short copy_varnext ; no match, skip to next varname
 35140 00003DDD 26803D3D                        cmp     byte [es:di],'='
 35141 00003DE1 752B                            jne     short copy_varnext ; no match, there's more characters
 35142                                  
 35143                                  ;   Previous occurrence of variable has been found; determine the
 35144                                  ;   entire length and then destroy it
 35145                                  
 35146 00003DE3 B9FFFF                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 35147 00003DE6 F2AE                            repne   scasb           ; guaranteed to get null (since we put it there)
 35148 00003DE8 56                              push    si              ;
 35149 00003DE9 89FE                            mov     si,di           ;
 35150 00003DEB 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ;
 35151 00003DED 2E8B0E[DB14]                    mov     cx,[cs:config_envlen]
 35152 00003DF2 29F1                            sub     cx,si           ; destroy variable now
 35153                                  	;rep movs byte ptr es:[di],byte ptr es:[si]
 35154                                  	;;db 0F3h,26h,0A4h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO:SYS - SYSINIT:4724h
 35155                                  
 35156 00003DF4 F3                      	rep	; 0F3h
 35157 00003DF5 26                      	es	; 26h
 35158 00003DF6 A4                      	movsb	; 0A4h
 35159                                  
 35160 00003DF7 5E                      	pop     si
 35161                                  copy_envprep:
 35162 00003DF8 80FC0D                          cmp     ah,cr          ; if there is nothing after the '='
 35163 00003DFB 741D                            je	short copy_envdel ; then just exit with variable deleted
 35164 00003DFD 80FC0A                          cmp     ah,lf           ;
 35165 00003E00 7418                            je	short copy_envdel
 35166                                          ;jmp	short copy_envloop
 35167                                  	; 04/01/2023
 35168                                  copy_envloop:                  ;
 35169 00003E02 AC                      	lodsb                   ;
 35170 00003E03 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr           ;
 35171 00003E05 7410                    	je	short copy_envdone
 35172 00003E07 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf           ;
 35173 00003E09 740C                    	je	short copy_envdone
 35174 00003E0B AA                      	stosb                   ;
 35175 00003E0C EBF4                    	jmp	short copy_envloop
 35176                                  
 35177                                  copy_varnext:                   ;
 35178 00003E0E 51                              push    cx              ;
 35179 00003E0F B9FFFF                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 35180 00003E12 F2AE                            repne   scasb           ;
 35181 00003E14 59                              pop     cx              ;
 35182 00003E15 EBB7                            jmp	short copy_varsrch
 35183                                  
 35184                                  	; 04/01/2023
 35185                                  ;copy_envloop:                  ;
 35186                                  ;	lodsb                   ;
 35187                                  ;	cmp	al,cr           ;
 35188                                  ;	je	short copy_envdone
 35189                                  ;	cmp	al,lf           ;
 35190                                  ;	je	short copy_envdone
 35191                                  ;	stosb                   ;
 35192                                  ;	jmp	short copy_envloop
 35193                                  
 35194                                  copy_envdone:                   ;
 35195 00003E17 28C0                            sub     al,al           ; do SUB to clear carry as well
 35196 00003E19 AA                              stosb                   ; always null-terminate these puppies
 35197                                  copy_envdel:                    ;
 35198 00003E1A 268805                          mov     [es:di],al      ; and stick another null to terminate the env.
 35199 00003E1D 2E893E[DB14]                    mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 35200                                  
 35201                                  copy_envexit:                   ;
 35202 00003E22 07                              pop     es              ;
 35203 00003E23 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 35204 00003E24 5E                              pop     si              ;
 35205 00003E25 59                              pop     cx              ;
 35206                                  
 35207                                  copy_done:	; 18/12/2022
 35208 00003E26 C3                              retn
 35209                                  
 35210                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35211                                  ;
 35212                                  ;   copy_block:  copy the current block to the new config.sys workspace
 35213                                  ;
 35214                                  ;   INPUT
 35215                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 35216                                  ;    ES:SI -> remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 35217                                  ;    DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace (equal in size to the original
 35218                                  ;             config.sys image) where the current block is to be copied
 35219                                  ;
 35220                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35221                                  ;       Same as above
 35222                                  ;       AL also equals the last character read from the organized image
 35223                                  ;
 35224                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35225                                  ;       All
 35226                                  ;
 35227                                  ;   NOTES
 35228                                  ;       None
 35229                                  ;
 35230                                  ;   HISTORY
 35231                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35232                                  ;
 35233                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35234                                  
 35235                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 35236                                  	; (SYSINIT:4759h)
 35237                                  
 35238                                  copy_block:
 35239 00003E27 E87203                          call    get_char        ; check for include
 35240 00003E2A 72FA                            jc	short copy_done	;
 35241 00003E2C 247F                    	and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 35242 00003E2E 3C5B                    	cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; another BEGIN implies END as well
 35243 00003E30 74F4                            je	short copy_done ;
 35244                                  
 35245 00003E32 3C4A                            cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE ; 'J'
 35246 00003E34 88E0                            mov     al,ah           ; AL == the original line code
 35247 00003E36 753A                            jne	short copy_line	; not an "include" line
 35248                                  
 35249                                  ;   We have hit an "INCLUDE" line; first, REM out the line so that we
 35250                                  ;   never try to include the block again (no infinite include loops please),
 35251                                  ;   then search for the named block and call copy_block again.
 35252                                  
 35253 00003E38 26C644FF30                      mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM ; '0'
 35254 00003E3D 57                              push    di              ;
 35255                                  
 35256 00003E3E BF[9C48]                        mov     di,szMenu
 35257 00003E41 E8D400                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE MENU
 35258 00003E44 7425                            je	short copy_skip	;
 35259                                  
 35260 00003E46 BF[A148]                        mov     di,szCommon
 35261 00003E49 E8CC00                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE COMMON
 35262 00003E4C 741D                            je	short copy_skip	;
 35263                                  
 35264 00003E4E 89F7                            mov     di,si           ; try to find the block
 35265 00003E50 E86400                          call    srch_block      ;
 35266 00003E53 89FA                            mov     dx,di           ;
 35267 00003E55 5F                              pop     di              ;
 35268 00003E56 7514                            jne	short copy_error ; no such block
 35269 00003E58 51                              push    cx              ;
 35270 00003E59 89D9                            mov     cx,bx           ;
 35271 00003E5B 56                              push    si              ;
 35272 00003E5C 4A                              dec     dx              ;
 35273 00003E5D 89D6                            mov     si,dx           ;
 35274 00003E5F E80F03                          call    skip_line       ; skip the rest of the "block name" line
 35275 00003E62 E8C2FF                          call    copy_block      ; and copy in the rest of that block
 35276 00003E65 5E                              pop     si              ;
 35277 00003E66 59                              pop     cx              ;
 35278 00003E67 28C0                            sub     al,al           ; force skip_opt_line to skip...
 35279 00003E69 EB2B                            jmp     short copy_nextline
 35280                                  
 35281                                  copy_skip:
 35282 00003E6B 5F                              pop     di
 35283                                  copy_error:
 35284 00003E6C F8                              clc                     ;
 35285 00003E6D E80204                          call    print_error     ; note that carry is clear, no pause
 35286 00003E70 EB24                            jmp     short copy_nextline
 35287                                  
 35288                                  ;   Copy the line at ES:SI to the current location at DS:DI
 35289                                  
 35290                                  copy_line:
 35291 00003E72 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 35292 00003E74 47                              inc     di              ;
 35293 00003E75 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ; is this is a "real" line with a "real" code?
 35294 00003E77 721D                            jb	short copy_nextline ; no
 35295 00003E79 2E803E[E014]00                  cmp     byte [cs:config_multi],0
 35296 00003E7F 7409                            je	short copy_loop	; not a multi-config config.sys, don't embed #s
 35297 00003E81 E81700                          call    get_linenum	; BX == line # of line @ES:SI
 35298 00003E84 891D                            mov     [di],bx         ; stash it immediately following the line code
 35299 00003E86 47                              inc     di              ;
 35300 00003E87 47                              inc     di              ;
 35301 00003E88 EB08                            jmp     short copy_next ;
 35302                                  copy_loop:                      ;
 35303 00003E8A E80F03                          call    get_char        ;
 35304 00003E8D 7297                            jc	short copy_done ; end of file
 35305 00003E8F 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 35306 00003E91 47                              inc     di              ;
 35307                                  copy_next:
 35308 00003E92 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah	; done with line?
 35309 00003E94 75F4                            jne	short copy_loop	; nope
 35310                                  
 35311                                  copy_nextline:
 35312 00003E96 E8D402                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 35313 00003E99 EB8C                            jmp     short copy_block
 35314                                  
 35315                                  	; 18/12/2022
 35316                                  ;copy_done:
 35317                                          ;retn
 35318                                  
 35319                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35320                                  ;
 35321                                  ;   get_linenum:  return line # (in BX) of current line (@ES:SI)
 35322                                  ;
 35323                                  ;   INPUT
 35324                                  ;    ES:SI -> some line in the config.sys memory image
 35325                                  ;
 35326                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35327                                  ;       BX == line # (relative to 1)
 35328                                  ;
 35329                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35330                                  ;       DX
 35331                                  ;
 35332                                  ;   NOTES
 35333                                  ;       None
 35334                                  ;
 35335                                  ;   HISTORY
 35336                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35337                                  ;
 35338                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35339                                  
 35340                                  get_linenum:
 35341 00003E9B 50                              push    ax              ;
 35342 00003E9C 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; BX == line # (to be returned)
 35343 00003E9E 51                              push    cx              ;
 35344 00003E9F 89F2                            mov     dx,si           ; DX == the offset we're looking for
 35345 00003EA1 56                              push    si              ;
 35346 00003EA2 2E8B0E[5403]                    mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 35347 00003EA7 29F6                            sub     si,si           ; prepare to scan entire file
 35348                                  get_linenum_loop:               ;
 35349 00003EA9 E8C502                          call    skip_line       ;
 35350 00003EAC 7205                            jc	short get_linenum_done
 35351 00003EAE 43                              inc     bx              ;
 35352 00003EAF 39D6                            cmp     si,dx           ; have we exceeded the desired offset yet?
 35353 00003EB1 72F6                            jb	short get_linenum_loop ; no
 35354                                  get_linenum_done:               ;
 35355 00003EB3 5E                              pop     si              ;
 35356 00003EB4 59                              pop     cx              ;
 35357 00003EB5 58                              pop     ax              ;
 35358 00003EB6 C3                              retn
 35359                                  
 35360                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35361                                  ;
 35362                                  ;   srch_block:  searches entire config.sys for block name @ES:DI
 35363                                  ;
 35364                                  ;   INPUT
 35365                                  ;       ES -> config.sys image
 35366                                  ;    ES:DI -> block name to find
 35367                                  ;
 35368                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35369                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found
 35370                                  ;    ES:DI -> just past the name in the block heading, if found
 35371                                  ;       BX == # bytes remaining from that point, if found
 35372                                  ;
 35373                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35374                                  ;       None
 35375                                  ;
 35376                                  ;   NOTES
 35377                                  ;       This differs from "find_block" in that it searches the ENTIRE
 35378                                  ;       config.sys image, not merely the remaining portion, and that it
 35379                                  ;       takes a pointer to block name that is *elsewhere* in the image
 35380                                  ;       (ie, ES) as opposed to some string constant in our own segment (DS).
 35381                                  ;
 35382                                  ;   HISTORY
 35383                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35384                                  ;
 35385                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35386                                  
 35387                                  srch_block:	          ; returns BX -> named block in CONFIG.SYS
 35388 00003EB7 50                              push    ax              ;
 35389 00003EB8 51                              push    cx              ;
 35390 00003EB9 2E8B0E[5403]                    mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 35391 00003EBE 56                              push    si              ;
 35392 00003EBF 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 35393 00003EC1 1E                              push    ds              ;
 35394 00003EC2 06                              push    es              ;
 35395 00003EC3 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 35396 00003EC4 E80900                          call    find_block      ;
 35397 00003EC7 89F7                            mov     di,si           ;
 35398 00003EC9 89CB                            mov     bx,cx           ;
 35399 00003ECB 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 35400 00003ECC 5E                              pop     si              ;
 35401 00003ECD 59                              pop     cx              ;
 35402 00003ECE 58                              pop     ax              ;
 35403                                  find_exit: ; 16/04/2019
 35404 00003ECF C3                              retn			;
 35405                                  
 35406                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35407                                  ;
 35408                                  ;   find_block:  searches rest of config.sys for block name @DS:DI
 35409                                  ;
 35410                                  ;   INPUT
 35411                                  ;    DS:DI -> block name to find
 35412                                  ;    ES:SI -> remainder of config.sys image
 35413                                  ;       CX == remaining size of config.sys image
 35414                                  ;
 35415                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35416                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found (also, CF set if EOF)
 35417                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the search stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 35418                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35419                                  ;
 35420                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35421                                  ;       AX
 35422                                  ;
 35423                                  ;   NOTES
 35424                                  ;       This differs from "srch_block" in that it searches only the
 35425                                  ;       remaining portion of the config.sys image and leaves SI and CX
 35426                                  ;       pointing to where the search left off, and that it takes a pointer
 35427                                  ;       to search string in our own segment (DS:DI instead of ES:DI).
 35428                                  ;
 35429                                  ;   HISTORY
 35430                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35431                                  ;
 35432                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35433                                  
 35434                                  find_block:
 35435 00003ED0 E8C902                          call    get_char        ; get line code
 35436 00003ED3 72FA                            jc	short find_exit	; end of file
 35437 00003ED5 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY
 35438 00003ED7 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; beginning of a block?
 35439 00003ED9 740C                            je	short check_line ; no
 35440 00003EDB 3C4A                            cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE
 35441 00003EDD 7513                            jne	short next_line	;
 35442 00003EDF 2E800E[E014]01                  or	byte [cs:config_multi],1
 35443 00003EE5 EB0B                            jmp     short next_line ;
 35444                                  check_line:
 35445 00003EE7 2E800E[E014]01                  or      byte [cs:config_multi],1
 35446 00003EED E80700                          call    comp_names      ; compare block names
 35447 00003EF0 76DD                            jbe	short find_exit	; end of file, or names matched
 35448                                  next_line:
 35449 00003EF2 E87802                          call    skip_opt_line   ; no, so skip to next line
 35450 00003EF5 EBD9                            jmp	short find_block  ;
 35451                                  ;find_exit:
 35452                                  ;	retn
 35453                                  
 35454                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35455                                  ;
 35456                                  ;   comp_names:  compares keyword @DS:DI to position in config.sys @ES:SI
 35457                                  ;
 35458                                  ;   INPUT
 35459                                  ;    DS:DI -> keyword to compare
 35460                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35461                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35462                                  ;
 35463                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35464                                  ;       ZF flag set, if match (also, CF set if EOF)
 35465                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the comparison stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 35466                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35467                                  ;
 35468                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35469                                  ;       AX
 35470                                  ;
 35471                                  ;   NOTES
 35472                                  ;       None
 35473                                  ;
 35474                                  ;   HISTORY
 35475                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35476                                  ;
 35477                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35478                                  
 35479                                  comp_names:
 35480 00003EF7 57                              push    di              ;
 35481                                  comp_loop:                      ;
 35482 00003EF8 E8A102                          call    get_char        ;
 35483 00003EFB 7210                            jc	short comp_exit	;
 35484 00003EFD E80904                          call    any_delim       ; is next character a delimiter?
 35485 00003F00 8A25                            mov     ah,[di]         ; (get next character we're supposed to match)
 35486 00003F02 740B                            je	short comp_almost ; yes, it *could* be a match
 35487 00003F04 47                              inc     di              ;
 35488 00003F05 25DFDF                          and     ax,~2020h ; 0DFDFh 
 35489                                  				; BUGBUG -- assumes both names are alphanumeric -JTP
 35490 00003F08 38E0                            cmp     al,ah           ; match?
 35491 00003F0A 74EC                            je	short comp_loop ; yes, keep looking at the characters
 35492 00003F0C F8                              clc                     ; prevent erroneous eof indication: clear carry
 35493                                  comp_exit:                      ;
 35494 00003F0D 5F                              pop     di              ;
 35495 00003F0E C3                              retn			;
 35496                                  comp_almost:                    ;
 35497 00003F0F 86C4                            xchg    al,ah           ; we don't know for sure if it's a match
 35498 00003F11 E8F503                          call    any_delim       ; until we verify that the second string has
 35499 00003F14 86C4                            xchg    al,ah           ; been exhausted also...
 35500 00003F16 EBF5                            jmp     short comp_exit ; if we are, this call to any_delim will tell...
 35501                                  
 35502                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35503                                  
 35504                                  comp_names_safe:
 35505 00003F18 50                              push    ax
 35506 00003F19 51                              push    cx
 35507 00003F1A 56                              push	si
 35508 00003F1B 1E                              push    ds
 35509 00003F1C 0E                              push    cs
 35510 00003F1D 1F                              pop     ds
 35511 00003F1E E8D6FF                          call    comp_names
 35512 00003F21 1F                              pop     ds
 35513 00003F22 5E                      	pop	si
 35514 00003F23 59                              pop     cx
 35515 00003F24 58                              pop     ax
 35516 00003F25 C3                              retn
 35517                                  
 35518                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35519                                  ;
 35520                                  ;   print_item:  display menu item #BL
 35521                                  ;
 35522                                  ;   INPUT
 35523                                  ;       BL == menu item # to display
 35524                                  ;
 35525                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35526                                  ;       Menu item displayed, with appropriate highlighting if BL == bDefBlock
 35527                                  ;
 35528                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35529                                  ;       None
 35530                                  ;
 35531                                  ;   NOTES
 35532                                  ;       This function saves/restores the current cursor position, so you
 35533                                  ;       needn't worry about it.
 35534                                  ;
 35535                                  ;   HISTORY
 35536                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35537                                  ;
 35538                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35539                                  
 35540                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 35541                                  	; (SYSINIT:485Ah)
 35542                                  
 35543                                  print_item:		; prints menu item #BL (1 to N)
 35544 00003F26 50                              push    ax              ;
 35545 00003F27 53                              push    bx              ;
 35546 00003F28 51                              push    cx              ;
 35547 00003F29 52                              push    dx              ;
 35548 00003F2A 56                              push    si              ;
 35549 00003F2B B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 35550 00003F2D 8A3E[5348]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; always page zero
 35551 00003F31 CD10                            int     10h             ; DH/DL = row/column
 35552 00003F33 52                              push    dx              ; save it
 35553 00003F34 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 35554 00003F36 88DE                            mov     dh,bl           ;
 35555 00003F38 80C603                          add     dh,3            ;
 35556 00003F3B B205                            mov     dl,5            ;
 35557 00003F3D CD10                            int     10h             ; set cursor position for correct row/col
 35558 00003F3F 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 35559 00003F41 0430                            add     al,'0'          ; convert menu item # to ASCII digit
 35560 00003F43 8A26[5248]                      mov     ah,[bMenuColor] ; normal attribute
 35561 00003F47 3A1E[5C48]                      cmp     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; are we printing the current block?
 35562 00003F4B 7510                            jne	short print_other ; no
 35563 00003F4D 80CC70                          or      ah,70h          ; yes, set bgnd color to white
 35564 00003F50 88E5                            mov     ch,ah           ;
 35565 00003F52 B104                            mov     cl,4            ;
 35566 00003F54 D2C5                            rol     ch,cl           ;
 35567 00003F56 38E5                            cmp     ch,ah           ; are fgnd/bgnd the same?
 35568 00003F58 7503                            jne	short print_other ; no
 35569 00003F5A 80F408                          xor     ah,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 35570                                  print_other:                    ;
 35571 00003F5D B700                            mov     bh,0            ;
 35572 00003F5F 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 35573 00003F61 8BBF[8048]                      mov     di,[aoffBlockDesc+bx]
 35574 00003F65 88E3                            mov     bl,ah           ; put the attribute in the correct register now
 35575 00003F67 8A3E[5348]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; get correct video page #
 35576 00003F6B B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; write char/attr
 35577 00003F6D B90100                          mov     cx,1            ;
 35578 00003F70 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35579 00003F72 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 35580 00003F74 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 35581 00003F76 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35582                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+'.'    ;
 35583 00003F78 B82E09                          mov	ax,092Eh
 35584 00003F7B CD10                    	int     10h             ; display '.'
 35585 00003F7D FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 35586 00003F7F B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 35587 00003F81 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35588                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+' '    ;
 35589 00003F83 B82009                          mov	ax,0920h
 35590 00003F86 CD10                    	int     10h             ; display ' '
 35591 00003F88 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 35592 00003F8A B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 35593 00003F8C CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35594 00003F8E 06                              push    es              ;
 35595                                  print_loop:                     ;
 35596 00003F8F 268A05                          mov     al,[es:di]	; get a character of the description
 35597 00003F92 47                              inc     di              ;
 35598 00003F93 3C09                            cmp     al,TAB ; 9	; substitute spaces for tabs
 35599 00003F95 7502                            jne	short print_nontab ;
 35600 00003F97 B020                            mov     al,' '          ;
 35601                                  print_nontab:                   ;
 35602 00003F99 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ;
 35603 00003F9B 7215                            jb	short print_done ; stop at the 1st character < space
 35604 00003F9D 3C24                            cmp     al,'$'          ;
 35605 00003F9F 7411                            je	short print_done ; also stop on $
 35606 00003FA1 B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; display function #
 35607 00003FA3 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35608 00003FA5 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 35609 00003FA7 80FA4E                          cmp     dl,78           ; far enough?
 35610 00003FAA 7306                            jae	short print_done ; yes
 35611 00003FAC B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 35612 00003FAE CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35613 00003FB0 EBDD                            jmp	short  print_loop
 35614                                  print_done:                     ;
 35615 00003FB2 07                              pop     es              ;
 35616 00003FB3 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 35617 00003FB4 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 35618 00003FB6 CD10                            int     10h             ; restore previous row/col
 35619 00003FB8 5E                              pop     si              ;
 35620 00003FB9 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 35621 00003FBA 59                              pop     cx              ;
 35622 00003FBB 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 35623 00003FBC 58                              pop     ax              ;
 35624 00003FBD C3                              retn			;
 35625                                  
 35626                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35627                                  ;
 35628                                  ;   select_item:  wait for user to select menu item, with time-out
 35629                                  ;
 35630                                  ;   INPUT
 35631                                  ;       None
 35632                                  ;
 35633                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35634                                  ;       BX == menu item # (1-N), or -1 for clean boot
 35635                                  ;       Selected menu item highlighted
 35636                                  ;       Cursor positioned beneath menu, ready for tty-style output now
 35637                                  ;
 35638                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35639                                  ;       None
 35640                                  ;
 35641                                  ;   NOTES
 35642                                  ;       None
 35643                                  ;
 35644                                  ;   HISTORY
 35645                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35646                                  ;
 35647                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35648                                  
 35649                                  select_item:		; returns digit value in BX (trashes AX/CX/DX)
 35650 00003FBE 8A1E[5C48]                      mov     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; BL will be the default block #
 35651 00003FC2 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 35652 00003FC4 E83201                          call    disp_num        ;
 35653 00003FC7 E83F01                          call    show_status     ; display current interactive status
 35654 00003FCA 803E[6048]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 35655 00003FCF 7452                            je	short input_key	; no time-out, just go to input
 35656 00003FD1 B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME ; 2Ch
 35657 00003FD3 CD21                            int     21h             ;
 35658 00003FD5 88F7                            mov     bh,dh           ; BH = initial # of seconds
 35659                                  check_time:
 35660 00003FD7 A0[6048]                        mov     al,[secTimeOut] ;
 35661 00003FDA 2A06[6148]                      sub     al,[secElapsed] ;
 35662 00003FDE 730D                            jae	short show_time	;
 35663 00003FE0 800E[5B48]02                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],2  ; disable all further prompting
 35664 00003FE5 C606[6148]00                    mov     byte [secElapsed],0
 35665 00003FEA E9F100                          jmp	select_done	; time's up!
 35666                                  show_time:
 35667 00003FED 53                              push    bx              ;
 35668 00003FEE 88C3                            mov     bl,al           ; save # in BL
 35669 00003FF0 8A3E[5348]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 35670 00003FF4 B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 35671 00003FF6 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35672 00003FF8 52                              push    dx              ;
 35673 00003FF9 80C208                  	add	dl,8		; move cursor to the right
 35674 00003FFC B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 35675 00003FFE CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35676 00004000 BA[164E]                        mov     dx,_$TimeOut
 35677 00004003 E82306                          call    print           ; print the "Time remaining: " prompt
 35678 00004006 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ; recover # from BL
 35679 00004008 98                              cbw                     ; this works because AL is always <= 90
 35680 00004009 B10A                            mov     cl,10           ;
 35681 0000400B F6F1                            div     cl              ; AL = tens digit, AH = ones digit
 35682 0000400D 88E1                            mov     cl,ah           ;
 35683 0000400F 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 35684 00004011 B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 35685 00004013 CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY tens digit
 35686 00004015 88C8                            mov     al,cl           ;
 35687 00004017 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 35688 00004019 B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 35689 0000401B CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY ones digit
 35690 0000401D 5A                              pop     dx
 35691 0000401E B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position back to where it was
 35692 00004020 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35693 00004022 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 35694                                  input_key:
 35695 00004023 B406                            mov     ah,RAW_CON_IO ; 6
 35696 00004025 B2FF                            mov     dl,0FFh         ; input request
 35697 00004027 CD21                            int     21h             ;
 35698 00004029 751F                            jnz	short got_key	;
 35699 0000402B 803E[6048]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1; is there a time-out?
 35700 00004030 74F1                            je	short input_key	; no, just go back to input
 35701 00004032 B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME     ;
 35702 00004034 CD21                            int     21h             ; DH = seconds
 35703 00004036 88F4                            mov     ah,dh           ;
 35704 00004038 28FE                            sub     dh,bh           ; should generally be zero or one
 35705 0000403A 88E7                            mov     bh,ah           ;
 35706 0000403C 7302                            jnc	short got_time	;
 35707 0000403E B601                            mov     dh,1            ; it wrapped back to zero, so assume one
 35708                                  got_time:
 35709 00004040 08F6                            or      dh,dh           ; any change?
 35710 00004042 74DF                            jz	short input_key	; no
 35711 00004044 0036[6148]                      add     [secElapsed],dh ;
 35712 00004048 EB8D                            jmp	short check_time ;
 35713                                  got_key:
 35714 0000404A 50                              push    ax              ;
 35715 0000404B B8FFFF                          mov     ax,-1           ; zap both secTimeOut and secElapsed
 35716 0000404E 8706[6048]                      xchg    [secTimeOut],ax
 35717 00004052 3CFF                            cmp     al,-1           ; was time-out already disabled?
 35718 00004054 740E                            je	short timeout_disabled ; yes
 35719 00004056 53                              push    bx              ; let's disable # seconds display
 35720 00004057 B8200A                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 35721 0000405A 8B1E[5248]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 35722 0000405E B95000                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be safe
 35723 00004061 CD10                            int     10h             ; to completely obliterate # seconds display
 35724 00004063 5B                              pop     bx   		;
 35725                                  
 35726                                  timeout_disabled:
 35727 00004064 58                              pop     ax              ;
 35728 00004065 08C0                            or      al,al           ; extended key pressed?
 35729 00004067 7555                            jnz	short normal_key ; no
 35730 00004069 CD21                            int     21h             ; get the next part of the key then
 35731 0000406B 74B6                            jz	short input_key	; hmmm, what happened to the second part?
 35732                                  
 35733 0000406D 3C48                            cmp     al,48h          ; up arrow?
 35734 0000406F 7510                            jne	short not_up	; no
 35735 00004071 80FB01                          cmp     bl,1            ; are we as up as up can get?
 35736 00004074 76AD                            jbe	short input_key	; yes, ignore it
 35737 00004076 FE0E[5C48]                      dec     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 35738 0000407A E8A9FE                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 35739 0000407D FECB                            dec     bl              ; and then print the new current item
 35740 0000407F EB12                            jmp     short print1
 35741                                  not_up:
 35742 00004081 3C50                            cmp     al,50h          ; down arrow?
 35743 00004083 7518                            jne	short not_down	; no
 35744 00004085 3A1E[5D48]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; are we as down as down can get?
 35745 00004089 7310                            jae	short to_input_key ; yes, ignore it
 35746 0000408B FE06[5C48]                      inc     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 35747 0000408F E894FE                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 35748 00004092 43                              inc     bx              ; and then print the new current item
 35749                                  print1: 
 35750 00004093 88D8                    	mov     al,bl           ;
 35751                                  print2: 
 35752 00004095 E88EFE                  	call    print_item      ;
 35753 00004098 E85E00                          call    disp_num        ;
 35754                                  to_input_key:
 35755 0000409B EB86                            jmp     input_key       ;
 35756                                  not_down:
 35757 0000409D F606[5748]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 35758 000040A2 75F7                            jnz	short to_input_key ; don't allow F8 or F5
 35759 000040A4 3C42                            cmp     al,42h          ; F8 function key?
 35760 000040A6 750B                            jne	short not_f8	; no
 35761 000040A8 8036[5B48]01                    xor     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 35762 000040AD E85900                          call    show_status     ;
 35763 000040B0 E970FF                          jmp     input_key	;
 35764                                  not_f8:
 35765 000040B3 3C3F                            cmp     al,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 35766 000040B5 75E4                            jne	short to_input_key ; no
 35767 000040B7 BBFFFF                          mov     bx,-1           ; special return code (-1) indicating clean boot
 35768 000040BA B020                            mov     al,' '          ; don't want to display anything really;
 35769 000040BC EB26                            jmp     short disp_input; just want to display the cr/lf sequence...
 35770                                  
 35771                                  normal_key:
 35772 000040BE 3C0D                            cmp     al,0Dh          ; Enter?
 35773 000040C0 741C                            je	short select_done ; yes
 35774 000040C2 3C08                            cmp     al,08h          ; backspace?
 35775 000040C4 7504                            jne	short not_backspace ; no
 35776 000040C6 BBFEFF                          mov     bx,-2 ; 0FFFEh	; yes, special return code
 35777 000040C9 C3                              retn			;
 35778                                  not_backspace:
 35779 000040CA 2C30                            sub     al,'0'          ; is greater than '0'?
 35780 000040CC 76CD                            jbe	short to_input_key ; no
 35781 000040CE 3A06[5D48]                      cmp     al,[bMaxBlock]  ; is less than or equal to the maximum digit?
 35782 000040D2 77C7                            ja	short to_input_key ; no
 35783 000040D4 A2[5C48]                        mov	[bDefBlock],al  ;
 35784 000040D7 E84CFE                          call    print_item      ; redisplay the current selection
 35785 000040DA 88C3                            mov     bl,al           ; set new selection
