 35786 000040DC EBB7                            jmp	short print2
 35787                                  
 35788                                  select_done:
 35789 000040DE B700                            mov     bh,0            ; return a full 16-bit value (for indexing)
 35790 000040E0 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 35791 000040E2 0430                            add     al,'0'          ; convert it into a digit, then display it
 35792                                  
 35793                                  	; fall into disp_input
 35794                                  
 35795                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35796                                  
 35797                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35798                                  ;
 35799                                  ;   disp_input:  display a single character + cr/lf
 35800                                  ;
 35801                                  ;   INPUT
 35802                                  ;       AL == character to display
 35803                                  ;
 35804                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35805                                  ;       None
 35806                                  ;
 35807                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35808                                  ;       None
 35809                                  ;
 35810                                  ;   NOTES
 35811                                  ;       This function is used not only for the menu input selection but
 35812                                  ;       also for the interactive line prompting (the y/n/a thing).
 35813                                  ;
 35814                                  ;   HISTORY
 35815                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35816                                  ;
 35817                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35818                                  
 35819                                  disp_input:
 35820 000040E4 50                              push    ax
 35821 000040E5 3C20                            cmp     al,' '
 35822 000040E7 7302                            jae	short disp_ok
 35823 000040E9 B020                            mov     al,' '
 35824                                  disp_ok:
 35825 000040EB 88C2                            mov     dl,al
 35826 000040ED B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 35827 000040EF CD21                            int     21h
 35828 000040F1 BA[764B]                        mov     dx,crlfm
 35829 000040F4 E83205                          call    print
 35830 000040F7 58                              pop     ax
 35831 000040F8 C3                              retn
 35832                                  
 35833                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35834                                  
 35835                                  disp_num:
 35836 000040F9 53                              push    bx
 35837 000040FA 0430                            add     al,'0'
 35838 000040FC B40A                            mov     ah,0Ah
 35839 000040FE 8B1E[5248]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 35840 00004102 B90100                          mov     cx,1
 35841 00004105 CD10                            int     10h
 35842 00004107 5B                              pop     bx
 35843 00004108 C3                              retn
 35844                                  
 35845                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35846                                  ;
 35847                                  ;   show_status:  display current interactive mode setting (on/off/none)
 35848                                  ;
 35849                                  ;   INPUT
 35850                                  ;       None
 35851                                  ;
 35852                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35853                                  ;       None
 35854                                  ;
 35855                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35856                                  ;       None
 35857                                  ;
 35858                                  ;   NOTES
 35859                                  ;       None
 35860                                  ;
 35861                                  ;   HISTORY
 35862                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35863                                  ;
 35864                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35865                                  
 35866                                  show_status:
 35867 00004109 53                              push    bx              ; BL = video page #
 35868 0000410A 8B1E[5248]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 35869 0000410E B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 35870 00004110 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35871 00004112 52                              push    dx              ; save it
 35872 00004113 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 35873 00004115 8B16[5548]                      mov     dx,[bLastCol]   ; set correct row/col
 35874 00004119 F606[5748]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 35875 0000411E 740E                            jz	short show_onoff ; just show on/off
 35876 00004120 B200                            mov     dl,0            ;
 35877 00004122 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35878 00004124 B8200A                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 35879 00004127 B95000                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be exact
 35880 0000412A CD10                            int     10h             ; to obliterate the status line
 35881 0000412C EB13                            jmp     short show_done ;
 35882                                  show_onoff: 
 35883 0000412E CD10                            int     10h
 35884                                  		; - VIDEO - WRITE CHARACTERS ONLY AT CURSOR POSITION
 35885                                  		; AL = character, BH = display page - alpha mode
 35886                                  		; BL = color of character (graphics mode, PCjr only)
 35887                                  		; CX = number of times to write character
 35888                                  
 35889 00004130 A0[124E]                        mov     al,[_$NO]	; assume OFF
 35890 00004133 803E[5B48]01                    cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; is interactive mode on?
 35891 00004138 7503                            jne	short show_noton ; no
 35892 0000413A A0[0E4E]                        mov     al,[_$YES]	; yes
 35893                                  show_noton:                     ;
 35894 0000413D B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ; write TTY
 35895 0000413F CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35896                                  show_done:                      ;
 35897 00004141 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 35898 00004142 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 35899 00004144 CD10                            int     10h             ; restore original cursor position
 35900 00004146 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 35901 00004147 C3                              retn			;
 35902                                  
 35903                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35904                                  
 35905                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35906                                  ;
 35907                                  ;   skip_token: advances ES:SI/CX past the current token
 35908                                  ;
 35909                                  ;   INPUT
 35910                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35911                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35912                                  ;
 35913                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35914                                  ;       CF set if EOL/EOF hit
 35915                                  ;       AL == 1st char of delimiter
 35916                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the delimiter
 35917                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35918                                  ;
 35919                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35920                                  ;       AX
 35921                                  ;
 35922                                  ;   NOTES
 35923                                  ;       None
 35924                                  ;
 35925                                  ;   HISTORY
 35926                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35927                                  ;
 35928                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35929                                  
 35930                                  skip_token:
 35931 00004148 E85100                          call    get_char
 35932 0000414B 7210                            jc	short skip_token_done
 35933 0000414D E8B901                          call    any_delim
 35934 00004150 75F6                            jne	short skip_token
 35935                                  skip_check_eol:
 35936 00004152 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr ; 0Dh
 35937 00004154 7406                            je	short skip_token_eol
 35938 00004156 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 35939 00004158 7402                            je	short skip_token_eol
 35940 0000415A F8                              clc
 35941                                          ;jmp	short skip_token_done
 35942 0000415B C3                      	retn
 35943                                  skip_token_eol:
 35944 0000415C F9                              stc
 35945                                  skip_token_done:
 35946 0000415D C3                              retn
 35947                                  
 35948                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35949                                  ;
 35950                                  ;   skip_delim: advances ES:SI/CX past the current delimiter
 35951                                  ;
 35952                                  ;   INPUT
 35953                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35954                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35955                                  ;
 35956                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35957                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 35958                                  ;       AL == 1st char of token
 35959                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the token
 35960                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35961                                  ;    ES:BX -> new token (since ES:SI is already pointing 1 byte past token)
 35962                                  ;
 35963                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35964                                  ;       AX
 35965                                  ;
 35966                                  ;   NOTES
 35967                                  ;       None
 35968                                  ;
 35969                                  ;   HISTORY
 35970                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35971                                  ;
 35972                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35973                                  
 35974                                  skip_delim:	; returns carry set if eol/eof
 35975 0000415E E83B00                          call    get_char        ;
 35976 00004161 8D5CFF                          lea     bx,[si-1]       ; also returns BX -> next token
 35977 00004164 72F7                            jc	short skip_token_done ;
 35978 00004166 E8B001                          call    delim           ;
 35979 00004169 74F3                            je	short skip_delim ;
 35980 0000416B EBE5                            jmp	short skip_check_eol  ; 13/05/2019
 35981                                  
 35982                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35983                                  ;
 35984                                  ;   skip_opt_line: same as skip_line provided AL != LF
 35985                                  ;
 35986                                  ;   INPUT
 35987                                  ;       AL == last character read
 35988                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35989                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35990                                  ;
 35991                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35992                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 35993                                  ;       AL == 1st char of new line
 35994                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 35995                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35996                                  ;
 35997                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35998                                  ;       AX
 35999                                  ;
 36000                                  ;   NOTES
 36001                                  ;       In other words, the purpose here is to skip to the next line,
 36002                                  ;       unless ES:SI is already sitting at the front of the next line (which
 36003                                  ;       it would be if the last character fetched -- AL -- was a linefeed)
 36004                                  ;
 36005                                  ;   HISTORY
 36006                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36007                                  ;
 36008                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36009                                  
 36010                                  skip_opt_line:
 36011 0000416D 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 36012 0000416F 7409                            je	short skip_line_done
 36013                                       
 36014                                  	; fall into skip_line
 36015                                  
 36016                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36017                                  ;
 36018                                  ;   skip_line: skip to the next line
 36019                                  ;
 36020                                  ;   INPUT
 36021                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36022                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36023                                  ;
 36024                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36025                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 36026                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 36027                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36028                                  ;
 36029                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36030                                  ;       AX
 36031                                  ;
 36032                                  ;   NOTES
 36033                                  ;       None
 36034                                  ;
 36035                                  ;   HISTORY
 36036                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36037                                  ;
 36038                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36039                                  
 36040                                  skip_line:
 36041 00004171 E82800                          call    get_char
 36042 00004174 7204                            jc	short skip_line_done
 36043 00004176 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 36044 00004178 75F7                            jne	short skip_line
 36045                                  skip_line_done:
 36046                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 36047 0000417A C3                              retn
 36048                                  
 36049                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36050                                  ;
 36051                                  ;   get_number: return binary equivalent of numeric string
 36052                                  ;
 36053                                  ;   INPUT
 36054                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36055                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36056                                  ;
 36057                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36058                                  ;       AL == non-digit encountered
 36059                                  ;       BX == binary #
 36060                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st non-digit
 36061                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36062                                  ;
 36063                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36064                                  ;       AX
 36065                                  ;
 36066                                  ;   NOTES
 36067                                  ;       None
 36068                                  ;
 36069                                  ;   HISTORY
 36070                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36071                                  ;
 36072                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36073                                  
 36074                                  ; 13/05/2019
 36075                                  
 36076                                  get_number:

 36078                                  num_loop:

 36101                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36102                                  ;
 36103                                  ;   get_char:  return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 36104                                  ;
 36105                                  ;   INPUT
 36106                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36107                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36108                                  ;
 36109                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36110                                  ;       AL == next character
 36111                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 36112                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36113                                  ;
 36114                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36115                                  ;       AX
 36116                                  ;
 36117                                  ;   NOTES
 36118                                  ;       None
 36119                                  ;
 36120                                  ;   HISTORY
 36121                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36122                                  ;
 36123                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36124                                  
 36125                                  get_char:
 36126 0000419C 83E901                          sub     cx,1            ; use SUB to set carry,zero
 36127 0000419F 7205                            jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 36128                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 36129 000041A1 26                      	es	
 36130 000041A2 AC                      	lodsb
 36131 000041A3 88C4                            mov     ah,al           ;
 36132 000041A5 C3                              retn			;
 36133                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 36134 000041A6 B90000                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 36135                                  nearby_ret:
 36136 000041A9 C3                              retn

 36138                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36139                                  ;
 36140                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 36141                                  ;
 36142                                  ;   INPUT
 36143                                  ;       AL == current command code
 36144                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 36145                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 36146                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 36147                                  ;
 36148                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36149                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 36150                                  ;
 36151                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36152                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 36153                                  ;
 36154                                  ;   NOTES
 36155                                  ;       None
 36156                                  ;
 36157                                  ;   HISTORY
 36158                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36159                                  ;
 36160                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36161                                  
 36162                                  	; 31/12/2022 - Retro UNIX 386 v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36163                                  	; (SYSINIT:4AE5h)
 36164                                  
 36165                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36166                                  query_user:
 36167 000041AA F606[5B48]04                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?
 36168                                  	; 01/01/2023
 36169 000041AF 7403                    	jz	short qu_1		;
 36170 000041B1 E9BA00                  	jmp	skip_all
 36171                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36172                                  	;;jmp	short skip_all		;
 36173                                  	;jnz	short skip_all
 36174                                  qu_1:
 36175 000041B4 F606[5B48]02            	test    byte [bQueryOpt],2	; answer yes to everything?

 36192                                  query_all:
 36193                                  
 36194                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 36195                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 36196                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 36197                                  
 36198 000041CC 56                              push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 36199 000041CD BA[684E]                        mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 36200 000041D0 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 36201 000041D2 7451                            jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 36202

 36204 000041D6 29DB                            sub     bx,bx                   ;
 36205 000041D8 BF[A848]                        mov     di,comtab		;
 36206                                  find_match:                             ;
 36207 000041DB 8A1D                            mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 36208 000041DD 08DB                            or      bl,bl                   ;
 36209 000041DF 7425                            jz	short line_print	; end of table
 36210 000041E1 47                              inc     di                      ;
 36211 000041E2 3A01                            cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 36212 000041E4 7405                            je	short cmd_match		; yes
 36213 000041E6 8D7901                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 36214                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 36215 000041E9 EBF0                            jmp	short find_match	; loop
 36216                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 36217 000041EB 8A4DFF                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 36218 000041EE B500                            mov	ch,0                    ;
 36219 000041F0 B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 36220                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 36221 000041F2 8A05                            mov     al,[di]                 ;
 36222 000041F4 47                              inc     di                      ;
 36223 000041F5 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 36224 000041F7 CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 36225 000041F9 E2F7                            loop    cmd_print               ;
 36226 000041FB B23D                            mov     dl,'='                  ;
 36227 000041FD 80FE56                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 36228 00004200 7502                            jne	short cmd_notset	;
 36229 00004202 B220                            mov     dl,' '                  ;
 36230                                  cmd_notset:
 36231 00004204 CD21                            int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 36232                                  line_print:                             ;
 36233                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 36234 00004206 26                              es
 36235 00004207 AC                      	lodsb
 36236 00004208 08C0                    	or      al,al                   ;
 36237 0000420A 7502                            jnz	short non_null		;
 36238 0000420C B020                            mov     al,' '                  ;
 36239                                  non_null:                               ;
 36240 0000420E 3C20                            cmp     al,' '                  ; control code?

 36242 00004212 7506                            jne	short non_space		;
 36243 00004214 26803C20                        cmp     byte [es:si],' '	;
 36244 00004218 7208                            jb	short prompt_user	;
 36245                                  non_space:                              ;
 36246 0000421A 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 36247 0000421C B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2	;
 36248 0000421E CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 36249 00004220 EBE4                            jmp	short line_print	;

 36251 00004222 BA[064E]                        mov     dx,_$InterPrmpt		;
 36252                                  
 36253                                  generic_prompt:
 36254 00004225 E80104                          call    print                   ;
 36255                                  input_loop:                             ;
 36256 00004228 B400                            mov     ah,0                    ; read a key
 36257 0000422A CD16                            int     16h                     ;
 36258 0000422C 08C0                            or      al,al                   ; is it a function key?
 36259 0000422E 750F                            jnz	short not_func		; no
 36260 00004230 80FC3F                          cmp     ah,3Fh                  ; F5 function key?
 36261 00004233 75F3                            jne	short input_loop	; no
 36262 00004235 A0[124E]                        mov     al,[_$NO]                  ;
 36263 00004238 800E[5B48]04                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],4	; no more queries
 36264 0000423D EB21                            jmp     short legal_char        ;
 36265                                  not_func:
 36266 0000423F 24DF                            and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; converting to upper case
 36267 00004241 3A06[124E]                      cmp     al,[_$NO]		; verify character is legal
 36268 00004245 7419                            je	short legal_char	;

 36270 0000424B 7413                            je	short legal_char	;

 36273 00004254 3C1B                            cmp     al,1Bh                  ; Esc?

 36276 0000425D A0[0E4E]                        mov     al,[_$YES]

 36280

 36354                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36355                                  
 36356                                  ;   This function is very simple: it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 36357                                  ;   command-line for the shell; this (undocumented) switch disables
 36358                                  ;   AUTOEXEC.BAT processing and the date/time prompt that is usually
 36359                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.
 36360                                  
 36361                                  disable_autoexec:
 36362                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS -  SYSINIT:4BE2h
 36363                                  	; 17/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36364                                  
 36365 000042A6 F606[5B48]04            	test	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 36366 000042AB 7443                    	jz	short disable_exit

 36370                                          ;or	byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 36371 000042B9 810E[5B48]0201          	or      word [bQueryOpt],102h	; [bDefBlock] = 1
 36372 000042BF BA4420                  	mov     dx,'D ' ; 2044h
 36373                                  dae_1:
 36374                                          ;mov	al,[def_swchr]
 36375 000042C2 A0[9047]                	mov     al,[command_line-1]     ; get default switchchar
 36376 000042C5 08C0                            or      al,al                   ; anything there?
 36377 000042C7 7427                            jz	short disable_exit	; no, disable_autoexec already called
 36378 000042C9 8A1E[9147]                      mov     bl,[command_line]       ;

 36380 000042CF 89D9                            mov     cx,bx                   ;

 36386 000042E1 41                              inc     cx                      ; (just for consistency sake)

 36417                                  ; procedure : delim
 36418                                  ;
 36419                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36420                                  
 36421                                  ; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36422                                  ; (SYSINIT:4C45h)

 36425                                  ;%if 0
 36426                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 36427                                  ;
 36428                                  any_delim:
 36429 00004309 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr
 36430 0000430B 7427                    	je	short delim_ret
 36431 0000430D 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf
 36432 0000430F 7423                    	je	short delim_ret
 36433 00004311 3C5B                    	cmp	al,'['
 36434 00004313 741F                    	je	short delim_ret
 36435 00004315 3C5D                    	cmp	al,']'
 36436 00004317 741B                    	je	short delim_ret
 36437                                  ;
 36438                                  ;;endif ;MULTI_CONFIG
 36439                                  ;%endif ; 02/11/2022
 36440                                  
 36441                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 36442                                  	; (SYSINIT:3450h)	
 36443                                  delim:
 36444 00004319 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'		; ibm will assume "/" as an delimeter.
 36445 0000431B 7417                    	je	short delim_ret
 36446                                  
 36447 0000431D 3C00                    	cmp	al,0		; special case for sysinit!!!
 36448 0000431F 7413                    	je	short delim_ret
 36449                                  
 36450                                  org_delim:			; used by organize routine except for getting
 36451 00004321 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '          ; the filename.
 36452 00004323 740F                    	je	short delim_ret
 36453 00004325 3C09                            cmp     al,tab ; 9
 36454 00004327 740B                    	je	short delim_ret
 36455 00004329 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='
 36456 0000432B 7407                    	je	short delim_ret
 36457 0000432D 3C2C                    	cmp	al,','
 36458 0000432F 7403                    	je	short delim_ret
 36459 00004331 3C3B                    	cmp	al,';'
 36460                                  
 36461                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36462                                  
 36463                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 36464                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 36465                                  ;   Make sure there's no chance of a false EOF indication
 36466 00004333 F8                      	clc
 36467                                  ;endif
 36468                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36469                                  delim_ret:
 36470                                  	; 04/01/2023
 36471                                  	; cf = 0
 36472 00004334 C3                      	retn

 36492                                  ; 
 36493                                  ; procedure : mapcase
 36494                                  ;
 36495                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36496                                  
 36497                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 36498                                  
 36499                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36500                                  	; (SYSINIT:4C7Eh)
 36501                                  mapcase:
 36502 00004342 51                      	push	cx
 36503 00004343 56                      	push	si
 36504 00004344 1E                      	push	ds
 36505                                  
 36506 00004345 06                      	push	es
 36507 00004346 1F                      	pop	ds
 36508                                  
 36509                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36510                                  
 36511                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 36512                                  
 36513                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 36514 00004347 88C3                    	mov	bl,al			; same cmd code this line
 36515                                  ;else
 36516                                  ;	xor	si,si
 36517                                  ;endif
 36518                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36519                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 36520                                  	;xor	si, si
 36521                                  
 36522                                  convloop:
 36523 00004349 AC                      	lodsb
 36524 0000434A 3C61                    	cmp	al,'a'
 36525 0000434C 7209                    	jb	short noconv
 36526 0000434E 3C7A                    	cmp	al,'z'
 36527 00004350 7705                    	ja	short noconv
 36528 00004352 2C20                    	sub	al,20h
 36529 00004354 8844FF                  	mov	[si-1],al
 36530                                  noconv:
 36531                                  
 36532                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36533                                  
 36534                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 36535                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 36536                                  
 36537                                  ;   When MULTI_CONFIG enabled, "mapcase" is used to map everything to
 36538                                  ;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether
 36539                                  ;   the line is a SET command or not (since we don't want to upper-case
 36540                                  ;   anything after the "=" in a SET)
 36541                                  ;
 36542 00004357 80FB56                  	cmp	bl,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'	; preserve case for part of the line?
 36543 0000435A 7504                    	jne	short check_eol		; no, just check for end-of-line
 36544 0000435C 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='                  ; separator between SET var and value?
 36545 0000435E 740A                    	je	short convdone		; yes
 36546                                  check_eol:
 36547 00004360 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr
 36548 00004362 7406                    	je	short convdone
 36549 00004364 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf
 36550 00004366 7402                    	je	short convdone
 36551                                  ;endif
 36552                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36553 00004368 E2DF                    	loop	convloop
 36554                                  convdone:
 36555 0000436A 1F                      	pop	ds
 36556 0000436B 5E                      	pop	si
 36557 0000436C 59                      	pop	cx
 36558 0000436D C3                      	retn

 36561                                  ;
 36562                                  ; procedure : round
 36563                                  ;
 36564                                  ; round the values in memlo and memhi to paragraph boundary.
 36565                                  ; perform bounds check.
 36566                                  ;
 36567                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36568                                  
 36569                                  round:
 36570 0000436E 50                      	push	ax
 36571 0000436F 2EA1[6003]              	mov	ax,[cs:memlo]
 36572                                  
 36573 00004373 E8F3CD                  	call	ParaRound		; para round up
 36574                                  
 36575 00004376 2E0106[6203]            	add	[cs:memhi],ax
 36576 0000437B 2EC706[6003]0000        	mov	word [cs:memlo],0
 36577 00004382 2EA1[6203]              	mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; ax = new memhi
 36578 00004386 2E3B06[A302]            	cmp	ax,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; if new memhi >= alloclim, error
 36579 0000438B 7322                    	jae	short mem_err

 36640                                  todigit:
 36641 000043DD 2C30                    	sub	al,'0'
 36642                                  	;jb	short notdig  ; 02/11/2022
 36643                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36644 000043DF 7203                    	jb	short notdig2
 36645                                  	;cmp	al,9
 36646                                  	;ja	short notdig
 36647                                  	;clc
 36648                                  	;retn
 36649                                  	; 12/12/2022

 36653                                  	;stc

 36657                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36658                                  ;
 36659                                  ; procedure : getnum
 36660                                  ;
 36661                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 36662                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 36663                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 36664                                  ;
 36665                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36666                                  
 36667                                  getnum:
 36668 000043E5 53                      	push	bx
 36669 000043E6 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 36670                                  b2:
 36671 000043E8 E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 36672 000043EB 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 36673                                  
 36674 000043ED 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 36675 000043EE 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 36676                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 36677                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36678 000043EF B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 36679 000043F1 F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 36680 000043F3 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 36681 000043F4 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 36682 000043F6 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 36683 000043F9 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 36684                                  
 36685 000043FB 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 36686                                  
 36687 000043FC E8BEE5                  	call	getchr			;get next digit
 36688 000043FF 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 36689 00004401 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 36690 00004403 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 36691 00004405 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 36692 00004407 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 36693 00004409 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 36694 0000440B 7417                    	je	short b15
 36695 0000440D 2E3A06[AC02]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 36696 00004412 7410                    	je	short b15
 36697 00004414 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 36698                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36699                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36700                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 36701                                  	;nop
 36702 00004416 740C                    	je	short b15
 36703 00004418 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 36704 0000441A 7408                    	je	short b15
 36705 0000441C 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 36706 0000441E 7404                    	je	short b15
 36707 00004420 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 36708 00004422 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 36709                                  b15:
 36710 00004424 2EFF06[5403]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 36711 00004429 2EFF0E[5803]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 36712                                  b1:
 36713 0000442E 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 36714 00004430 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 36715 00004432 5B                      	pop	bx
 36716 00004433 C3                      	retn
 36717                                  badnum:
 36718                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36719                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 36720 00004434 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 36721                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 36722 00004436 2EA2[AC02]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 36723 0000443A 5B                      	pop	bx
 36724 0000443B F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 36725 0000443C C3                      	retn
 36726

 36728                                  
 36729                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 36730                                  
 36731                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36732                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 36733                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 36734                                  ;	si = 0
 36735                                  ;	ax = country id
 36736                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 36737                                  ;	bx = file handle
 36738                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 36739                                  ;
 36740                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 36741                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 36742                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 36743                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 36744                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36745                                  
 36746                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36747                                  	; (SYSINIT:4D83h)
 36748                                  
 36749 0000443D 57                      	push	di
 36750 0000443E 50                      	push	ax
 36751 0000443F 52                      	push	dx
 36752                                  
 36753 00004440 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 36754 00004442 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 36755 00004444 B80002                  	mov	ax,512			;read 512 bytes
 36756 00004447 E84F01                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read the file header
 36757 0000444A 724D                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36758                                  
 36759 0000444C 06                      	push	es
 36760 0000444D 56                      	push	si
 36761                                  
 36762 0000444E 0E                      	push	cs
 36763 0000444F 07                      	pop	es
 36764

 36766 00004453 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			;length of the signature
 36767 00004456 F3A6                    	repz	cmpsb
 36768                                  
 36769 00004458 5E                      	pop	si
 36770 00004459 07                      	pop	es
 36771 0000445A 753D                    	jnz	short setdosdata_fail 	;signature mismatch
 36772                                  
 36773 0000445C 83C612                  	add	si,18			;si -> county info type
 36774 0000445F 803C01                  	cmp	byte [si],1		;only accept type 1 (currently only 1 header type)
 36775 00004462 7535                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail 	;cannot proceed. error return
 36776                                  
 36777 00004464 46                      	inc	si			;si -> file offset
 36778 00004465 8B14                    	mov	dx,[si]			;get the info file offset.
 36779 00004467 8B4C02                  	mov	cx,[si+2]
 36780 0000446A B80018                  	mov	ax,6144			;read 6144 bytes.
 36781 0000446D E82901                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read info
 36782 00004470 7227                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36783                                  
 36784 00004472 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the # of country, codepage combination entries
 36785 00004474 81F9B601                	cmp	cx, 438			;cannot handle more than 438 entries.
 36786 00004478 771F                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail

 36788 0000447A 46                      	inc	si
 36789 0000447B 46                      	inc	si			;si -> entry information packet
 36790 0000447C 5A                      	pop	dx			;restore code page id
 36791 0000447D 58                      	pop	ax			;restore country id
 36792 0000447E 5F                      	pop	di
 36793                                  
 36794                                  setdoscntry_find:			;search for desired country_id,codepage_id.
 36795 0000447F 3B4402                  	cmp	ax,[si+2]		;compare country_id
 36796 00004482 750A                    	jne	short setdoscntry_next
 36797                                  
 36798 00004484 83FA00                  	cmp	dx,0			;no user specified code page ?
 36799 00004487 7415                    	je	short setdoscntry_any_codepage ;then no need to match code page id.
 36800 00004489 3B5404                  	cmp	dx,[si+4]		;compare code page id
 36801 0000448C 7413                    	je	short setdoscntry_got_it
 36802                                  
 36803                                  setdoscntry_next:
 36804 0000448E 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;next entry
 36805 00004490 46                      	inc	si
 36806 00004491 46                      	inc	si			;take a word for size of entry itself
 36807 00004492 E2EB                    	loop	setdoscntry_find
 36808                                  
 36809 00004494 B9FFFF                  	mov	cx,-1			;signals that bad country id entered.
 36810                                  setdoscntry_fail:
 36811 00004497 F9                      	stc
 36812 00004498 C3                      	retn
 36813                                  
 36814                                  setdosdata_fail:
 36815 00004499 5E                      	pop	si
 36816 0000449A 59                      	pop	cx
 36817 0000449B 5F                      	pop	di
 36818 0000449C EBF9                    	jmp	short setdoscntry_fail
 36819                                  
 36820                                  setdoscntry_any_codepage:		;use the code_page_id of the country_id found.
 36821 0000449E 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]
 36822                                  
 36823                                  setdoscntry_got_it:			;found the matching entry
 36824 000044A1 2E8916[FE46]            	mov	[cs:cntrycodepage_id],dx ;save code page id for this country.
 36825 000044A6 8B540A                  	mov	dx,[si+10]		;get the file offset of country data
 36826 000044A9 8B4C0C                  	mov	cx,[si+12]
 36827 000044AC B80002                  	mov	ax,512 			;read 512 bytes
 36828 000044AF E8E700                  	call	readincontrolbuffer
 36829 000044B2 72E3                    	jc	short setdoscntry_fail
 36830                                  
 36831 000044B4 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the number of entries to handle.
 36832 000044B6 46                      	inc	si
 36833 000044B7 46                      	inc	si			;si -> first entry
 36834

 36836 000044B8 57                      	push	di			;es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 36837 000044B9 51                      	push	cx			;save # of entry left

 36839

 36843                                  
 36844 000044C3 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]		;get offset of data
 36845 000044C6 8B4C06                  	mov	cx,[si+6]
 36846 000044C9 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 36847 000044CC F9                      	stc
 36848 000044CD CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 36849 000044CF 72C8                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36850                                  
 36851 000044D1 BA0002                  	mov	dx,512			;start of data buffer
 36852 000044D4 B91400                  	mov	cx,20			;read 20 bytes only. we only need to
 36853 000044D7 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;look at the length of the data in the file.
 36854 000044D9 F9                      	stc
 36855 000044DA CD21                    	int	21h			;read the country.sys data
 36856 000044DC 72BB                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail 	;read failure
 36857                                  
 36858 000044DE 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 36859 000044E0 75B7                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail ; 13/05/2019
 36860                                  
 36861 000044E2 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]		;get offset of data again.
 36862 000044E5 8B4C06                  	mov	cx,[si+6]
 36863 000044E8 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 36864 000044EB F9                      	stc
 36865 000044EC CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer back again
 36866 000044EE 72A9                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36867                                  
 36868 000044F0 56                      	push	si
 36869 000044F1 BE0802                  	mov	si,(512+8)		;get length of the data from the file
 36870 000044F4 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]
 36871 000044F6 5E                      	pop	si
 36872 000044F7 BA0002                  	mov	dx,512			;start of data buffer
 36873 000044FA 83C10A                  	add	cx,10			;signature + a word for the length itself
 36874 000044FD B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read the data from the file.
 36875 000044FF F9                      	stc
 36876 00004500 CD21                    	int	21h
 36877 00004502 7295                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36878                                  
 36879 00004504 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 36880 00004506 7591                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail
 36881                                  
 36882 00004508 8A4402                  	mov	al,[si+2]		;save data id for future use.
 36883 0000450B BE0802                  	mov	si,(512+8)		;si-> data buffer + id tag field
 36884 0000450E 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the length of the file
 36885 00004510 41                      	inc	cx			;take care of a word for lenght of tab
 36886 00004511 41                      	inc	cx			;itself.
 36887 00004512 81F9F805                	cmp	cx,(2048-512-8)	; 1528	;fit into the buffer?
 36888 00004516 7781                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 36889                                  
 36890                                  	;if	bugfix
 36891 00004518 E83500                  	call	setdbcs_before_copy
 36892                                  	;endif
 36893                                  
 36894 0000451B 3C01                    	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo ; 1	;is the data for setcountryinfo table?
 36895 0000451D 7512                    	jne	short setdoscntry_mov 	;no, don't worry
 36896                                  
 36897 0000451F 26FF7518                	push	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen]  
 36898                                  	;push	word [es:di+24]		;cannot destroy ccmono_ptr address. save them.
 36899 00004523 26FF751A                	push	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen+2] 
 36900                                  	;push	word [es:di+26]		;at this time di -> cccountryinfolen
 36901                                  	
 36902 00004527 57                      	push	di			;save di
 36903                                  
 36904 00004528 50                      	push	ax
 36905 00004529 2EA1[FE46]              	mov	ax,[cs:cntrycodepage_id] ;do not use the code page info in country_info
 36906 0000452D 894404                  	mov	[si+4],ax		;use the saved one for this !!!!
 36907 00004530 58                      	pop	ax
 36908

 36917 0000453C 268F4518                	pop	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen] 
 36918                                  	;pop	word [es:di+24]
 36919                                  
 36920                                  setdoscntry_data_next:

 36930 0000454D E968FF                  	jmp	setdoscntry_data

 36943 00004554 26833D00                	cmp	word [es:di],0		; zero byte data block?
 36944 00004558 7410                    	je	short sdbcsbc		; jump if so
 36945

 36964                                  getcountrydestination:
 36965                                  
 36966                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36967                                  ;get the destination address in the dos country info table.
 36968                                  ;
 36969                                  ;input: al - data id
 36970                                  ;	es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 36971                                  ;on return:
 36972                                  ;	es:di -> destination address of the matching data id
 36973                                  ;	carry set if no matching data id found in dos.
 36974                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36975                                  
 36976                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36977                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EB2h)
 36978                                  
 36979 0000456B 51                      	push	cx
 36980                                  	;add	di,74
 36981 0000456C 83C74A                  	add	di,country_cdpg_info.ccNumber_of_entries	
 36982                                  					;skip the reserved area, syscodepage etc.
 36983 0000456F 268B0D                  	mov	cx,[es:di]		;get the number of entries
 36984 00004572 47                      	inc	di
 36985 00004573 47                      	inc	di			;si -> the first start entry id
 36986                                  
 36987                                  getcntrydest:
 36988 00004574 263805                  	cmp	byte [es:di],al
 36989 00004577 7413                    	je	short getcntrydest_ok
 36990 00004579 26803D01                	cmp	byte [es:di],SetCountryInfo ;was it setcountryinfo entry?
 36991 0000457D 7405                    	je	short getcntrydest_1
 36992                                  
 36993 0000457F 83C705                  	add	di,5			;next data id
 36994 00004582 EB03                    	jmp	short getcntrydest_loop
 36995                                  
 36996                                  getcntrydest_1:
 36997                                  	;add	di,41
 36998 00004584 83C729                  	add	di,NEW_COUNTRY_SIZE+3	;next data id
 36999                                  getcntrydest_loop:
 37000 00004587 E2EB                    	loop	getcntrydest
 37001 00004589 F9                      	stc
 37002 0000458A EB0B                    	jmp	short getcntrydest_exit
 37003                                  
 37004                                  getcntrydest_ok:
 37005 0000458C 3C01                    	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo ; 1	;select country info?
 37006 0000458E 7503                    	jne	short getcntrydest_ok1
 37007                                  
 37008 00004590 47                      	inc	di			;now di -> cccountryinfolen
 37009 00004591 EB04                    	jmp	short getcntrydest_exit
 37010                                  
 37011                                  getcntrydest_ok1:
 37012 00004593 26C47D01                	les	di,[es:di+1]		;get the destination in es:di
 37013                                  
 37014                                  getcntrydest_exit:
 37015 00004597 59                      	pop	cx
 37016 00004598 C3                      	retn
 37017                                  
 37018                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37019                                  
 37020                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 37021                                  
 37022                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37023                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 37024                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 37025                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 37026                                  ;
 37027                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 37028                                  ;	 be moved.
 37029                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 37030                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 37031                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 37032                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 37033                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 37034                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 37035                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37036                                  
 37037 00004599 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 37038 0000459A B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 37039 0000459D F9                      	stc
 37040 0000459E CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 37041 000045A0 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 37042 000045A1 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 37043                                  
 37044 000045A3 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 37045 000045A5 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 37046 000045A7 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 37047 000045A9 F9                      	stc
 37048 000045AA CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 37049                                  ricb_exit:
 37050 000045AC C3                      	retn
 37051                                  
 37052                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37053                                  
 37054                                  set_country_path:
 37055                                  
 37056                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37057                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 37058                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 37059                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 37060                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 37061                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.
 37062                                  ;     ds, es, si value saved.
 37063                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37064                                  
 37065                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37066                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EF4h)
 37067                                  
 37068 000045AD 56                      	push	si
 37069                                  
 37070 000045AE 1E                      	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 37071 000045AF 06                      	push	es
 37072 000045B0 1F                      	pop	ds
 37073 000045B1 07                      	pop	es			;now ds -> confbot, es -> sysinitseg
 37074                                  
 37075 000045B2 E82C00                  	call	chk_drive_letter	;current ds:[si] is a drive letter?
 37076 000045B5 7206                    	jc	short scp_default_drv 	;no, use current default drive.
 37077                                  
 37078 000045B7 8A04                    	mov	al,[si]
 37079 000045B9 46                      	inc	si
 37080 000045BA 46                      	inc	si			;si -> next char after ":"
 37081 000045BB EB06                    	jmp	short scp_setdrv
 37082                                  
 37083                                  scp_default_drv:
 37084 000045BD B419                    	mov	ah,19h
 37085 000045BF CD21                    	int	21h
 37086 000045C1 0441                    	add	al,"A"			;convert it to a character.
 37087                                  
 37088                                  scp_setdrv:
 37089 000045C3 2EA2[B346]              	mov	[cs:cntry_drv],al	;set the drive letter.
 37090 000045C7 BF[B646]                	mov	di,cntry_path
 37091 000045CA 8A04                    	mov	al,[si]
 37092 000045CC 3C5C                    	cmp	al, "\"
 37093 000045CE 7404                    	je	short scp_root_dir
 37094                                  
 37095 000045D0 3C2F                    	cmp	al,"/"			;let's accept "/" as an directory delim
 37096                                  	;je	short scp_root_dir
 37097                                  	;jmp	short scp_path
 37098                                  	; 04/01/2023
 37099 000045D2 7501                    	jne	short scp_path
 37100                                  
 37101                                  scp_root_dir:
 37102 000045D4 4F                      	dec	di			;di -> cntry_root
 37103                                  scp_path:
 37104 000045D5 E81D00                  	call	move_asciiz		;copy it
 37105                                  
 37106 000045D8 BF[B346]                	mov	di,cntry_drv
 37107                                  scpath_exit:
 37108                                  
 37109 000045DB 1E                      	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 37110 000045DC 06                      	push	es
 37111 000045DD 1F                      	pop	ds
 37112 000045DE 07                      	pop	es			;ds, es value restored
 37113                                  
 37114 000045DF 5E                      	pop	si
 37115 000045E0 C3                      	retn
 37116                                  
 37117                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37118                                  
 37119                                  chk_drive_letter:
 37120                                  
 37121                                  ;check if ds:[si] is a drive letter followed by ":".
 37122                                  ;assume that every alpha character is already converted to upper case.
 37123                                  ;carry set if not.
 37124                                  
 37125                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2
 37126                                  
 37127 000045E1 50                      	push	ax
 37128 000045E2 803C41                  	cmp	byte [si],"A"
 37129                                  	;jb	short cdletter_no
 37130 000045E5 720C                    	jb	short cdletter_exit
 37131 000045E7 803C5A                  	cmp	byte [si],"Z"
 37132 000045EA 7706                    	ja	short cdletter_no
 37133 000045EC 807C013A                	cmp	byte [si+1],":"
 37134                                  	;jne	short cdletter_no
 37135                                  	;jmp	short cdletter_exit
 37136                                  	; 04/01/2023
 37137 000045F0 7401                    	je	short cdletter_exit
 37138                                  
 37139                                  cdletter_no:
 37140 000045F2 F9                      	stc
 37141                                  cdletter_exit:
 37142 000045F3 58                      	pop	ax
 37143 000045F4 C3                      	retn
 37144                                  
 37145                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37146                                  
 37147                                  move_asciiz:
 37148                                  
 37149                                  ;in: ds:si -> source es:di -> target
 37150                                  ;out: copy the string until 0.
 37151                                  ;assumes there exists a 0.
 37152                                  
 37153                                  masciiz_loop:
 37154 000045F5 A4                      	movsb
 37155 000045F6 807CFF00                	cmp	byte [si-1],0	; was it 0?
 37156 000045FA 75F9                    	jne	short masciiz_loop
 37157 000045FC C3                      	retn
 37158                                  
 37159                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37160                                  
 37161                                  ;	ds:dx points to string to output (asciz)
 37162                                  ;
 37163                                  ;	prints <badld_pre> <string> <badld_post>
 37164                                  
 37165                                  badfil:
 37166 000045FD 0E                      	push	cs
 37167 000045FE 07                      	pop	es
 37168                                  
 37169 000045FF 89D6                    	mov	si,dx
 37170                                  badload:
 37171 00004601 BA[B94B]                	mov	dx,badld_pre	; want to print config error
 37172 00004604 BB[764B]                	mov	bx,crlfm
 37173                                  prnerr:
 37174 00004607 0E                      	push	cs
 37175 00004608 1F                      	pop	ds ; *
 37176 00004609 E81D00                  	call	print
 37177                                  prn1:
 37178 0000460C 268A14                  	mov	dl,[es:si]
 37179 0000460F 08D2                    	or	dl,dl
 37180 00004611 7407                    	jz	short prn2
 37181 00004613 B402                    	mov	ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2 
 37182 00004615 CD21                    	int	21h
 37183 00004617 46                      	inc	si
 37184 00004618 EBF2                    	jmp	short prn1
 37185                                  prn2:
 37186 0000461A 89DA                    	mov	dx,bx
 37187 0000461C E80A00                  	call	print
 37188                                  	; 11/12/2022
 37189                                  	; ds = cs ; *
 37190 0000461F 803E[5303]01            	cmp	byte [donotshownum],1
 37191                                  				; suppress line number when handling command.com
 37192                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:donotshownum],1 
 37193 00004624 7407                    	je	short prnexit
 37194                                  	
 37195                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37196                                  	;call	error_line
 37197 00004626 E9ABE3                  	jmp	error_line
 37198                                  ;prnexit:
 37199                                  	;retn
 37200                                  
 37201                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37202                                  
 37203                                  print:
 37204 00004629 B409                    	mov	ah,STD_CON_STRING_OUTPUT ; 9
 37205 0000462B CD21                    	int	21h
 37206                                  prnexit:	; 18/12/2022
 37207 0000462D C3                      	retn
 37208                                  
 37209                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37210                                  
 37211                                  ;  open device pointed to by dx, al has access code
 37212                                  ;   if unable to open do a device open null device instead
 37213                                  
 37214                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 37215                                  	; (SYSINIT:3764h)
 37216                                  open_dev:
 37217 0000462E E80500                  	call	open_file
 37218 00004631 7309                    	jnc	short open_dev3
 37219                                  
 37220                                  open_dev1:
 37221 00004633 BA[9746]                	mov	dx,nuldev
 37222                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37223                                  	;call	open_file
 37224                                  ;of_retn:
 37225                                  	;retn
 37226                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37227                                  	;jmp	short open_file
 37228                                  open_file:
 37229 00004636 B43D                    	mov	ah,OPEN	; 3Dh
 37230 00004638 F9                      	stc
 37231 00004639 CD21                    	int	21h
 37232                                  of_retn:	; 18/12/2022
 37233 0000463B C3                      	retn
 37234                                  
 37235                                  open_dev3:
 37236 0000463C 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; handle from open to bx
 37237                                  	;;xor	ax,ax			; get device info
 37238                                  	;;mov	ah,IOCTL ; 44h
 37239                                  	;mov	ax,(IOCTL<<8) ; 13/05/2019
 37240                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 37241                                  	;xor	ax,ax
 37242                                  	;mov	ah,44h	; IOCTL
 37243                                  	; 11/12/2022
 37244 0000463E B80044                  	mov	ax,4400h ; IOCTL<<8 
 37245                                  
 37246 00004641 CD21                    	int	21h
 37247                                  
 37248 00004643 F6C280                  	test	dl,10000000b ; 80h
 37249 00004646 75F3                    	jnz	short of_retn
 37250                                  
 37251 00004648 B43E                    	mov	ah,CLOSE ; 3Eh
 37252 0000464A CD21                    	int	21h
 37253 0000464C EBE5                    	jmp	short open_dev1
 37254
